1101  *          console.log("event type = " + param.eventType);
1102  *      },
1103  *      false
1104  * );
1105  */
1106 
1107 /**
1108  * Event for the focus change of HCAP application.<br>
1109  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the focus is moved from HCAP application to preloaded application, or vice versa except when HCAP mode is 0 (hcap.mode.HCAP_MODE_0).
1110  * <div align=center>
1111  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1112  *   <thead>
1113  *     <tr><th>HCAP Application Focus Event Type String</th></tr>
1114  *   </thead>
1115  *   <tbody>
1116  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"focused"</td></tr>
1117  *     <tr>            <td>"unfocused"</td></tr>
1118  *   </tbody>
1119  *   <tfoot>
1120  *     <tr><td>HCAP Application Focus Event Type</td></tr>
1121  *   </tfoot>
1122  * </table>
1123  * </div>
1124  * @name hcap_application_focus_changed
1125  * @event
1126  * @since 1.18.2
1127  * @example
1128  * document.addEventListener(
1129  *      "hcap_application_focus_changed",
1130  *      function (param) {
1131  *          // {String} param.eventType - HCAP application focus event type
1132  *          console.log("event type = " + param.eventType);
1133  *      },
1134  *      false
1135  * );
1136  */
1137 
1138 /**
1139  * Event for the result of USB file download.<br>
1140  * Its listener will be invoked when the file requested by <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a> is downloaded to the path in the USB storage successfully or is failed to download.<br>
1141  * @name usb_file_downloaded
1142  * @event
1143  * @since 1.18.3
1144  * @see
1145  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageList()</a><br>
1146  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.getUsbStorageFileList">hcap.file.getUsbStorageFileList()</a><br>
1147  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a><br>
1148  * <a href="hcap.file.html#.deleteUsbFile">hcap.file.deleteUsbFile()</a><br>
1149  * @example
1150  * document.addEventListener(
1151  *      "usb_file_downloaded",
1152  *      function (param) {
1153  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the file of uri is downloaded successfully, else false.
1154  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1155  *          // {String} param.uri - URI for the file to download to the usb storage requested by <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a>.
1156  *          // {String} param.downloadPath - file path to download the file of uri requested by <a href="hcap.file.html#.downloadFileToUsb">hcap.file.downloadFileToUsb()</a>.
1157  *          console.log(
1158  *              "Event 'usb_file_downloaded' is received.\n" +
1159  *              "Result = " + param.result + "\n" +
1160  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage + "\n" +
1161  *              "uri = " + param.uri + "\n" +
1162  *              "Download path = " + param.downloadPath
1163  *          );
1164  *      },
1165  *      false
1166  * );
1167  */
1168 
1169 /**
1170  * Event for receiving the RS232C data.<br>
1171  * Its listener will be invoked only when the property "rs232c" is "1" and rs232c data is received.<br>
1172  * Because RS232C data is serial data, received data will be separated into 1 or multibytes and delivered to HCAP application.<br>
1173  * Therefore HCAP application has to get, assemble, interpret and analyze the received rs232c data.<br>
1174  *
1175  * @name rs232c_data_received
1176  * @event
1177  * @since 1.18.4
1178  * @see
1179  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.getConfiguration()</a><br>
1180  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.rs232c.setConfiguration()</a><br>
1181  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.sendData">hcap.rs232c.sendData()</a><br>
1182  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.setStartupData">hcap.rs232c.setStartupData()</a><br>
1183  * <a href="hcap.rs232c.html#.clearStartupData">hcap.rs232c.clearStartupData()</a><br>
1184  * @example
1185  * document.addEventListener(
1186  *      "rs232c_data_received",
1187  *      function (param) {
1188  *          // {String} param.data - rs232c data string converted from binary data to ascii data such as ascii "3B1C42" for binary 0x3B1C42 with param.dataLength 3 (3 bytes) and ascii "00" for binary null data (0x00) with param.dataLength 1 (1 byte).
1189  *          // {Number} param.dataLength - received rs232c data length in bytes. Max length of EU model is 255 (bytes) and US model is 32 (bytes).
1190  *          console.log(
1191  *              "Event 'rs232c_data_received' is received.\n" +
1192  *              "data = " + param.data + "\n" +
1193  *              "data length = " + param.dataLength
1194  *          );  
1195  *      },
1196  *      false
1197  * );
1198  */
1199 
1200 /**
1201  * Event for the cloning done.<br>
1202  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the cloning is done.
1203  * 
1204  * @name cloning_done_received 
1205  * @event
1206  * @since 1.19.0
1207  * @see
1208  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.requestCloning">hcap.system.requestCloning()</a><br>
1209  * @example
1210  * document.addEventListener(
1211  *      "cloning_done_received", 
1212  *      function (param) {
1213  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the cloning is done successfully, else false.
1214  *          console.log(
1215  *              "Event 'cloning_done_received' is received.\n" +
1216  *              "Result = " + param.result
1217  *          );
1218  *      },
1219  *      false
1220  * );
1221  */
1222 
1223 /**
1224  * Event for the result of locale change.<br>
1225  * Its listener will be invoked when to succeed or fail to change the locale.
1226  * 
1227  * @name locale_changed 
1228  * @event
1229  * @since 1.19.0
1230  * @see
1231  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocaleList">hcap.system.getLocaleList()</a><br>
1232  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocale">hcap.system.getLocale()</a><br>
1233  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.requestLocaleChange">hcap.system.requestLocaleChange()</a><br>
1234  * @example
1235  * document.addEventListener(
1236  *      "locale_changed", 
1237  *      function (param) {
1238  *          // {String} param.specifier - locale specifier for the locale change request.
1239  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the locale is changed successfully, else false.
1240  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1241  *          console.log(
1242  *              "Event 'locale_changed' is received.\n" +
1243  *              "specifier = " + param.specifier + "\n" +
1244  *              "change result = " + param.result + "\n" +
1245  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage
1246  *          );
1247  *      },
1248  *      false
1249  * );
1250  */
1251 
1252 /**
1253  * Event for the MMR (Magic Motion RCU) low battery notification.<br>
1254  * 
1255  * @name mmr_low_battery_event_received
1256  * @event
1257  * @since 1.19.0
1258  * @example
1259  * document.addEventListener(
1260  *      "mmr_low_battery_event_received",
1261  *      function (param) {
1262  *          console.log("MMR low battery notification is received");
1263  *      },
1264  *      false
1265  * );
1266  */
1267 
1268 /**
1269  * Event for the bluetooth notification.<br>
1270  * 
1271  * @name bluetooth_event_received
1272  * @event
1273  * @since 1.19.0
1274  * @see
1275  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.html#.disconnect">hcap.bluetooth.disconnect()</a><br>
1276  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.html#.setScanState">hcap.bluetooth.setScanState()</a><br>
1277  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.central.html#.startDiscover">hcap.bluetooth.central.startDiscover()</a><br>
1278  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.central.html#.allowConnectionRequest">hcap.bluetooth.central.allowConnectionRequest()</a><br>
1279  * @example
1280  * document.addEventListener(
1281  *      "bluetooth_event_received",
1282  *      function (param) {
1283  *          // {String} param.eventType - bluetooth event type ("bt_gap_find_devices_result" / "bt_service_status_changed" / "bt_audio_device_discovered" / "bt_peripheral_device_connection_status")
1284  *          // {Object} param.btGapFindDevicesResult - event data for the event type "bt_gap_find_devices_result"
1285  *          //      {
1286  *          //          {String} scanState - scan state ("found_devices" : devices are found / "done" : scanning is done with no device found)
1287  *          //          {Array} list - device list
1288  *          //                  {String} list[].name - device name 
1289  *          //                  {Number} list[].class - device class 
1290  *          //                  {String} list[].address - BD (Bluetooth Device) address 
1291  *          //                  {Number} list[].rssi - RSSI value of device 
1292  *          //      }
1293  *          // {Object} param.btServiceStatusChanged - event data for the event type "bt_service_status_changed"
1294  *          //      {
1295  *          //          {String} listType - list type ("discovered"/"bonded"/"none")
1296  *          //          {String} state - device connection state ("connected"/"disconnected"/"connecting"/"disconnecting"/"none")
1297  *          //          {String} address - BD (Bluetooth Device) address 
1298  *          //          {String} service - service profile ("hid" : HID profile / "audio" : audio src(A2DP) profile / "opc" : OPC profile / "audio_sink" : audio sink(A2DP) profile) 
1299  *          //          {String} name - device name
1300  *          //      }
1301  *          // {Object} param.device - event data for the event type "bt_audio_device_discovered"
1302  *          //      {
1303  *          //          {String} deviceClass - device class 
1304  *          //          {String} address - BD (Bluetooth Device) address 
1305  *          //          {String} rssi - RSSI value of device 
1306  *          //          {String} name - device name
1307  *          //          {String} type - device type
1308  *          //      }
1309  *          // {Object} param.deviceMessage - event data for the event type "bt_peripheral_device_connection_status" 
1310  *          //      { 
1311  *          //          {String} address- device mac address
1312  *          //          {String} reason - normal/incoming (normal: TV requests connection./incoming: A registered peripheral device requests connection.)
1313  *          //          {String} status - connected/disconnected
1314  *          //          {String} deviceName - device name  
1315  *          //      } 
1316  *          console.log("Event 'bluetooth_event_received' is received.");
1317  *          if (param.eventType === "bt_gap_find_devices_result") {
1318  *              console.log("scan state = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.scanState);
1319  *              for (var i = 0; i < param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list.length; i++) {
1320  *                  console.log("found device[" + i + "] name = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].name + ", class = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].class + ", BD address = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].address + ", rssi = " + param.btGapFindDevicesResult.list[i].rssi);
1321  *              }
1322  *          } else if (param.eventType === "bt_service_status_changed") {
1323  *              console.log("listType = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.listType + ", state = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.state + ", BD address = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.address + ", service profile = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.service + ", name = " + param.btServiceStatusChanged.name);
1324  *          } else if (param.eventType === "bt_audio_device_discovered") {
1325  *              console.log("eventType = " + param.eventType + ", deviceClass = " + param.device.deviceClass + ", address = " + param.device.address + ", rssi = " + param.device.rssi + ", name = " + param.device.name + ", type = " + param.device.type);
1326  *          } else if (param.eventType === "bt_peripheral_device_connection_status") { 
1327  *             console.log("address = " + param.deviceMessage.address  + ", reason = " + param.deviceMessage.reason + ", status = " + param.deviceMessage.status + ", deviceName = " + param.deviceMessage.deviceName); 
1328  *         } 
1329  *      },
1330  *      false
1331  * );
1332  */
1333 
1334 /**
1335  * Event for received WebRTC message.<br>
1336  * 
1337  * @name webrtc_message_received
1338  * @event
1339  * @since 1.24 deprecated
1340  * @see 
1341  * <a href="_global_.html#event:webrtc_event_received">{Event} webrtc_event_received</a><br>
1342  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.startPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1343  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.stopPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1344  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.incomingCall">hcap.webrtc.incomingCall()</a><br>
1345  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.outgoingCall">hcap.webrtc.outgoingCall()</a><br>
1346  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.endCall">hcap.webrtc.endCall()</a><br>
1347  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.acceptMessage">hcap.webrtc.acceptMessage()</a><br>
1348  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.startCheckAudio()</a><br>
1349  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.stopCheckAudio()</a><br>
1350  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.setConfiguration()</a><br>
1351  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.getConfiguration()</a><br>
1352  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.showDiagnostics">hcap.webrtc.showDiagnostics()</a><br>
1353  * @example
1354  * document.addEventListener(
1355  *      "webrtc_message_received",
1356  *      function (param) {
1357  *          // {Number} param.remotePeerId - remote peer id
1358  *          // {String} param.message - message
1359  *          console.log("Event 'webrtc_message_received' is received.");
1360  *          console.log("remotePeerId = " + param.remotePeerId + ", message = " + param.message);
1361  *      },
1362  *      false
1363  * );
1364  */
1365 
1366 /**
1367  * Event for WebRTC.<br>
1368  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the state of WebRTC is changed.  
1369  * <div align=center>
1370  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1371  *   <thead>
1372  *     <tr><th>WebRTC Event Type String</th></tr>
1373  *   </thead>
1374  *   <tbody>
1375  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"click_end_call"</td></tr>
1376  *     <tr>            <td>"click_mic_on"</td></tr>
1377  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"click_mic_off"</td></tr>
1378  *     <tr>            <td>"click_video_on"</td></tr>
1379  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"click_video_off"</td></tr>
1380  *     <tr>            <td>"p2p_av_connected"</td></tr>
1381  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"p2p_av_disconnected"</td></tr>
1382  *   </tbody>
1383  *   <tfoot>
1384  *     <tr><td>WebRTC Event Type</td></tr>
1385  *   </tfoot>
1386  * </table>
1387  * </div>
1388  * @name webrtc_event_received
1389  * @event
1390  * @since 1.24 deprecated
1391  * @see 
1392  * <a href="_global_.html#event:webrtc_message_received">{Event} webrtc_message_received</a><br>
1393  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.startPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1394  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopPreviewVideo">hcap.webrtc.stopPreviewVideo()</a><br>
1395  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.incomingCall">hcap.webrtc.incomingCall()</a><br>
1396  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.outgoingCall">hcap.webrtc.outgoingCall()</a><br>
1397  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.endCall">hcap.webrtc.endCall()</a><br>
1398  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.acceptMessage">hcap.webrtc.acceptMessage()</a><br>
1399  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.startCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.startCheckAudio()</a><br>
1400  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.stopCheckAudio">hcap.webrtc.stopCheckAudio()</a><br>
1401  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.setConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.setConfiguration()</a><br>
1402  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.getConfiguration">hcap.webrtc.getConfiguration()</a><br>
1403  * <a href="hcap.webrtc.html#.showDiagnostics">hcap.webrtc.showDiagnostics()</a><br>
1404  * @example
1405  * document.addEventListener(
1406  *      "webrtc_event_received",
1407  *      function (param) {
1408  *          // {String} param.eventString - WebRTC event string
1409  *          console.log("Event 'webrtc_event_received' is received.");
1410  *          console.log("eventString = " + param.eventString);
1411  *      },
1412  *      false
1413  * );
1414  */
1415 
1416 /**
1417  * Event for the result of HDMI connection change.<br>
1418  * Its listener will be invoked whenever a HDMI is connected or disconnected.<br>
1419  * 
1420  * @name hdmi_connection_changed 
1421  * @event
1422  * @since 1.20.0
1423  * @see
1424  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getHdmiOutStatus">hcap.system.getHdmiOutStatus()</a><br>
1425  * @example
1426  * document.addEventListener(
1427  *      "hdmi_connection_changed", 
1428  *      function (param) {
1429  *          // {Number} param.index - index of the HDMI which was connected or disconnected.
1430  *          // {Boolean} param.connected - true if the HDMI is connected, else false.
1431  *          console.log(
1432  *              "Event 'hdmi_connection_changed' is received.\n" +
1433  *              "HDMI-" + param.index + " : " + "connected = " + param.connected
1434  *          );
1435  *      },
1436  *      false
1437  * );
1438  */
1439 
1440 /**
1441  * Event called when TV is turned off ("turn off" means TV moves on the power STANDBY).<br>
1442  * Pro:Centric HTML application has a chance to clean up its resource in this event listener by calling hcap.system.beginDestroy.<br>
1443  * TV will wait for hcap.system.beginDestroy up to 1 second. And once beginDestroy is called, endDestroy should be called. Or TV will be turned off after 10 minutes automatically.<br>
1444  * <img src="./image/on_destroy.jpg"><br>
1445  * 
1446  * @name on_destroy 
1447  * @event
1448  * @since 1.20.0
1449  * @see
1450  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.beginDestroy">hcap.system.beginDestroy()</a><br>
1451  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.endDestroy">hcap.system.endDestroy()</a>
1452  * @example
1453  * document.addEventListener(
1454  *      "on_destroy",
1455  *      function() {
1456  *          console.log("Event 'on_destroy' is received");
1457  *          hcap.system.beginDestroy({
1458  *              "onSuccess" : function() {
1459  *                  console.log("beginDestroy onSuccess");
1460  *
1461  *                  // clean up resources
1462  *
1463  *                  hcap.system.endDestroy({
1464  *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
1465  *                          console.log("endDestroy onSuccess");
1466  *                      },
1467  *                      "onFailure" : function(e) {
1468  *                          console.log("endDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + e.errorMessage);
1469  *                      }
1470  *                  });
1471  *              },
1472  *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
1473  *                  console.log("beginDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
1474  *              }
1475  *          });
1476  *      },
1477  *      false
1478  * );
1479  */
1480 
1481 /**
1482  * Event for the screensaver.<br>
1483  * Its listener will be invoked whenever screensaver event is received.
1484  * <div align=center>
1485  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1486  *   <thead>
1487  *     <tr><th>Screensaver Event Type String</th></tr>
1488  *   </thead>
1489  *   <tbody>
1490  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"turnon_screensaver"</td></tr>
1491  *     <tr>            <td>"turnoff_screensaver"</td></tr>
1492  *   </tbody>
1493  *   <tfoot>
1494  *     <tr><td>Screensaver Event Type</td></tr>
1495  *   </tfoot>
1496  * </table>
1497  * </div>
1498  * 
1499  * @name screensaver_event_received
1500  * @event
1501  * @since 1.20.1
1502  * @example
1503  * document.addEventListener(
1504  *      "screensaver_event_received",
1505  *      function (param) {
1506  *          // {Number} param.eventType - screensaver event type.
1507  *          console.log("screensaver event type = " + param.eventType);
1508  *      },
1509  *      false
1510  * );
1511  */
1512 
1513 /**
1514  * Event for UI value change.<br>
1515  * Its listener will be invoked whenever UI value is changed.
1516  * <div align=center>
1517  * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
1518  *   <thead>
1519  *     <tr><th>UI Value Event Type String</th></tr>
1520  *   </thead>
1521  *   <tbody>
1522  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"bluetooth_sound_sync"</td></tr>  
1523  *     <tr>            <td>"audio_pts_offset"</td></tr>
1524  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"video_pts_offset"</td></tr>
1525  *     <tr>            <td>"beacon_mode"</td></tr>
1526  *     <tr class="odd"><td>"healthcare_headphone_mode"</td></tr>
1527  *     <tr>            <td>"vlan_id_mode"</td></tr>
1528  *   </tbody>
1529  *   <tfoot>
1530  *     <tr><td>UI Value Event Type</td></tr>
1531  *   </tfoot>
1532  * </table>
1533  * </div>
1534  * 
1535  * @name ui_value_changed
1536  * @event
1537  * @since 1.20.1
1538  * @see
1539  * <a href="hcap.bluetooth.html#.setBluetoothSoundSync">hcap.bluetooth.setBluetoothSoundSync()</a><br>
1540  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
1541  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
1542  * <a href="hcap.volume.html#.setHealthcareHeadphoneMode">hcap.volume.setHealthcareHeadphoneMode()</a><br>
1543  * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.setBeaconMode">hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode()</a><br>
1544  * <a href="hcap.network.html#.setVlanIdMode">hcap.network.setVlanIdMode()</a>
1545  * @example
1546  * document.addEventListener(
1547  *      "ui_value_changed",
1548  *      function (param) {
1549  *          // {String} param.key - UI Value event string
1550  *          console.log("Event 'ui_value_changed' is received.");
1551  *          console.log("eventString = " + param.key);
1552  *      },
1553  *      false
1554  * );
1555  */
1556 
1557 /**
1558  * Event for the result of asynchronous ping.<br>
1559  * Its listener will be invoked when the asynchronous ping requested by <a href="hcap.network.html#.asyncPing">hcap.network.asyncPing()</a> is success or fail.<br>
1560  * @name ping_result_received
1561  * @event
1562  * @since 1.22.0
1563  * @see
1564  * <a href="hcap.network.html#.asyncPing">hcap.network.asyncPing()</a><br>
1565 
1566  * @example
1567  * document.addEventListener(
1568  *      "ping_result_received",
1569  *      function (param) {
1570  *          // {Boolean} param.result - true if the result of asynchronous ping is success, else false.
1571  *          // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1572  *          // {String} param.roundTripTimeInMs - round trip time to the target in milliseconds requested by <a href="hcap.network.html#.asyncPing">hcap.network.asyncPing()</a>.
1573  *          console.log(
1574  *              "Event 'ping_result_received' is received.\n" +
1575  *              "Result = " + param.result + "\n" +
1576  *              "Error message = " + param.errorMessage + "\n" +
1577  *              "Round trip time = " + param.roundTripTimeInMs
1578  *          );
1579  *      },
1580  *      false
1581  * );
1582  */
1583 
1584 /**
1585  * Event notifying the status of the TV (or monitor) connected for STB output. [Support STB Only]<br>
1586  * Its listener will be invoked whenever the TV (or monitor) is connected or disconnected.<br>
1587  * 
1588  * @name output_connection_changed 
1589  * @event
1590  * @since 1.24.2
1591  * @example
1592  * document.addEventListener(
1593  *      "output_connection_changed", 
1594  *      function (param) {
1595  *          // {Boolean} param.connected - true if the TV (or monitor) is connected, else false.
1596  *          console.log(
1597  *              "Event 'output_connection_changed' is received.\n" +
1598  *              "output connected = " + param.connected
1599  *          );
1600  *      },
1601  *      false
1602  * );
1603  */
1604 
1605 /**
1606  * Event for the software update notification.<br>
1607  * 
1608  * @name software_update_event_received
1609  * @event
1610  * @since 1.24.2
1611  * @see
1612  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.startManualUpdate">hcap.system.startManualUpdate()</a><br>
1613  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getUpdateProgress">hcap.system.getUpdateProgress()</a><br>
1614  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.cancelUpdate">hcap.system.cancelUpdate()</a><br>
1615  * @example
1616  * document.addEventListener(
1617  *      "software_update_event_received",
1618  *      function (param) {
1619  *          // {String} param.eventType - software update event type ("sw_new_version_checked" / "sw_update_status_changed")
1620  *          // {Object} param.swNewVersionChecked - event data for the event type "sw_new_version_checked"
1621  *          //      {
1622  *          //          {Boolean} flagUpdate - Status of update request
1623  *          //          {Number} version - Version to be updated
1624  *          //      }
1625  *          // {Object} param.swUpdateStatusChanged - event data for the event type "sw_update_status_changed"
1626  *          //      {
1627  *          //          {String} status - "idle" / "in progress" / "completed"
1628  *          //      }
1629  *          console.log("Event 'software_update_event_received' is received.");
1630  *          if (param.eventType === "sw_new_version_checked") {
1631  *              console.log("eventType = " + param.eventType + ", flagUpdate = " + param.swNewVersionChecked.flagUpdate + ", version = " + param.swNewVersionChecked.version);
1632  *          }
1633  *          else if (param.eventType === "sw_update_status_changed") { 
1634  *              console.log("eventType = " + param.eventType + ", status = " + param.swUpdateStatusChanged.status);
1635  *          } 
1636  *      },
1637  *      false
1638  * );
1639  */
1640 
1641 /**
1642  * Events for the result of <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.startScan">hcap.beacon.startScan()</a>.<br>
1643  * Its listener will be invoked whenever data on the beacon device is discovered.<br>
1644  *
1645  * @name beacon_device_discovered
1646  * @event
1647  * @since 1.24.6
1648  * @see
1649  * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.startScan">hcap.beacon.startScan()</a><br>
1650  * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.stopScan">hcap.beacon.stopScan()</a><br>
1651  * @example
1652  * document.addEventListener(
1653  *      "beacon_device_discovered",
1654  *      function (param) {
1655  *          // {Array} param.devices- Beacon device list          
1656  *          // {Array} param.devices[].scanRecord[] - Beacon device scanned record.
1657  *          // {String} param.devices[].address - Beacon device address.
1658  *          // {Number} param.devices[].rssi - RSSI value of device.
1659  *          console.log(
1660  *              "Event 'beacon_device_discovered' is received.\n" +
1661  *              "devices length = " + param.devices.length
1662  *          );  
1663  *          for (var i = 0; i < param.devices.length; i++) {
1664  *              console.log("discovered device[" + i + "] scanRecord = " + param.devices[i].scanRecord + ", address = " + param.devices[i].address + ", rssi = " + param.devices[i].rssi);
1665  *          }
1666  *      },
1667  *      false
1668  * );
1669  */
1670 /**
1671  * Event for the peripheral status change.<br>
1672  * The event for the peripherals status changes. Its listener will be invoked when the peripheral status of the system is changed.<br>
1673  * It can be use <a href="hcap.system.html#.getPeripheralList">hcap.system.getPeripheralList()</a> to get detailed information on the system peripherals.<br>
1674  * 
1675  * @name peripheral_status_change
1676  * @event
1677  * @since 1.24.8
1678  * @see
1679  * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getPeripheralList">hcap.system.getPeripheralList()</a><br>
1680  * @example
1681  * document.addEventListener(
1682  *      "peripheral_status_changed",
1683  *      function (param) {
1684  *          console.log("Event 'peripheral_status_changed' is received.\n");
1685  *      },
1686  *      false
1687  * );
1688  */
1689 
1690 //var navigator; // only for local jslint
1691 //var document; // only for local jslint
1692 //var WebSocket; // only for local jslint
1693 //var window; // only for local jslint
1694 
1695 var extHcapSecure; // true : wss
1696 var extRegisterHcapCloseHandler; // "onbeforeunload" : register onbeforeunload handler to close hcap websocket, "onunload" : register onunload handler to close hcap websocket
1697 var extDisableHcapConsoleLog; // true : disable hcap console log
1698 var extWebWorker; // true : hcap.js is included in webworker
1699 
1700 /**
1701  * @constructor
1702  */
1703 var hcap;
1704 if (hcap === undefined) {
1705     (function () {
1706         /**
1707          * @namespace hcap
1708          */
1709         //"use strict"; // only for local jslint
1710         hcap = {
1711             API_VERSION: "1.24.12.5977"
1712         };
1713         var hcap_key_table = [],
1714             callback_event_id = 0,
1715             hcap_cmd_buffer = [{"command_id" : "0", "param_text" : "{\"command_id\" : \"0\", \"command\" : \"notify_sdk_version\", \"hcap_js_extension_version\" : \"1.24.12.5977\"}"}],
1716             ws = null,
1717             ws_is_opened = false,
1718             is_connecting = false,
1719             guard_call = false,
1720             initialize_hcap_websocket = null,
1721             start_cmd_loop = null,
1722             hcap_command = null,
1723             is_ws_off = false,
1724             make_log = null,
1725             media_object = null;
1726         function hcapLog(s) {
1727             if (extDisableHcapConsoleLog !== true) {
1728                 var str;
1729                 if (s.length > 1024) {
1730                     str = s.substring(0, 1024);
1731                 } else {
1732                     str = s;
1733                 }
1734                 if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1735                     console.log(str);
1736                 }
1737             }
1738         }
1739         if (extDisableHcapConsoleLog === true) {
1740             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1741                 console.log("hcap console log is disabled");
1742             }
1743         } else {
1744             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1745                 console.log("hcap console log is enabled");
1746             }
1747         }
1748         hcapLog("check external value : extDisableHcapConsoleLog = " + extDisableHcapConsoleLog + ", extHcapSecure = " + extHcapSecure + ", extRegisterHcapCloseHandler = " + extRegisterHcapCloseHandler);
1749         function ws_off() {
1750             var user_agent = navigator.userAgent,
1751                 windows = user_agent.match(/Windows/),
1752                 macintosh = user_agent.match(/Macintosh/),
1753                 mac = user_agent.match(/Mac OS X/);
1754             hcapLog("UA = '" + user_agent + "'");
1755             if (windows || macintosh || mac) {
1756                 hcapLog("HCAP websocket off");
1757                 return true;
1758             }
1759             return false;
1760         }
1761         is_ws_off = ws_off();
1762         function make_log_element(idx, names, object, log_message) {
1763             var value = "", type = "", ele = "";
1764             ele = names[idx];
1765             try {
1766                 value = object[ele];
1767                 type = typeof value;
1768             } catch (e) {
1769                 value = "<unknown value>";
1770                 type = "unknown";
1771             }
1772             if (type === "function") {
1773                 value = "{/*function*/}";
1774             } else if (type === "object") {
1775                 value = make_log("", value);
1776             } else if (type === "string") {
1777                 value = "\"" + value + "\"";
1778             }
1779             log_message += "\"" + ele + "\"" + " : " + value;
1780             if (idx < names.length - 1) {
1781                 log_message += ", ";
1782             }
1783             return log_message;
1784         }
1785         make_log = function (message, object) {
1786             var name = "", names = [], log_message = "";
1787             for (name in object) {
1788                 if (object.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
1789                     names.push(name);
1790                 }
1791             }
1792             names.sort();
1793             for (var i = 0; i < names.length; i += 1) {
1794                 log_message = make_log_element(i, names, object, log_message);
1795             }
1796             return message + "{" + log_message + "}";
1797         };
1798         function on_event_received(command, param) {
1799             if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1800                 var key = "",
1801                     eventType = command,
1802                     evtObj = document.createEvent("HTMLEvents");
1803                 hcapLog(make_log("event received, ", param));
1804                 evtObj.initEvent(eventType, true, false);
1805                 for (key in param) {
1806                     if (param.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
1807                         evtObj[key] = param[key];
1808                     }
1809                 }
1810                 document.dispatchEvent(evtObj);
1811             }
1812         }
1813         initialize_hcap_websocket = function () {
1814             if (is_connecting) {
1815                 hcapLog("websocket : connection is in progress");
1816                 return;
1817             }
1818             is_connecting = true;
1819             if (extHcapSecure !== true) {
1820                 hcapLog("default hcap connection");
1821                 ws = new WebSocket("ws://127.0.0.1:8053/hcap_command");
1822             } else {
1823                 hcapLog("secure hcap connection");
1824                 ws = new WebSocket("wss://localhost:8054/hcap_command");
1825             }
1826             ws.onopen = function () {
1827                 hcapLog("websocket : onopen");
1828                 is_connecting = false;
1829                 ws_is_opened = true;
1830                 setTimeout(start_cmd_loop, 5);
1831             };
1832             ws.onmessage = function (evt) {
1833                 var param = JSON.parse(evt.data),
1834                     command_id = param.command_id,
1835                     command = param.command,
1836                     command_result = param.result;
1837                 if (command_id === "event") {
1838                     if (command === "debug_event_received") {
1839                         if (extWebWorker !== true) {
1840                             console.log("hcap console log is " + param.enable_log?"enabled":"disabled");
1841                         }
1842                         extDisableHcapConsoleLog = !param.enable_log;
1843                     } else {
1844                         on_event_received(command, param);
1845                     }
1846                 } else if (hcap_cmd_buffer.length > 0 && hcap_cmd_buffer[0].command_id === command_id) {
1847                     hcapLog(make_log("command_id = " + command_id + " received, ", param));
1848                     if (command_result) {
1849                         if (hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onSuccess) {
1850                             try {
1851                                 hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onSuccess(param);
1852                             } catch(e) {
1853                                 hcapLog(make_log("exception : onSuccess : " + e));
1854                             }                            
1855                         }
1856                     } else {
1857                         if (hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onFailure) {
1858                             try {
1859                                 hcap_cmd_buffer[0].onFailure(param);
1860                             } catch(e) {
1861                                 hcapLog(make_log("exception : onFailure : " + e));
1862                             }
1863                         }
1864                     }
1865                     hcap_cmd_buffer.splice(0, 1);
1866                     guard_call = false;
1867                     start_cmd_loop();
1868                 } else {
1869                     hcapLog(make_log("invalid response from server ", param));
1870                     guard_call = false;
1871                     start_cmd_loop();
1872                 }
1873             };
1874             ws.onclose = function () {
1875                 hcapLog("websocket : onclose");
1876                 is_connecting = false;
1877                 ws_is_opened = false;
1878                 guard_call = false;
1879                 setTimeout(start_cmd_loop, 50);
1880             };
1881             if (extRegisterHcapCloseHandler === "onbeforeunload") {
1882                 window.onbeforeunload = function () {
1883                     hcapLog("close hcap websocket in onbeforeunload handler");
1884                     ws.onclose = function () {
1885                         return undefined;
1886                     };
1887                     ws.close();
1888                 };
1889             } else if (extRegisterHcapCloseHandler === "onunload") {
1890                 window.onunload = function () {
1891                     hcapLog("close hcap websocket in onunload handler");
1892                     ws.onclose = function () {
1893                         return undefined;
1894                     };
1895                     ws.close();
1896                 };
1897             }
1898         };
1899         start_cmd_loop = function () {
1900             if (guard_call) {
1901                 return;
1902             }
1903             guard_call = true;
1904             if (ws_is_opened) {
1905                 if (hcap_cmd_buffer.length > 0) {
1906                     hcapLog(make_log("command_id = " + hcap_cmd_buffer[0].command_id + " sent, ", JSON.parse(hcap_cmd_buffer[0].param_text)));
1907                     ws.send(hcap_cmd_buffer[0].param_text);
1908                     return;
1909                 }
1910             } else {
1911                 initialize_hcap_websocket();
1912             }
1913             guard_call = false;
1914         };
1915         hcap_command = function (command, param) {
1916             if (command === null || command === "" || command === undefined) {
1917                 hcapLog("[ERROR] command should not null or empty string! command === null || command === \"\" || command === undefined");
1918                 return;
1919             }
1920             if (Object.prototype.toString.call(param) === '[object Array]') {
1921                 hcapLog("[ERROR] param should be Object type({})! param is Array. command = " + command);
1922                 return;
1923             }
1924             if (param === null || param === undefined) {
1925                 hcapLog("[ERROR] param should be Object type({})! param === null || param === undefined. command = " + command);
1926                 return;
1927             }
1928 
1929             if (is_ws_off) {
1930                 if (param.onFailure) {
1931                     param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "HCAP WebSocket is not available in this browser"});
1932                 }
1933                 return;
1934             }
1935             if (callback_event_id > 1024) {
1936                 callback_event_id = 0;
1937             } else {
1938                 callback_event_id += 1;
1939             }
1940             var command_id = callback_event_id.toString(),
1941                 param_text = "";
1942             param.command_id = command_id;
1943             param.command = command;
1944             param_text = JSON.stringify(param, null);
1945             hcap_cmd_buffer[hcap_cmd_buffer.length] = {"command_id" : command_id, "param_text" : param_text, "onSuccess" : param.onSuccess, "onFailure" : param.onFailure};
1946             hcapLog(make_log("command_id = " + command_id + " added, ", hcap_cmd_buffer[hcap_cmd_buffer.length - 1]));
1947             start_cmd_loop();
1948         };
1949         if (!is_ws_off) {
1950             setTimeout(start_cmd_loop, 200);
1951         }
1952         /** 
1953          * @namespace hcap.preloadedApplication
1954          */
1955         hcap.preloadedApplication = { };
1956         /**
1957          * Gets the preloaded application list.<br>
1958          * 
1959          * @param {Object} param
1960          * <ul>
1961          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
1962          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1963          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) 
1964          *       // {Array} param.list - preloaded application list supported by TV.
1965          *       //         {String} param.list[].id - preloaded application id (0 ~ 2^64 - 1)
1966          *       //         {String} param.list[].title - preloaded application title
1967          *       //         {String} param.list[].iconFilePath - file path of icon for the preloaded application
1968          *       //                 param.list example - 
1969          *       //                     "list" :  [
1970          *       //                     { "id" : "13324", "title" : "YouTube", "iconFilePath" : "/icon/youtube.png" },
1971          *       //                     { "id" : "15265", "title" : "Facebook", "iconFilePath" : "/icon/facebook.png" }
1972          *       //                     ]
1973          *   }</pre>
1974          *   </li>
1975          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
1976          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
1977          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
1978          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
1979          *   }</pre>
1980          *   </li>
1981          * </ul>
1982          * 
1983          * @since 1.5.0
1984          * 
1985          * @see
1986          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.launchPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
1987          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.destroyPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
1988          *
1989          * @example
1990          * hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList({
1991          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
1992          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
1993          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
1994          *              console.log(
1995          *                  "list[" + i + "].id = " + s.list[i].id +
1996          *                  "list[" + i + "].title = " + s.list[i].title +
1997          *                  "list[" + i + "].iconFilePath = " + s.list[i].iconFilePath
1998          *              );
1999          *          }
2000          *      },
2001          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2002          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2003          *      }
2004          * });
2005          */
2006         hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList = function (param) {
2007             hcap_command("get_preloaded_application_list", param);
2008         };
2009         /**
2010          * Launches a preloaded application.<br>
2011          * Following table specifies preloaded applications, their ids and parameters. (Supported preloaded applications are different according to TV model, but App IDs of preloaded applications should be same)<br> 
2012          * <table border=1 style="border: 1px;">
2013          *     <b><tr><th>Application</th><th>id</th><th>parameters</th></tr></b>
2014          *     <tr><td>3 Cats</td><td>244115188075859005</td><td></td></tr>
2015          *     <tr><td>AccuWeather</td><td>144115188075855876</td><td></td></tr>
2016          *     <tr><td>Amazon</td><td>144115188075859015</td><td></td></tr>
2017          *     <tr><td>Arirang TV</td><td>144115188075859001</td><td></td></tr>
2018          *     <tr><td>AR-Browser</td><td>201604201053010001</td><td>"{'params':{<br>
2019          *                                                            'target':string, // launch url ex) 'http://url.com/adc3f'<br>
2020          *                                                            'noiframe':string // This parameter is required when using 'target'. For security reasons, hotel TV is not allowed to use iframe. 'true': disable iframe, 'false': enable iframe<br>
2021          *                                                        }, 'appDesc':{<br>
2022          *                                                            'resolution':string, // ex) 'resolution':'1920x1080' or 'resolution':'1280x720'<br>
2023          *                                                            'disableBackHistoryAPI':string, // 'true': The BACK key will be passed to CP App, 'false': The BACK key will be handled by webOS system browser for History Back operation<br>
2024          *                                                            'vendorExtension':{'enableKeyboard':string} // 'true': The screen keyboard will be shown up when the input or textarea tag get focus, 'false': disable screen keyboard <br>
2025          *                                                        }}"</td></tr>
2026          *     <tr><td>Balda</td><td>144115188075859004</td><td></td></tr>
2027          *     <tr><td>BBC-iPlayer</td><td>201604021129030008</td><td></td></tr>
2028          *     <tr><td>BBC-Sports</td><td>201609281937030001</td><td></td></tr>
2029          *     <tr><td>BBC-News</td><td>201609281937030002</td><td></td></tr>
2030          *     <tr><td>Bluetooth Sound Sync</td><td>244115188075859015</td><td></td></tr>
2031          *     <tr><td>Browser</td><td>144115188075855877</td><td>"{'params':{<br>
2032          *                                                            'target':string, // url string. default is empty. ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
2033          *                                                            'fullMode':string, // full mode. default is 'false'. 'true' : full page mode, 'false' : general web browser mode<br>
2034          *                                                            'newtab':string // default is 'true'. 'true' : new page is loaded on the new tab, 'false' : new page is loaded on the current tab.<br>
2035          *                                                        }}"</td></tr>
2036          *     <tr><td>Color Bridge</td><td>244115188075859012</td><td></td></tr>
2037          *     <tr><td>Crackle</td><td>144115188075859014</td><td></td></tr>
2038          *     <tr><td>Cutter Pillars</td><td>244115188075859011</td><td></td></tr>
2039          *     <tr><td>External Connector</td><td>244115188075859007</td><td></td></tr>
2040          *     <tr><td>Facebook</td><td>144115188075855874</td><td></td></tr>
2041          *     <tr><td>Google Maps</td><td>144115188075855875</td><td></td></tr>
2042          *     <tr><td>Gravity Ball</td><td>244115188075859009</td><td></td></tr>
2043          *     <tr><td>Hulu</td><td>144115188075859017</td><td></td></tr>
2044          *     <tr><td>K-Browser</td><td>244115188075859021</td><td>"{'params':{<br>
2045          *                                                            'target':string, // launch url ex) 'http://url.com/adc3f'<br>
2046          *                                                            'noiframe':string // This parameter is required when using 'target'. For security reasons, hotel TV is not allowed to use iframe. 'true': disable iframe, 'false': enable iframe<br>
2047          *                                                        }, 'appDesc':{<br>
2048          *                                                            'resolution':string, // ex) 'resolution':'1920x1080' or 'resolution':'1280x720'<br>
2049          *                                                            'disableBackHistoryAPI':string, // 'true': The BACK key will be passed to CP App, 'false': The BACK key will be handled by webOS system browser for History Back operation<br>
2050          *                                                            'vendorExtension':{'enableKeyboard':string} // 'true': The screen keyboard will be shown up when the input or textarea tag get focus, 'false': disable screen keyboard <br>
2051          *                                                        }}"</td></tr>

2057          *                                                            'noiframe':string // This parameter is required when using 'target'. For security reasons, hotel TV is not allowed to use iframe. 'true': disable iframe, 'false': enable iframe<br>
2058          *                                                        }, 'appDesc':{<br>
2059          *                                                            'resolution':string, // ex) 'resolution':'1920x1080' or 'resolution':'1280x720'<br>
2060          *                                                            'disableBackHistoryAPI':string, // 'true': The BACK key will be passed to CP App, 'false': The BACK key will be handled by webOS system browser for History Back operation<br>
2061          *                                                            'vendorExtension':{'enableKeyboard':string} // 'true': The screen keyboard will be shown up when the input or textarea tag get focus, 'false': disable screen keyboard <br>
2062          *                                                        }}"</td></tr>
2063          *     <tr><td>PC Connector</td><td>244115188075859008</td><td></td></tr>
2064          *     <tr><td>Picasa</td><td>144115188075859003</td><td></td></tr>
2065          *     <tr><td>Rhapsody</td><td>144115188075859018</td><td></td></tr>

2070          *     <tr><td>The Associated Press</td><td>144115188075859011</td><td></td></tr>
2071          *     <tr><td>TV Hockey</td><td>244115188075859004</td><td></td></tr>
2072          *     <tr><td>Twitter</td><td>144115188075855873</td><td></td></tr>
2073          *     <tr><td>Ustream</td><td>144115188075859012</td><td></td></tr>
2074          *     <tr><td>vTuner</td><td>144115188075859000</td><td></td></tr>
2075          *     <tr><td>Wasu(TV)</td><td>244115188075859014</td><td></td></tr>
2076          *     <tr><td>Wasu(DRAMA)</td><td>244115188075859016</td><td></td></tr>
2077          *     <tr><td>Wasu(ENTERTAINMENT)</td><td>244115188075859017</td><td></td></tr>
2078          *     <tr><td>Wasu(HD)</td><td>244115188075859018</td><td></td></tr>
2079          *     <tr><td>Wasu(MOVIE)</td><td>244115188075859019</td><td></td></tr>
2080          *     <tr><td>Wasu(SPORTS)</td><td>244115188075859020</td><td></td></tr>
2081          *     <tr><td>YouTube</td><td>144115188075859002</td><td></td></tr>
2082          * </table>
2083          * 
2084          * @param {Object} param
2085          * <ul>
2086          *   <li>{String} param.id - preloaded application id to launch (0 ~ 2^64 - 1).</li>
2087          *   <li>{String} param.parameters [Optional] - parameters in JSON type string for the preloaded application to be launched.</li>
2088          *   <li>{Boolean} param.noSplash [Optional] - Set disable the splash page.</li>
2089          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2090          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2091          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
2092          *       // No Parameter.
2093          *   }</pre>
2094          *   </li>
2095          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2096          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2097          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2098          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2099          *   }</pre>
2100          *   </li>
2101          * </ul>
2102          * 
2103          * @since 1.5.0
2104          * 
2105          * @see
2106          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.getPreloadedApplicationList">hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList()</a><br>
2107          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.destroyPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
2108          *
2109          * @example
2110          * hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication({
2111          *      "id" : "244115188075859022", // NK-Browser
2112          *      "parameters" : "{
2113          *          'params':{'target':'http://www.lge.com'}
2114          *      }",
2115          *      "noSplash" : true,
2116          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
2117          *          console.log("onSuccess");
2118          *      },
2119          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2120          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2121          *      }
2122          * });
2123          */
2124         hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication = function (param) {
2125             hcap_command("launch_preloaded_application", param);
2126         };
2127         /**
2128          * Terminates the preloaded application.<br>
2129          * 
2130          * @param {Object} param
2131          * <ul>
2132          *   <li>{String} param.id - preloaded application id to destroy (0 ~ 2^64 - 1).</li>
2133          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2134          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2135          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
2136          *       // No Parameter.
2137          *   }</pre>
2138          *   </li>
2139          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2140          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2141          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2142          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2143          *   }</pre>
2144          *   </li>
2145          * </ul>
2146          * 
2147          * @since 1.19.0
2148          * 
2149          * @see
2150          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.getPreloadedApplicationList">hcap.preloadedApplication.getPreloadedApplicationList()</a><br>
2151          * <a href="hcap.preloadedApplication.html#.launchPreloadedApplication">hcap.preloadedApplication.launchPreloadedApplication()</a><br>
2152          *
2153          * @example
2154          * hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication({
2155          *      "id" : "15265",
2156          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
2157          *          console.log("onSuccess");
2158          *      },
2159          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2160          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2161          *      }
2162          * });
2163          */
2164         hcap.preloadedApplication.destroyPreloadedApplication = function (param) {
2165             hcap_command("destroy_preloaded_application", param);
2166         };
2167         /** 
2168          * @namespace hcap.application
2169          */
2170         hcap.application = { };
2171         /**
2172          * Gets the LG Service XML Contents.<br>
2173          * 
2174          * @param {Object} param
2175          * <ul>
2176          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2177          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2178          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
2179          *       // {String} param.contents - current LG Service XML Contents.
2180          *   }</pre>
2181          *   </li>
2182          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2183          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2184          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2185          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2186          *   }</pre>
2187          *   </li>
2188          * </ul>
2189          *  
2190          * @since 1.20.1
2191          * 
2192          * @see
2193          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getDefaultServiceXml">hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml()</a><br>
2194          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2195          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2196          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2197          *
2198          * @example
2199          * hcap.application.getServiceXml({
2200          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
2201          *          console.log("onSuccess : service xml = " + s.contents);
2202          *      },
2203          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2204          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2205          *      }
2206          * });
2207          */
2208         hcap.application.getServiceXml = function (param) {
2209             hcap_command("get_service_xml", param);
2210         };
2211         /**
2212          * Gets the Default LG Service XML Contents for restoring preloaded application list.<br>
2213          * This is worked only when the property "asl_mode" is "1".
2214          * 
2215          * @param {Object} param
2216          * <ul>
2217          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2218          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2219          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
2220          *       // {String} param.contents - default LG Service XML Contents.
2221          *   }</pre>
2222          *   </li>
2223          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2224          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2225          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2226          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2227          *   }</pre>
2228          *   </li>
2229          * </ul>
2230          *  
2231          * @since 1.20.1
2232          * 
2233          * @see
2234          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getServiceXml">hcap.application.getServiceXml()</a><br>
2235          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2236          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2237          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2238          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
2239          *
2240          * @example
2241          * hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml({
2242          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
2243          *          console.log("onSuccess : service xml = " + s.contents);
2244          *      },
2245          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2246          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2247          *      }
2248          * });
2249          */
2250         hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml = function (param) {
2251             hcap_command("get_default_service_xml", param);
2252         };
2253         /**
2254          * Gets the application list.<br>
2255          * This is worked only when the property "asl_mode" is "1".
2256          * 
2257          * @param {Object} param
2258          * <ul>
2259          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2260          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2261          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) 
2262          *       // {Array} param.list - application list supported by TV.
2263          *       //         {Boolean} param.list[].valid - true if the application was installed.
2264          *       //         {String} param.list[].title - application title.
2265          *       //         {String} param.list[].appId - application id.
2266          *       //         {Boolean} param.list[].deleted - true if the application was deleted.
2267          *       //         {Boolean} param.list[].visible - true if the application can be shown at the webOS launcher.
2268          *       //         {String} param.list[].version - application version.
2269          *       //         {String} param.list[].iconPath - file path of icon for the application
2270          *       //         {String} param.list[].reason - reason that the application was not installed.
2271          *       //                 param.list example - 
2272          *       //                     "list" :  [
2273          *       //                     { "valid": true, "title": "Web Browser", "appId": "com.webos.app.browser", "deleted": false, "visible": false, "version": "2.0.0", "iconPath" : "/icon/browser.png", "reason" : "" },
2274          *       //                     { "valid": true, "title": "YouTube", "appId": "youtube.leanback.v4", "deleted": false, "visible": false, "version": "1.0.17", "iconPath" : "/icon/youtube.png", "reason" : "" }
2275          *       //                     ]
2276          *   }</pre>
2277          *   </li>
2278          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2279          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2280          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2281          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2282          *   }</pre>
2283          *   </li>
2284          * </ul>
2285          * 
2286          * @since 1.20.1
2287          * 
2288          * @see
2289          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getServiceXml">hcap.application.getServiceXml()</a><br>
2290          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getDefaultServiceXml">hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml()</a><br>
2291          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2292          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2293          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
2294          *
2295          * @example
2296          * hcap.application.getApplicationList({
2297          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
2298          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
2299          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
2300          *              console.log(
2301          *                  "list[" + i + "].valid = " + s.list[i].valid +
2302          *                  "list[" + i + "].title = " + s.list[i].title +
2303          *                  "list[" + i + "].appId = " + s.list[i].appId +
2304          *                  "list[" + i + "].deleted = " + s.list[i].deleted +
2305          *                  "list[" + i + "].visible = " + s.list[i].visible +
2306          *                  "list[" + i + "].version = " + s.list[i].version +
2307          *                  "list[" + i + "].iconPath = " + s.list[i].iconPath +
2308          *                  "list[" + i + "].reason = " + s.list[i].reason
2309          *              );
2310          *          }
2311          *      },
2312          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2313          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2314          *      }
2315          * });
2316          */
2317         hcap.application.getApplicationList = function (param) {
2318             hcap_command("get_application_list", param);
2319         };
2320         /**
2321          * Launches a application.<br>
2322          * This is worked only when the property "asl_mode" is "1".<br>
2323          * Following table specifies applications, their ids and parameters. (Supported applications are different according to TV model, but App IDs of applications should be same)<br> 
2324          * <table border=1 style="border: 1px;">
2325          *     <b><tr><th>Application</th><th>id</th><th>parameters</th></tr></b>
2326          *     <tr><td>AccuWeather</td><td>accuweather</td><td></td></tr>
2327          *     <tr><td>Al Jazeera</td><td>aljazeera</td><td></td></tr>
2328          *     <tr><td>Amazon</td><td>amazon.html</td><td></td></tr>
2329          *     <tr><td>AR Browser</td><td>com.zenith.app.arbrowser</td><td>"{<br>
2330          *                                                            'target':string // launch url ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
2331          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
2332          *     <tr><td>Arirang TV</td><td>arirang.tv</td><td></td></tr>
2333          *     <tr><td>BBC</td><td>bbc</td><td></td></tr>
2334          *     <tr><td>Bluetooth Sound Sync</td><td>com.webos.app.btaudiostreaming</td><td></td></tr>
2335          *     <tr><td>Browser</td><td>com.webos.app.browser</td><td>"{<br>
2336          *                                                            'target':string, // url string. default is empty. ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
2337          *                                                            'fullMode':string, // full mode. default is 'false'. 'true' : full page mode, 'false' : general web browser mode<br>
2338          *                                                            'newtab':string // default is 'true'. 'true' : new page is loaded on the new tab, 'false' : new page is loaded on the current tab.<br>
2339          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
2340          *     <tr><td>Color Bridge</td><td>ru.lgerp.colorbridge</td><td></td></tr>
2341          *     <tr><td>Crackle</td><td>crackle</td><td></td></tr>
2342          *     <tr><td>Cutter Pillars</td><td>ru.lgerp.cutterpillars101</td><td></td></tr>
2343          *     <tr><td>Deezer</td><td>deezer</td><td></td></tr>
2344          *     <tr><td>Dek-d</td><td>dek.d</td><td></td></tr>
2345          *     <tr><td>Demand 5</td><td>demand5</td><td></td></tr>
2346          *     <tr><td>Doonung</td><td>doonung</td><td></td></tr>
2347          *     <tr><td>Euronews</td><td>euronews</td><td></td></tr>

2350          *     <tr><td>Gaiam TV (Yoga TV)</td><td>com.4155984.174234</td><td></td></tr>
2351          *     <tr><td>GMM TV</td><td>gmm.tv</td><td></td></tr>
2352          *     <tr><td>Google Maps</td><td>googlemaps</td><td></td></tr>
2353          *     <tr><td>Gravity Ball</td><td>ru.lgerp.gravityball</td><td></td></tr>
2354          *     <tr><td>HBO Go</td><td>com.3298171.179786</td><td></td></tr>
2355          *     <tr><td>Hulu</td><td>hulu</td><td></td></tr>
2356          *     <tr><td>Icflix</td><td>com.4115297.175561</td><td></td></tr>
2357          *     <tr><td>Iran Tourism</td><td>iran.tourism</td><td></td></tr>
2358          *     <tr><td>K-Browser</td><td>com.zenith.app.hbrowser</td><td>"{<br>
2359          *                                                            'target':string // launch url ex) 'http://url.com/adc3f'<br>
2360          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
2361          *     <tr><td>KrobKruakao3</td><td>kkk</td><td></td></tr>

2365          *     <tr><td>MLB</td><td>mlb</td><td></td></tr>
2366          *     <tr><td>Mobile Connector</td><td>com.webos.app.mobileconnector</td><td></td></tr>
2367          *     <tr><td>Mthai</td><td>mthai</td><td></td></tr>
2368          *     <tr><td>Music</td><td>com.webos.app.music</td><td></td></tr>
2369          *     <tr><td>Nation</td><td>nation</td><td></td></tr>
2370          *     <tr><td>Netflix</td><td>netflix</td><td></td></tr>
2371          *     <tr><td>NK-Browser</td><td>com.zenith.app.gbrowser</td><td>"{<br>
2372          *                                                            'target':string // launch url ex) 'www.lge.com'<br>
2373          *                                                        }"</td></tr>
2374          *     <tr><td>Now TV</td><td>now.tv</td><td></td></tr>
2375          *     <tr><td>NPO</td><td>153996.npouitzendinggemist</td><td></td></tr>
2376          *     <tr><td>Pandora</td><td>com.12465.12351</td><td></td></tr>
2377          *     <tr><td>PC Connector</td><td>com.webos.app.pcconnector</td><td></td></tr>
2378          *     <tr><td>Photo & Video</td><td>com.webos.app.photovideo</td><td></td></tr>
2379          *     <tr><td>Rhapsody</td><td>rhapsody</td><td></td></tr>
2380          *     <tr><td>RTL XL</td><td>rtl</td><td></td></tr>
2381          *     <tr><td>Screen Share</td><td>com.webos.app.miracast</td><td></td></tr>
2382          *     <tr><td>SmartShare</td><td>com.webos.app.smartshare</td><td></td></tr>
2383          *     <tr><td>Spotify</td><td>com.4795741.189428</td><td></td></tr>
2384          *     <tr><td>Tanks</td><td>lgerp.com.tanks</td><td></td></tr>
2385          *     <tr><td>TV Hockey</td><td>lgerp.com.tvhockey</td><td></td></tr>
2386          *     <tr><td>Videoland</td><td>videoland2014</td><td></td></tr>
2387          *     <tr><td>Voice TV</td><td>voice.tv</td><td></td></tr>
2388          *     <tr><td>WoW TV</td><td>wow.tv</td><td></td></tr>
2389          *     <tr><td>YouTube</td><td>youtube.leanback.v4</td><td></td></tr>
2390          *     <tr><td>Yupp TV</td><td>yupptv</td><td></td></tr>
2391          * </table>
2392          * 
2393          * @param {Object} param
2394          * <ul>
2395          *   <li>{String} param.id - application id to launch.</li>
2396          *   <li>{String} param.parameters [Optional] - parameters in JSON type string for the application to be launched.</li>
2397          *   <li>{Boolean} param.noSplash [Optional] - Set disable the splash page.</li>
2398          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2399          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2400          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
2401          *       // No Parameter.
2402          *   }</pre>
2403          *   </li>
2404          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2405          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2406          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2407          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2408          *   }</pre>
2409          *   </li>
2410          * </ul>
2411          * 
2412          * @since 1.20.1
2413          * 
2414          * @see
2415          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getServiceXml">hcap.application.getServiceXml()</a><br>
2416          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getDefaultServiceXml">hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml()</a><br>
2417          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2418          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2419          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
2420          *
2421          * @example
2422          * hcap.application.launchApplication({
2423          *      "id" : "com.zenith.app.gbrowser", // NK-Browser
2424          *      "parameters" : "{
2425          *          'target':'http://www.lge.com'
2426          *      }",
2427          *      "noSplash" : true,
2428          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
2429          *          console.log("onSuccess");
2430          *      },
2431          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2432          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2433          *      }
2434          * });
2435          */
2436         hcap.application.launchApplication = function (param) {
2437             hcap_command("launch_application", param);
2438         };
2439         /**
2440          * Terminates the application.<br>
2441          * This is worked only when the property "asl_mode" is "1".
2442          * 
2443          * @param {Object} param
2444          * <ul>
2445          *   <li>{String} param.id - application id to destroy.</li>
2446          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2447          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2448          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
2449          *       // No Parameter.
2450          *   }</pre>
2451          *   </li>
2452          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2453          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2454          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2455          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2456          *   }</pre>
2457          *   </li>
2458          * </ul>
2459          * 
2460          * @since 1.20.1
2461          * 
2462          * @see
2463          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getServiceXml">hcap.application.getServiceXml()</a><br>
2464          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getDefaultServiceXml">hcap.application.getDefaultServiceXml()</a><br>
2465          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2466          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2467          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getProperty">hcap.property.getProperty()</a><br>
2468          *
2469          * @example
2470          * hcap.application.destroyApplication({
2471          *      "id" : "accuweather",
2472          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
2473          *          console.log("onSuccess");
2474          *      },
2475          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2476          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2477          *      }
2478          * });
2479          */
2480         hcap.application.destroyApplication = function (param) {
2481             hcap_command("destroy_application", param);
2482         };
2483 		/**
2484          * Install the applications.<br>
2485          * 
2486          * @param {Object} param
2487          * <ul>
2488          *   <li>{Array} param.AppList [Required] - {String} applications id to install.</li>
2489          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2490          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2491          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
2492          *       // No Parameter.
2493          *   }</pre>
2494          *   </li>
2495          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2496          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2497          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2498          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2499          *   }</pre>
2500          *   </li>
2501          * </ul>
2502          * 
2503          * @since 1.24.6
2504          * 
2505          * @see
2506          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2507          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.removeApplications">hcap.application.removeApplications()</a><br>
2508          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2509          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2510          *
2511          * @example
2512          * hcap.application.installApplications({
2513          *      "AppList" : ["com.ru.lgerp.mainstream", "ru.lgerp.gravityball"],
2514          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
2515          *          console.log("onSuccess");
2516          *      },
2517          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2518          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2519          *      }
2520          * });
2521          */
2522         hcap.application.installApplications = function (param) {
2523             hcap_command("install_applications", param);
2524         };
2525 		/**
2526          * Uninstall the applications.<br>
2527          * 
2528          * @param {Object} param
2529          * <ul>
2530          *   <li>{Array} param.AppList [Required] - {String} applications id to uninstall.</li>
2531          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2532          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2533          *   param.onSuccess = function() 
2534          *       // No Parameter.
2535          *   }</pre>
2536          *   </li>
2537          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2538          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2539          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
2540          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
2541          *   }</pre>
2542          *   </li>
2543          * </ul>
2544          * 
2545          * @since 1.24.6
2546          * 
2547          * @see
2548          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.getApplicationList">hcap.application.getApplicationList()</a><br>
2549          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.installApplications">hcap.application.installApplications()</a><br>
2550          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.launchApplication">hcap.application.launchApplication()</a><br>
2551          * <a href="hcap.application.html#.destroyApplication">hcap.application.destroyApplication()</a><br>
2552          *
2553          * @example
2554          * hcap.application.removeApplications({
2555          *      "AppList" : ["com.ru.lgerp.mainstream", "ru.lgerp.gravityball"],
2556          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
2557          *          console.log("onSuccess");
2558          *      },
2559          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
2560          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
2561          *      }
2562          * });
2563          */
2564         hcap.application.removeApplications = function (param) {
2565             hcap_command("remove_applications", param);
2566         };
2567         hcap.application.RegisterSIApplicationList = function (param) {
2568             hcap_command("register_si_app_list", param);
2569         };
2570         /** 
2571          * @namespace hcap.video
2572          */
2573         hcap.video = { };
2574         /**
2575          * Gets the current video size.<br>
2576          * Position and size parameters are on the basis of the resolution of the property "display_resolution".<br>
2577          * 
2578          * @param {Object} param
2579          * <ul>
2580          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
2581          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2582          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
2583          *       // {Number} param.x - x position of the video
2584          *       // {Number} param.y - y position of the video
2585          *       // {Number} param.width - width of the video
2586          *       // {Number} param.height - height of the video
2587          *   }</pre>
2588          *   </li>
2589          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
2590          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
2591          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
