4180          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4181          *   }</pre>
4182          *   </li>
4183          * </ul>
4184          * 
4185          * @since 1.3.1
4186          * 
4187          * @see
4188          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4189          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4190          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.replayCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.replayCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4191          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.stopCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.stopCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4192          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getDataChannel">hcap.channel.getDataChannel()</a><br>
4193          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getChannelMap">hcap.channel.getChannelMap()</a><br>
4194          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getStartChannel">hcap.channel.getStartChannel()</a><br>
4195          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setStartChannel">hcap.channel.setStartChannel()</a><br>
4196          * <a href="_global_.html#event:channel_changed">{Event} channel_changed</a><br>
4197          */
4198         hcap.channel.getDataChannel = function (param) {
4199             hcap_command("get_data_channel", param);
4200         };
4201          /**
4202          * Gets information of the channel
4203          * which is registered in the shortcut.
4204          * 
4205          * @example
4206          * hcap.channel.getChannelMap({
4207          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4208          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
4209          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
4210          *              console.log(
4211          *                  "[" + i + "].img_url2 = " + s.list[i].img_url2 +
4212          *                  "[" + i + "].img_url = " + s.list[i].img_url +
4213          *                  "[" + i + "].short_cut = " + s.list[i].short_cut +
4214          *                  "[" + i + "].channel_type = " + s.list[i].channel_type +
4215          *                  "[" + i + "].channel_mode_id = " + s.list[i].channel_mode_id +
4216          *                  "[" + i + "].channel_number = " + s.list[i].channel_number +
4217          *                  "[" + i + "].channel_name = " + s.list[i].channel_name
4218          *              );
4219          *          }
4220          *      },
4221          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4222          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4223          *      }
4224          * });
4225          * 
4226          * @param {Object} param
4227          * <ul>
4228          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4229          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4230          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4231          *       // {Array} param.list - list for the channel information registered in the shortcut.
4232          *       //         {String} param.list[].img_url2 - logo image url2 of the channel
4233          *       //         {String} param.list[].img_url - logo image url of the channel
4234          *       //         {String} param.list[].short_cut - shortcut number (1~12) 
4235          *       //         {String} param.list[].channel_type - name of the channel type ex) atellite BS
4236          *       //         {String} param.list[].channel_mode_id - channel mode id which is number 0~6
4237          *       //         {String} param.list[].channel_number - number of the channel ex)101
4238          *       //         {String} param.list[].channel_name - channel type and number ex) BS 101
4239          *   }</pre>
4240          *   </li>
4241          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4242          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4243          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4244          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4245          *   }</pre>
4246          *   </li>
4247          * </ul>
4248          * 
4249          * @since 1.23.2
4250          * 
4251          * @see
4252          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4253          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4254          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.replayCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.replayCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4255          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.stopCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.stopCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4256          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getDataChannel">hcap.channel.getDataChannel()</a><br>
4257          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getChannelMap">hcap.channel.getChannelMap()</a><br>
4258          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getStartChannel">hcap.channel.getStartChannel()</a><br>
4259          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setStartChannel">hcap.channel.setStartChannel()</a><br>
4260          * <a href="_global_.html#event:channel_changed">{Event} channel_changed</a><br>
4261          */
4262         hcap.channel.getChannelMap = function (param) {
4263             hcap_command("get_channel_map", param);
4264         };
4265         /**
4266          * Gets the start channel information which is the channel displayed 
4267          * at first when TV is turned on.<br> 
4268          * This API is very similar to <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a>. 
4269          * For detailed information, such as example and related information, please refer to 
4270          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>.
4271          * 
4272          * @example
4273          * hcap.channel.getStartChannel({
4274          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4275          *          console.log("onSuccess :" + 
4276          *              "\n channel type      : " + s.channelType     +
4277          *              "\n logical number    : " + s.logicalNumber   +
4278          *              "\n frequency         : " + s.frequency       +
4279          *              "\n program number    : " + s.programNumber   +
4280          *              "\n major number      : " + s.majorNumber     +
4281          *              "\n minor number      : " + s.minorNumber     +
4282          *              "\n satellite ID      : " + s.satelliteId     +
4283          *              "\n polarization      : " + s.polarization    +
4284          *              "\n rf broadcast type : " + s.rfBroadcastType +
4285          *              "\n ip                : " + s.ip              +
4286          *              "\n port              : " + s.port            +
4287          *              "\n ip broadcast type : " + s.ipBroadcastType +
4288          *              "\n symbol rate       : " + s.symbolRate      +
4289          *              "\n pcr pid           : " + s.pcrPid          +
4290          *              "\n video pid         : " + s.videoPid        +
4291          *              "\n video stream type : " + s.videoStreamType +
4292          *              "\n audio pid         : " + s.audioPid        +
4293          *              "\n audio stream type : " + s.audioStreamType +
4294          *              "\n signal strength   : " + s.signalStrength  +
4295          *              "\n source address    : " + s.sourceAddress);
4296          *      }, 
4297          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4298          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4299          *      }
4300          * });
4301          * 
4302          * @param {Object} param
4303          * <ul>
4304          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4305          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4306          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4307          *       // see the <a href="../symbols/hcap.channel.html#.CHANNEL_PROPERTY">{ Channel Properties }</a> in <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>.
4308          *   }</pre>
4309          *   </li>
4310          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4311          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4312          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4313          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4314          *   }</pre>
4315          *   </li>
4316          * </ul>
4317          * 
4318          * @since 1.3.1
4319          * 
4320          * @see
4321          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4322          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4323          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.replayCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.replayCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4324          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.stopCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.stopCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4325          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getDataChannel">hcap.channel.getDataChannel()</a><br>
4326          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getChannelMap">hcap.channel.getChannelMap()</a><br>
4327          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getStartChannel">hcap.channel.getStartChannel()</a><br>
4328          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setStartChannel">hcap.channel.setStartChannel()</a><br>
4329          * <a href="_global_.html#event:channel_changed">{Event} channel_changed</a><br>
4330          */
4331         hcap.channel.getStartChannel = function (param) {
4332             hcap_command("get_start_channel", param);
4333         };
4334         /**
4335          * Sets the start channel which is displayed at first when TV is turned on.
4336          * 
4337          * This API is very 
4338          * similar to <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>, 
4339          * but in this case, just update the start channel setting without channel change.
4340          * 
4341          * For detailed information, such as example and related information, please refer to 
4342          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a>.
4343          * 
4344          * @example
4345          * // set start channel with RF channel class 2
4346          * hcap.channel.setStartChannel({
4347          *      "channelType" : hcap.channel.ChannelType.RF, 
4348          *      "frequency" : 63000000, 
4349          *      "programNumber" : 1, 
4350          *      "rfBroadcastType" : hcap.channel.RfBroadcastType.TERRESTRIAL, 
4351          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4352          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4353          *      }, 
4354          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4355          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4356          *      }
4357          * });
4358          * 
4359          * @param {Object} param
4360          * <ul>
4361          *   <li><a href="../symbols/hcap.channel.html#.CHANNEL_PROPERTY">{ Channel Properties } [Required] - Channel Information</a></li>
4362          *   <br>If you want to set off start channel, set param.channelType to hcap.channel.ChannelType.UNKNOWN.
4363          *   </li>
4364          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.<br>
4365          *            Setting to the same channel as before will invoke this callback function.
4366          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4367          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4368          *       // No Parameter.
4369          *   }</pre>
4370          *   </li>
4371          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4372          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4373          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4374          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4375          *   }</pre>
4376          *   </li>
4377          * </ul>
4378          * 
4379          * @since 1.3.1
4380          * 
4381          * @see
4382          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.requestChangeCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.requestChangeCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4383          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4384          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.replayCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.replayCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4385          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.stopCurrentChannel">hcap.channel.stopCurrentChannel()</a><br>
4386          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getDataChannel">hcap.channel.getDataChannel()</a><br>
4387          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getChannelMap">hcap.channel.getChannelMap()</a><br>
4388          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getStartChannel">hcap.channel.getStartChannel()</a><br>
4389          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setStartChannel">hcap.channel.setStartChannel()</a><br>
4390          * <a href="_global_.html#event:channel_changed">{Event} channel_changed</a><br>
4391          */
4392         hcap.channel.setStartChannel = function (param) {
4393             hcap_command("set_start_channel", param);
4394         };
4395         /**
4396          * Gets the list of supported audio languages in the current channel.<br>
4397          * Audio language list is composed of language codes and delimiter comma(',').<br>
4398          * Application can get/set audio language of the current channel by index of the audio language list.<br><br>
4399          * If there is no audio language list of the current channel, only "xx" is returned as the audio language list.<br>
4400          * And "xx" could be returned as an audio language if the audio language is not mapped to an audio language code.<br>
4401          * Since version 1.24.2, audio languages with "_AD" appended to the original value(ex: pt_AD) are provided for the visually impaired. [EU Only]<br>
4402          * 
4403          * <div align=center>
4404          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4405          *   <thead>
4406          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4407          *   </thead>
4408          *   <tbody>
4409          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
4410          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
4411          *   </tbody>
4412          *   <tfoot>
4413          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
4414          *   </tfoot>
4415          * </table>
4416          * </div>
4417          * If the application wants to set the audio language to French ('fr'), use the index '2'.<br>
4418          * 
4419          * @param {Object} param
4420          * <ul>
4421          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4422          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4423          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4424          *       // {String} param.list - audio language list string 
4425          *       //     which is composed of language codes separated by delimiter comma(',').
4426          *   }</pre>
4427          *   </li>
4428          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4429          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4430          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4431          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4432          *   }</pre>
4433          *   </li>
4434          * </ul>
4435          * 
4436          * @since 1.3.1
4437          * 
4438          * @see
4439          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4440          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4441          *
4442          * @example
4443          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList({
4444          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4445          *          console.log("onSuccess : list = " + s.list);
4446          *      }, 
4447          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4448          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4449          *      }
4450          * });
4451          */
4452         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList = function (param) {
4453             hcap_command("get_current_channel_audio_language_list", param);
4454         };
4455         /**
4456          * Gets the audio language index of the current channel.<br>
4457          * If application wants to map the index to audio language code, then it can get the audio language list of the current channel by 
4458          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList()</a>. 
4459          * 
4460          * <div align=center>
4461          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4462          *   <thead>
4463          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4464          *   </thead>
4465          *   <tbody>
4466          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
4467          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
4468          *   </tbody>
4469          *   <tfoot>
4470          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
4471          *   </tfoot>
4472          * </table>
4473          * </div>
4474          *
4475          * @param {Object} param
4476          * <ul>
4477          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4478          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4479          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4480          *       // {Number} param.index - audio language index of the current channel.
4481          *   }</pre>
4482          *   </li>
4483          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4484          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4485          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4486          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4487          *   }</pre>
4488          *   </li>
4489          * </ul>
4490          * 
4491          * @since 1.3.1
4492          * 
4493          * @see
4494          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList()</a><br>
4495          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4496          *
4497          * @example
4498          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex({
4499          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4500          *          console.log("onSuccess : index = " + s.index);
4501          *      }, 
4502          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4503          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4504          *      }
4505          * });
4506          */
4507         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex = function (param) {
4508             hcap_command("get_current_channel_audio_language_index", param);
4509         };
4510         /**
4511          * Sets the audio language of the current channel.<br>
4512          * 
4513          * <div align=center>
4514          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4515          *   <thead>
4516          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4517          *   </thead>
4518          *   <tbody>
4519          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
4520          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
4521          *   </tbody>
4522          *   <tfoot>
4523          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
4524          *   </tfoot>
4525          * </table>
4526          * </div>
4527          * 
4528          * @param {Object} param
4529          * <ul>
4530          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - audio language index to be set. Index starts with 0.</li>
4531          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4532          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4533          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4534          *       // No Parameter.
4535          *   }</pre>
4536          *   </li>
4537          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
4538          *            Setting to the same audio language index as before will invoke this callback function.
4539          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4540          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4541          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4542          *   }</pre>
4543          *   </li>
4544          * </ul>
4545          * 
4546          * @since 1.3.1
4547          * 
4548          * @see
4549          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageList()</a><br>
4550          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex()</a><br>
4551          *
4552          * @example
4553          * hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex({
4554          *      "index" : 1, 
4555          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4556          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4557          *      }, 
4558          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4559          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4560          *      }
4561          * });
4562          */
4563         hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelAudioLanguageIndex = function (param) {
4564             hcap_command("set_current_channel_audio_language_index", param);
4565         };
4566         /**
4567          * Gets supported subtitle list of the current channel. <br>
4568          * Subtitle list is composed of subtitle setting values and delimiter comma(','). <br>
4569          * Application can get/set subtitle setting of the current channel by index of the subtitle list.<br>
4570          * "xx" for which no subtitle is displayed, can be returned as a subtitle setting if the subtitle is not mapped to an available system subtitle.<br>
4571          * And "off" can be returned as a subtitle setting to turn off the subtitle.<br>
4572          * If there is no subtitle list of the current channel, only "off" is returned as the subtitle list.<br>
4573          * Since version 1.24.2, subtitles with "_HOH" appended to the original value(ex: sq_HOH) are provided for the hearing impaired. [EU Only]<br>
4574          * 
4575          * <div align=center>
4576          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4577          *   <thead>
4578          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4579          *   </thead>
4580          *   <tbody>
4581          *     <tr class="odd"><th>Subtitle List</th><td>off,en,ko,fr,en,xx,eng</td></tr>
4582          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6</td></tr>
4583          *   </tbody>
4584          *   <tfoot>
4585          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Subtitle List & Index Example</td></tr>
4586          *   </tfoot>
4587          * </table>
4588          * </div>
4589          * If the application wants to set the subtitle to French ('fr'), use the index value '3'.</a>
4590          * 
4591          * @param {Object} param
4592          * <ul>
4593          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4594          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4595          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4596          *       // {String} param.list - subtitle list string 
4597          *       //     which is composed of subtitle setting values and delimiter comma(',').
4598          *   }</pre>
4599          *   </li>
4600          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4601          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4602          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4603          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4604          *   }</pre>
4605          *   </li>
4606          * </ul>
4607          * 
4608          * @since 1.3.1
4609          * 
4610          * @see
4611          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4612          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4613          *
4614          * @example
4615          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList({
4616          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4617          *          console.log("onSuccess : list = " + s.list);
4618          *      }, 
4619          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4620          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4621          *      }
4622          * });
4623          */
4624         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList = function (param) {
4625             hcap_command("get_current_channel_subtitle_language_list", param);
4626         };
4627         /**
4628          * Gets the subtitle index of the current channel. 
4629          * If application wants to map the index to subtitle setting value, get subtitle list of the current channel by 
4630          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList()</a>.
4631          *
4632          * <div align=center>
4633          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4634          *   <thead>
4635          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4636          *   </thead>
4637          *   <tbody>
4638          *     <tr class="odd"><th>Subtitle List</th><td>off,en,ko,fr,en,xx,eng</td></tr>
4639          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6</td></tr>
4640          *   </tbody>
4641          *   <tfoot>
4642          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Subtitle List & Index Example</td></tr>
4643          *   </tfoot>
4644          * </table>
4645          * </div>
4646          *
4647          * @param {Object} param
4648          * <ul>
4649          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4650          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4651          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4652          *       // {Number} param.index - subtitle setting index of the current channel.
4653          *   }</pre>
4654          *   </li>
4655          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4656          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4657          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4658          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4659          *   }</pre>
4660          *   </li>
4661          * </ul>
4662          * 
4663          * @since 1.3.1
4664          * 
4665          * @see
4666          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList()</a><br>
4667          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4668          *
4669          * @example
4670          * hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex({
4671          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4672          *          console.log("onSuccess : index = " + s.index);
4673          *      }, 
4674          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4675          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4676          *      }
4677          * });
4678          */
4679         hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex = function (param) {
4680             hcap_command("get_current_channel_subtitle_language_index", param);
4681         };
4682         /**
4683          * Sets the subtitle index of the current channel.<br>
4684          * 
4685          * <div align=center>
4686          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
4687          *   <thead>
4688          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
4689          *   </thead>
4690          *   <tbody>
4691          *     <tr class="odd"><th>Subtitle List</th><td>off,en,ko,fr,en,xx,eng</td></tr>
4692          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6</td></tr>
4693          *   </tbody>
4694          *   <tfoot>
4695          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Subtitle List & Index Example</td></tr>
4696          *   </tfoot>
4697          * </table>
4698          * </div>
4699          * 
4700          * If the application wants to set the subtitle to French ('fr'), use the index value '3'</a>.
4701          *
4702          * @param {Object} param
4703          * <ul>
4704          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - subtitle setting index to be set. Index starts with 0.</li>
4705          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4706          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4707          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4708          *       // No Parameter.
4709          *   }</pre>
4710          *   </li>
4711          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
4712          *            Setting to the same subtitle index as before will invoke this callback function. 
4713          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4714          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4715          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4716          *   }</pre>
4717          *   </li>
4718          * </ul>
4719          * 
4720          * @since 1.3.1
4721          * 
4722          * @see
4723          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleList()</a><br>
4724          * <a href="hcap.channel.html#.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex">hcap.channel.getCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex()</a><br>
4725          *
4726          * @example
4727          * hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex({
4728          *      "index" : 1, 
4729          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4730          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4731          *      }, 
4732          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4733          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4734          *      }
4735          * });
4736          */
4737         hcap.channel.setCurrentChannelSubtitleIndex = function (param) {
4738             hcap_command("set_current_channel_subtitle_language_index", param);
4739         };
4740         /**
4741          * Gets the information about the current program and the next program in the current channel.
4742          *
4743          * @param {Object} param
4744          * <ul>
4745          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4746          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4747          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4748          *       // {String} param.currentProgram.title - title of the current program.
4749          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.year - year of the start time of the current program.
4750          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.month - month of the start time of the current program.
4751          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.day - day of the start time of the current program.
4752          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.hour - hour of the start time of the current program.
4753          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.minute - minute of the start time of the current program.
4754          *       // {Number} param.currentProgram.startTime.second - second of the start time of the current program.
4755          *       // {String} param.currentProgram.lengthInSeconds - length of the current program in seconds. (0 ~ 2^32 - 1)
4756          *       // {String} param.nextProgram.title - title of the next program.
4757          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.year - year of the start time of the next program.
4758          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.month - month of the start time of the next program.
4759          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.day - day of the start time of the next program.
4760          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.hour - hour of the start time of the next program.
4761          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.minute - minute of the start time of the next program.
4762          *       // {Number} param.nextProgram.startTime.second - second of the start time of the next program.
4763          *       // {String} param.nextProgram.lengthInSeconds - length of the next program in seconds. (0 ~ 2^32 - 1)
4764          *   }</pre>
4765          *   </li>
4766          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4767          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4768          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4769          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4770          *   }</pre>
4771          *   </li>
4772          * </ul>
4773          * 
4774          * @since 1.5.0
4775          *
4776          * @example
4777          * hcap.channel.getProgramInfo({
4778          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4779          *          console.log("onSuccess :" + 
4780          *              "\n currentProgram title = " + s.currentProgram.title +
4781          *              "\n currentProgram startTime = " + s.currentProgram.startTime.year + 
4782          *                      "-" + s.currentProgram.startTime.month +
4783          *                      "-" + s.currentProgram.startTime.day +
4784          *                      " " + s.currentProgram.startTime.hour +
4785          *                      " : " + s.currentProgram.startTime.minute +
4786          *                      " : " + s.currentProgram.startTime.second +
4787          *              "\n currentProgram length = " + s.currentProgram.lengthInSeconds + "second(s)" +
4788          *              "\n nextProgram title = " + s.nextProgram.title +
4789          *              "\n nextProgram startTime = " + s.nextProgram.startTime.year + 
4790          *                      "-" + s.nextProgram.startTime.month +
4791          *                      "-" + s.nextProgram.startTime.day +
4792          *                      " " + s.nextProgram.startTime.hour +
4793          *                      " : " + s.nextProgram.startTime.minute +
4794          *                      " : " + s.nextProgram.startTime.second +
4795          *              "\n nextProgram length = " + s.nextProgram.lengthInSeconds + "second(s)");
4796          *      }, 
4797          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4798          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4799          *      }
4800          * });
4801          */
4802         hcap.channel.getProgramInfo = function (param) {
4803             hcap_command("get_program_info", param);
4804         };
4805         /**
4806          * Launch the application of the inband data service type in the current channel.
4807          *
4808          * @param {Object} param
4809          * <ul>
4810          *   <li>{Number} param.inband_data_service_type [Required] - inband data service type to launch at the current channel.</li>
4811          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4812          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4813          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
4814          *       // No Parameter.
4815          *   }</pre>
4816          *   </li>
4817          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function. 
4818          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4819          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4820          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4821          *   }</pre>
4822          *   </li>
4823          * </ul>
4824          * 
4825          * @since 1.6.0
4826          *
4827          * @see
4828          * <a href="_global_.html#event:inband_data_service_ready">{Event} inband_data_service_ready</a><br>
4829          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHP">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHP</a><br>
4830          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHEG">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHEG</a><br>
4831          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.HBBTV">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV</a><br>
4832          *
4833          * @example
4834          * hcap.channel.launchInbandDataService({
4835          *      "inband_data_service_type" : hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV,
4836          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
4837          *          console.log("onSuccess");
4838          *      }, 
4839          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4840          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4841          *      }
4842          * });
4843          */
4844         hcap.channel.launchInbandDataService = function (param) {
4845             hcap_command("launch_inband_data_service", param);
4846         };
4847         /**
4848          * Get the available inband data service in the current channel.
4849          *
4850          * @param {Object} param
4851          * <ul>
4852          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4853          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4854          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4855          *       // {Number} param.availableDataServiceType - available data service type in the current channel. If there is no available data service, hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.NONE will be returned.
4856          *   }</pre>
4857          *   </li>
4858          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function. 
4859          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4860          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4861          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4862          *   }</pre>
4863          *   </li>
4864          * </ul>
4865          * 
4866          * @since 1.8.0
4867          *
4868          * @see
4869          * <a href="_global_.html#event:inband_data_service_ready">{Event} inband_data_service_ready</a><br>
4870          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHP">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHP</a><br>
4871          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.MHEG">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHEG</a><br>
4872          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.HBBTV">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV</a><br>
4873          * <a href="hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.html#.NONE">hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.NONE</a><br>
4874          *
4875          * @example
4876          * hcap.channel.getReadyInbandDataService({
4877          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4878          *          var serviceType = "UNKNOWN";
4879          *          switch(s.availableDataServiceType) {
4880          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHP: serviceType = "MHP"; break;
4881          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.MHEG: serviceType = "MHEG"; break;
4882          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.HBBTV: serviceType = "HBBTV"; break;
4883          *          case hcap.channel.InbandDataServiceType.NONE: serviceType = "NONE"; break;
4884          *          default: serviceType = "UNKNOWN"; break;
4885          *          }
4886          *          console.log("onSuccess : available data service type = " + serviceType);
4887          *      }, 
4888          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4889          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4890          *      }
4891          * });
4892          */
4893         hcap.channel.getReadyInbandDataService = function (param) {
4894             hcap_command("get_ready_inband_data_service", param);
4895         };
4896         /**
4897          * Gets the channel signal status.
4898          * 
4899          * @example
4900          * hcap.channel.getChannelSignalStatus({
4901          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4902          *          console.log("onSuccess  :" + 
4903          *              "\n snr value       : " + s.snrValue       +
4904          *              "\n frequency       : " + s.frequency      +
4905          *              "\n signal level    : " + s.signalLevel    +              
4906          *              "\n modulation mode : " + s.modulationMode +
4907          *              "\n lock status     : " + s.lockStatus);
4908          *      }, 
4909          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
4910          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4911          *      }
4912          * });
4913          * @param {Object} param
4914          * <ul>
4915          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4916          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4917          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4918          *       // {Number} param.snrValue - snr value(dB).
4919          *       // {Number} param.frequency - current frequency(KHz).
4920          *       // {Number} param.signalLevel - signal level(%).
4921          *       // {String} param.modulationMode - modulation mode.
4922          *       // {Boolean} param.lockStatus - lock status.
4923          *   }</pre>
4924          *   </li>
4925          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4926          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4927          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4928          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4929          *   }</pre>
4930          *   </li>
4931          * </ul>
4932          * 
4933          * @since 1.19.2
4934          */
4935         hcap.channel.getChannelSignalStatus = function (param) {
4936             hcap_command("get_channel_signal_status", param);
4937         };
4938         /**
4939          * Gets the list of the LG Channels.
4940          * 
4941          * @example
4942          * hcap.channel.getLGChannelList({
4943          *     "onSuccess" : function(s) {
4944          *         console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
4945          *         for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
4946          *             console.log(
4947          *                 "[" + i + "].channelCode = " + s.list[i].channelCode +
4948          *                 ", [" + i + "].majorNumber = " + s.list[i].majorNumber 
4949          *             );
4950          *         }
4951          *     },
4952          *     "onFailure" : function(f) {
4953          *         console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
4954          *     }
4955          * });
4956          * @param {Object} param
4957          * <ul>
4958          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
4959          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4960          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
4961          *       // {Array} param.list - list of the LG Channels
4962          *       //         {String} param.list[].channelCode - unique ID of the LG Channel
4963          *       //         {String} param.list[].majorNumber - major number
4964          *   }</pre>
4965          *   </li>
4966          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
4967          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
4968          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
4969          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
4970          *   }</pre>
4971          *   </li>
4972          * </ul>
4973          * 
4974          * @since 1.24.8
4975          */
4976         hcap.channel.getLGChannelList = function (param) {
4977             hcap_command("get_lg_channel_list", param);
4978         };
4979         /**
4980          * @namespace hcap.externalinput
4981          */
4982         hcap.externalinput = {};
4983         /**
4984          * @namespace hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType
4985          */
4986         hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType = {
4987             /**
4988              * External Input Type List TV
4989              * @since 1.3.1
4990              * @constant
4991              */
4992             TV                : 1,
4993             /**
4994              * External Input Type List Composite
4995              * @since 1.3.1
4996              * @constant
4997              */
4998             COMPOSITE         : 2,
4999             /**
5000              * External Input Type List S-Video
5001              * @since 1.3.1
5002              * @constant
5003              */
5004             SVIDEO            : 3,
5005             /**
5006              * External Input Type List Component
5007              * @since 1.3.1
5008              * @constant
5009              */
5010             COMPONENT         : 4,
5011             /**
5012              * External Input Type List RGB
5013              * @since 1.3.1
5014              * @constant
5015              */
5016             RGB               : 5,
5017             /**
5018              * External Input Type List HDMI
5019              * @since 1.3.1
5020              * @constant
5021              */
5022             HDMI              : 6,
5023             /**
5024              * External Input Type List SCART
5025              * @since 1.3.1
5026              * @constant
5027              */
5028             SCART             : 7,
5029             /**
5030              * External Input Type List USB(MEDIA)
5031              * @since 1.24.9
5032              * @constant
5033              */
5034             USB               : 8,
5035             /**
5036              * External Input Type List Others
5037              * @since 1.3.1
5038              * @constant
5039              */
5040             OTHERS            : 9
5041         };
5042         /**
5043          * Gets the current Audio/Video source type and index. Types and indexes of input sources depend on the H/W Spec.
5044          * Following table specifies Audio & Video source type.<br>
5045          * 
5046          * <div align=center id=".EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">
5047          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=600>
5048          *   <thead>
5049          *     <tr>
5050          *     <th>Source Type</th>
5051          *     <th>Value</th>
5052          *     </tr>
5053          *   </thead>
5054          *   <tbody>
5055          *     <tr class="odd"><td>TV       </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a></td></tr>
5056          *     <tr            ><td>Composite</td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a></td></tr>
5057          *     <tr class="odd"><td>S-Video  </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a></td></tr>
5058          *     <tr            ><td>Component</td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a></td></tr>
5059          *     <tr class="odd"><td>RGB      </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a></td></tr>
5060          *     <tr            ><td>HDMI     </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a></td></tr>
5061          *     <tr class="odd"><td>SCART    </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a></td></tr>
5062          *     <tr            ><td>OTHERS   </td><td class="left"><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a></td></tr>
5063          *   </tbody>
5064          *   <tfoot>
5065          *     <tr><th colspan="2">External Input Type List List</td></tr>
5066          *   </tfoot>
5067          * </table>
5068          * </div>
5069          * 
5070          * Following table shows the multiple index for the same type of Audio & Video source.<br>
5071          * <div align=center>
5072          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=600>
5073          *   <thead>
5074          *     <tr>
5075          *     <th>Device Input</th>
5076          *     <th>External Input Type List</th>
5077          *     <th>Source Index</th>
5078          *     </tr>
5079          *   </thead>
5080          *   <tbody>
5081          *     <tr class="odd"><td>1st HDMI   </td><td><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a></td><td>0</td></tr>
5082          *     <tr>            <td>2nd HDMI   </td><td><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a></td><td>1</td></tr>
5083          *     <tr class="odd"><td>1st S-Video</td><td><a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><td>0</td></tr>
5084          *   </tbody>
5085          *   <tfoot>
5086          *     <tr><th colspan="3">Example of Multiple Index</td></tr>
5087          *   </tfoot>
5088          * </table>
5089          * </div>
5090          *
5091          * @param {Object} param
5092          * <ul>
5093          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5094          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5095          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5096          *       // {Number} param.type - external Input Type List.
5097          *       // {Number} param.index - index of source. Index value starts with 0. 
5098          *       //     Max value of source index depends on the H/W Spec
5099          *   }</pre>
5100          *   </li>
5101          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5102          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5103          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5104          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5105          *   }</pre>
5106          *   </li>
5107          * </ul>
5108          * 
5109          * @see
5110          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
5111          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.setCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
5112          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.isExternalInputConnected">hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected()</a><br>
5113          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getExternalInputList">hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList()</a><br>
5114          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
5115          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
5116          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
5117          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
5118          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
5119          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
5120          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
5121          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
5122          * 
5123          * @since 1.3.1
5124          * 
5125          * @example
5126          * hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput({
5127          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5128          *          console.log("onSuccess :" + 
5129          *              "\n type = " + s.type +
5130          *              "\n index = " + s.index);
5131          *      }, 
5132          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5133          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5134          *      }
5135          * });
5136          */
5137         hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput = function (param) {
5138             hcap_command("get_external_input", param);
5139         };
5140         /**
5141          * Changes the current Audio & Video source type and index.<br>
5142          * For the external input type list, refer to <a href="../symbols/hcap.externalinput.html#.EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">{ external input type list }</a>.<br>
5143          * 
5144          * @param {Object} param
5145          * <ul>
5146          *   <li>{Number} param.type [Required] - audio/Video source type.</li>
5147          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - index of source type. Index value starts with 0.</li>
5148          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5149          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5150          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5151          *       // No parameter.
5152          *   }</pre>
5153          *   </li>
5154          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
5155          *           Setting to same audio/video source type and index will invoke this callback function.
5156          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5157          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5158          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5159          *   }</pre>
5160          *   </li>
5161          * </ul>
5162          * 
5163          * @see
5164          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
5165          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
5166          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.isExternalInputConnected">hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected()</a><br>
5167          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getExternalInputList">hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList()</a><br>
5168          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
5169          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
5170          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
5171          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
5172          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
5173          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
5174          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
5175          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
5176          * 
5177          * @since 1.3.1
5178          * 
5179          * @example
5180          * hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput({
5181          *      "type" : hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI,
5182          *      "index" : 1, 
5183          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5184          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5185          *      }, 
5186          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5187          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5188          *      }
5189          * });
5190          */
5191         hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput = function (param) {
5192             hcap_command("set_external_input", param);
5193         };
5194         /**
5195          * Checks if the Audio/Video input signal is connected to RGB or HDMI, or if the cable is connected to other input sources.<br>
5196          * Types and indexes of input sources depend on the H/W Spec.<br><br>
5197          * For the external input type list, refer to <a href="../symbols/hcap.externalinput.html#.EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">{ external input type list }</a>.<br>
5198          *
5199          * @param {Object} param
5200          * <ul>
5201          *   <li>{Number} param.type [Required] - external input type.</li>
5202          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - index of source type. Index value starts with 0.</li>
5203          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5204          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5205          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5206          *       // {Boolean} param.isConnected -  true if the signal of RGB or HDMI was connected,
5207          *       //     or the cable of other input sources was connected; otherwise false.
5208          *   }</pre>
5209          *   </li>
5210          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5211          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5212          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5213          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5214          *   }</pre>
5215          *   </li>
5216          * </ul>
5217          * 
5218          * @see
5219          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
5220          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
5221          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.setCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
5222          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getExternalInputList">hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList()</a><br>
5223          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
5224          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
5225          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
5226          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
5227          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
5228          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
5229          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
5230          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
5231          * 
5232          * @since 1.3.1
5233          * 
5234          * @example
5235          * // this examples shows how to check that the 1st RGB input is connected.
5236          * hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected({
5237          *      "type" : hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB,
5238          *      "index" : 0,
5239          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5240          *          console.log("onSuccess : isConnected = " + s.isConnected);
5241          *      }, 
5242          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5243          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5244          *      }
5245          * });
5246          */
5247         hcap.externalinput.isExternalInputConnected = function (param) {
5248             hcap_command("check_external_input_connected", param);
5249         };
5250         /**
5251          * Gets the physically supported external input list.<br>
5252          *
5253          * @param {Object} param
5254          * <ul>
5255          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5256          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5257          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5258          *       // {Array} param.list - external input list supported by TV
5259          *       //         {Number} param.list[].type - external input type (refer to <a href="../symbols/hcap.externalinput.html#.EXTERNAL_INPUT_TYPE_LIST">external input type</a>)
5260          *       //         {Number} param.list[].index - external input index in the external input type
5261          *       //         {String} param.list[].name - OsdName of external input type (HDMI-CEC Only)
5262          *   }</pre>
5263          *   </li>
5264          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5265          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5266          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5267          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5268          *   }</pre>
5269          *   </li>
5270          * </ul>
5271          * 
5272          * @see
5273          * <a href="_global_.html#event:external_input_changed">{Event} external_input_changed</a><br>
5274          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.getCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.getCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
5275          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.html#.setCurrentExternalInput">hcap.externalinput.setCurrentExternalInput()</a><br>
5276          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.TV">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.TV</a><br>
5277          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPOSITE">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPOSITE</a><br>
5278          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SVIDEO">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SVIDEO</a><br>
5279          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.COMPONENT">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.COMPONENT</a><br>
5280          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.RGB">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.RGB</a><br>
5281          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.HDMI">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.HDMI</a><br>
5282          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.SCART">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.SCART</a><br>
5283          * <a href="hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.html#.OTHERS">hcap.externalinput.ExternalInputType.OTHERS</a><br>
5284          * 
5285          * @since 1.20
5286          * 
5287          * @example
5288          * hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList({
5289          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5290          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
5291          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
5292          *              console.log("(" + s.list[i].type + "," + s.list[i].index + "," + s.list[i].name + ")");
5293          *          }
5294          *      },
5295          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5296          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5297          *      }
5298          * });
5299          */
5300         hcap.externalinput.getExternalInputList = function (param) {
5301             hcap_command("get_external_input_list", param);
5302         };
5303         /**
5304          * @namespace hcap.carousel
5305          */
5306         hcap.carousel = {};
5307         /**
5308          * Requests to cache the carousel data file for the given url. The carousel data will be cached internally.<br>
5309          * When the carousel data is cached, application will received the <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>.
5310          * <br><br>
5311          * The carousel data can be broadcasted in two ways. <br>
5312          * One is through RF channel and the other is through IP multicast channel.<br>
5313          *
5314          * @param {Object} param
5315          * <ul>
5316          *   <li>{String} param.url [Required] - carousel data url. <br>The format should be "hcap://[frequency (Hz, and MHz for satellite)].[program number].[component tag]/[path]/[content name]".<br>
5317          *                                       frequency 1 means Pro:Centric server same as data channel of RF frequency or IP multicast address.</li>
5318          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5319          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5320          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5321          *       // No Parameter.
5322          *   }</pre>
5323          *   </li>
5324          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5325          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5326          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5327          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5328          *   }</pre>
5329          *   </li>
5330          * </ul>
5331          * 
5332          * @see
5333          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.isCarouselDataCached">hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached()</a><br>
5334          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.clearCarouselDataCache">hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache()</a><br>
5335          * <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>
5336          * 
5337          * @since 1.3.1
5338          * 
5339          * @example
5340          * // Request to cache xait.xml from data channel (frequency : 1 for both RF and IP multicast) with program number 1 and component tag 1.
5341          * hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData({
5342          *      "url" : "hcap://1.1.1/xait.xml",
5343          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5344          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5345          *      }, 
5346          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5347          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5348          *      }
5349          * });
5350          *
5351          * @example
5352          * // Request to cache xait.xml from the channel (frequency : 513MHz) with program number 1 and component tag 1.
5353          * hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData({
5354          *      "url" : "hcap://513000000.1.1/xait.xml",
5355          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5356          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5357          *      }, 
5358          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5359          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5360          *      }
5361          * });
5362          */
5363         hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData = function (param) {
5364             hcap_command("request_content", param);
5365         };
5366         /**
5367          * Checks if the carousel data is cached or not.
5368          *
5369          * @param {Object} param
5370          * <ul>
5371          *   <li>{String} param.url [Required] - carousel data url to check.</li>
5372          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5373          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5374          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5375          *       // {String} param.cachePath - cached url path if carousel data is cached. Empty string ("") if not.
5376          *   }</pre>
5377          *   </li>
5378          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5379          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5380          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5381          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5382          *   }</pre>
5383          *   </li>
5384          * </ul>
5385          * 
5386          * @see
5387          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.requestCacheCarouselData">hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData()</a><br>
5388          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.clearCarouselDataCache">hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache()</a><br>
5389          * <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>
5390          * 
5391          * @since 1.3.1
5392          * 
5393          * @example
5394          * hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached({
5395          *      "url" : "hcap://1.1.1/xait.xml",
5396          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5397          *          console.log("onSuccess : cachePath = " + s.cachePath);
5398          *      }, 
5399          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5400          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5401          *      }
5402          * });
5403          */
5404         hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached = function (param) {
5405             hcap_command("is_content_loaded", param);
5406         };
5407         /**
5408          * Clear the cache storage for the carousel data. All carousel cache will be deleted.
5409          *
5410          * @param {Object} param
5411          * <ul>
5412          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5413          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5414          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5415          *       // No Parameter.
5416          *   }</pre>
5417          *   </li>
5418          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5419          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5420          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5421          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5422          *   }</pre>
5423          *   </li>
5424          * </ul>
5425          * 
5426          * @since 1.3.1
5427          * 
5428          * @see
5429          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.requestCacheCarouselData">hcap.carousel.requestCacheCarouselData()</a><br>
5430          * <a href="hcap.carousel.html#.isCarouselDataCached">hcap.carousel.isCarouselDataCached()</a><br>
5431          * <a href="_global_.html#event:carousel_data_cached">{Event} carousel_data_cached</a>
5432          *
5433          * @example
5434          * hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache({
5435          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5436          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5437          *      }, 
5438          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5439          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5440          *      }
5441          * });
5442          */
5443         hcap.carousel.clearCarouselDataCache = function (param) {
5444             hcap_command("clear_content_cache", param);
5445         };
5446         /**
5447          * @namespace hcap.mpi
5448          */
5449         hcap.mpi = {};
5450         /**
5451          * Sends the vendor specific data using the MPI card and receives the reply data.
5452          *
5453          * @param {Object} param
5454          * <ul>
5455          *   <li>{Number} param.id [Required] - request ID that is defined between application and headend. (0 ~ 255)</li>
5456          *   <li>{Number} param.sequence [Required] - sequence number of the packet. (0 ~ 255).</li>
5457          *   <li>{String} param.packet [Required] - packet data to the MPI card. (0 ~ 32).
5458          *   The packet format is character array. For example param.packet = "ABC0x123"; </li>          
5459          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5460          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5461          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5462          *       // {String} param.packet - received packet data (length < 32) from MPI card. 
5463          *       //     If failed to get the data, then the packet will be empty string "".
5464          *   }</pre>
5465          *   </li>
5466          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5467          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5468          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5469          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5470          *   }</pre>
5471          *   </li>
5472          * </ul>
5473          * 
5474          * @since 1.3.1
5475          * 
5476          * @see
5477          * <a href="hcap.mpi.html#.sendMpiData">hcap.mpi.sendMpiData()</a>
5478          * 
5479          * @example
5480          * hcap.mpi.sendAndReceiveMpiData({
5481          *      "id" : 0,
5482          *      "sequence" : 0,
5483          *      "packet" : "ABC0x123",         
5484          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5485          *          console.log("onSuccess return packet " + s.packet);
5486          *      }, 
5487          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5488          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5489          *      }
5490          * });
5491          */
5492         hcap.mpi.sendAndReceiveMpiData = function (param) {
5493             hcap_command("send_and_receive_mpi_data", param);
5494         };
5495         /**
5496          * Sends the vendor specific data to the MPI card<br>
5497          * The MPI data will be received by <a href="_global_.html#event:mpi_data_received">{Event} mpi_data_received</a>.
5498          *
5499          * @param {Object} param
5500          * <ul>
5501          *   <li>{Number} param.id [Required] - request ID that is defined between application and headend. (0 ~ 255)</li>
5502          *   <li>{Number} param.sequence [Required] - sequence number of the packet. (0 ~ 255).</li>
5503          *   <li>{String} param.packet [Required] - packet data to the MPI card. (0 ~ 32).
5504          *   The packet format is character array. For example param.packet = "ABC0x123"; </li>          
5505          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5506          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5507          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
5508          *       // No Parameter.
5509          *   }</pre>
5510          *   </li>
5511          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5512          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5513          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5514          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5515          *   }</pre>
5516          *   </li>
5517          * </ul>
5518          *  
5519          * @since 1.3.1
5520          * 
5521          * @see
5522          * <a href="hcap.mpi.html#.sendAndReceiveMpiData">hcap.mpi.sendAndReceiveMpiData()</a><br>
5523          * <a href="_global_.html#event:mpi_data_received">{Event} mpi_data_received</a>
5524          *
5525          * @example
5526          * hcap.mpi.sendMpiData({
5527          *      "id" : 0,
5528          *      "sequence" : 0,
5529          *      "packet" : "ABC0x123",
5530          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
5531          *          console.log("onSuccess");
5532          *      }, 
5533          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5534          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5535          *      }
5536          * });
5537          */
5538         hcap.mpi.sendMpiData = function (param) {
5539             hcap_command("send_mpi_data", param);
5540         };
5541         /**
5542          * Gets the MPI cable status from the MPI card.<br>
5543          * The MPI cable status is received by <a href="_global_.html#event:mpi_cable_status_changed">{Event} mpi_cable_status_changed</a>.
5544          *
5545          * @param {Object} param
5546          * <ul>
5547          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5548          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5549          *   param.onSuccess = function(param) {
5550          *       // {Boolean} param.connected - The MPI cable status from MPI card.
5551          *   }</pre>
5552          *   </li>
5553          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5554          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5555          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5556          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5557          *   }</pre>
5558          *   </li>
5559          * </ul>
5560          *  
5561          * @since 1.24.12
5562          * 
5563          * @see
5564          * <a href="_global_.html#event:mpi_cable_status_changed">{Event} mpi_cable_status_changed</a>
5565          *
5566          * @example
5567          * hcap.mpi.getMpiInfo({
5568          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
5569          *          console.log("onSuccess "+ s.connected);
5570          *      }, 
5571          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
5572          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
5573          *      }
5574          * });
5575          */
5576         hcap.mpi.getMpiInfo = function (param) {
5577             hcap_command("get_mpi_info", param);
5578         };
5579         /**
5580          * @namespace hcap.power
5581          */
5582         hcap.power = {};
5583         /**
5584          * @namespace hcap.power.PowerMode
5585          */
5586         hcap.power.PowerMode = {
5587             /**
5588              * TV seems to be turned off to user(panel is off), but both micom and chipset are on.
5589              * @since 1.3.1
5590              * @constant
5591              */
5592             WARM             : 2,
5593             /**
5594              * This is normal TV-on status to user(panel is on). Both micom and chipset are on.
5595              * @since 1.3.1
5596              * @constant
5597              */
5598             NORMAL           : 1
5599         };
5600         /**
5601          * Gets the power mode of the TV.
5602          *
5603          * @param {Object} param
5604          * <ul>
5605          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
5606          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5607          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
5608          *       // {Number} param.mode - power mode of the TV.
5609          *   }</pre>
5610          *   </li>
5611          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
5612          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
5613          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
5614          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
5615          *   }</pre>
5616          *   </li>
5617          * </ul>
5618          *
