11594              * Set to 0 to disable. Set to the RF channel number for the Data Channel of the Pro:Centric server. (0 ~ 135, 253, 255)
11595              * @since 1.22.0
11596              * @constant
11597              */
11598             DATA_CHANNEL : 119,
11599             /**
11600              * Sets the hour for Wake On RF. The value �뜝�럥�맶�뜝�럥吏쀥뜝�럩援�128�뜝�럥�맶�뜝�럥吏쀥뜝�럩援� is displayed as �뜝�럥�맶�뜝�럥�쑋占쎈쇀占쎈츞F.�뜝�럥�맶�뜝�럥吏쀥뜝�럩援� Directly entering 128 turns the Wake On RF feature OFF. (0 ~ 23, 128)
11601              * @since 1.22.0
11602              * @constant
11603              */
11604             UPDATE_TIME_HR : 121,
11605             /**
11606              * Sets the minute for Wake On RF. (0 ~ 59, 255)
11607              * @since 1.22.0
11608              * @constant
11609              */
11610             UPDATE_TIME_MN : 122
11611         };
11612         /**
11613          * Gets the current value of installer menu item.
11614          * 
11615          * @param {Object} param
11616          * <ul>
11617          *   <li>{Number} param.key [Required] - installer menu item type. Please refer to <a href="hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.html">hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem</a>.</li>
11618          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11619          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11620          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
11621          *       // {Number} param.value - installer menu item value of the requested type. Please refer to <a href="hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.html">hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem</a>.
11622          *   }</pre>
11623          *   </li>
11624          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11625          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11626          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11627          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11628          *   }</pre>
11629          *   </li>
11630          * </ul>
11631          * 
11632          * @see
11633          * <a href="hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.html">hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem</a><br>
11634          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.setInstallerMenuItem">hcap.property.setInstallerMenuItem()</a><br>
11635          * 
11636          * @since 1.22.0
11637          * 
11638          * @example
11639          * hcap.property.getInstallerMenuItem({
11640          *      "key" : hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.INSTALLER_SEQ,
11641          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
11642          *          console.log("onSuccess : property value = " + s.value);
11643          *      }, 
11644          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11645          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11646          *      }
11647          * });
11648          */
11649         hcap.property.getInstallerMenuItem = function (param) {
11650             hcap_command("get_installer_menu_item", param);
11651         };
11652         /**
11653          * Sets the installer menu item value.
11654          * 
11655          * @param {Object} param
11656          * <ul>
11657          *   <li>{Number} param.key [Required] - installer menu item type. Please refer to <a href="hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.html">hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem</a>.</li>
11658          *   <li>{Number} param.value [Required] - picture property value of the requested type. Please refer to <a href="hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.html">hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem</a>.</li>
11659          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
11660          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11661          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11662          *       // No Parameter.
11663          *   }</pre>
11664          *   </li>
11665          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11666          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11667          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11668          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11669          *   }</pre>
11670          *   </li>
11671          * </ul>
11672          * 
11673          * @see
11674          * <a href="hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.html">hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem</a><br>
11675          * <a href="hcap.property.html#.getInstallerMenuItem">hcap.property.getInstallerMenuItem()</a><br>
11676          * 
11677          * @since 1.22.0
11678          * 
11679          * @example
11680          * hcap.property.setInstallerMenuItem({
11681          *      "key" : hcap.property.InstallerMenuItem.INSTALLER_SEQ,
11682          *      "value" : 1,
11683          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11684          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11685          *      }, 
11686          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11687          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11688          *      }
11689          * });
11690          */
11691         hcap.property.setInstallerMenuItem = function (param) {
11692             hcap_command("set_installer_menu_item", param);
11693         };
11694         /**
11695          * @namespace hcap.Media
11696          */
11697         /**
11698          * Interface for displaying and controlling the playback of media on the TV.
11699          * This class is not to be constructed directly (by user code).
11700          * hcap.Media has a change of status as follows.
11701          * <br><image src="./image/media_status.jpg">
11702          * @class
11703          * @see
11704          * <a href="hcap.html#.createMedia">hcap.Media.createMedia()</a><br>
11705          */
11706         hcap.Media = function () {};
11707         /**
11708          * Starts up media channel which is one of input source on TV. So you should call this method before making hcap.Media object.
11709          * And you should call hcap.Media.shutDown() after invoking hcap.Media.destroy() for finalizing media channel.
11710          * 
11711          * @param {Object} param 
11712          * <ul>
11713          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. <br>
11714          *   If a media channel starts up, this callback function will be invoked.
11715          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11716          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11717          *       // No parameter.
11718          *   }</pre>
11719          *   </li>
11720          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11721          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11722          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11723          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11724          *   }</pre>
11725          *   </li>
11726          * </ul>
11727          *
11728          *
11729          *
11730          * @since 1.8
11731          *
11732          * @see
11733          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#.shutDown">hcap.Media.shutDown()</a><br>
11734          * 
11735          * @example
11736          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11737          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11738          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11739          *      }, 
11740          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11741          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11742          *      }
11743          * });
11744          */
11745         hcap.Media.startUp = function (param) {
11746             hcap_command("media_startup", param);
11747         };
11748         /**
11749          * Shuts down media channel. 
11750          * You should call hcap.Media.shutDown() after invoking hcap.Media.destroy() if there is no more need to use media player. 
11751          * After this method is invoked, TV input will be changed to last configuration without any notification.
11752          * 
11753          * @param {Object} param 
11754          * <ul>
11755          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. <br>
11756          *   If a media channel shuts down, this callback function will be invoked.
11757          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11758          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11759          *       // No parameter.
11760          *   }</pre>
11761          *   </li>
11762          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11763          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11764          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11765          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11766          *   }</pre>
11767          *   </li>
11768          * </ul>
11769          *
11770          *
11771          * @since 1.8
11772          *
11773          * @see
11774          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#.startUp">hcap.Media.startUp()</a><br>
11775          * 
11776          * @example
11777          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11778          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11779          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11780          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11781          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11782          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4"
11783          *          });
11784          *          media.play({
11785          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11786          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11787          *                  media.stop({
11788          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
11789          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
11790          *                          media.destroy({
11791          *                              "onSuccess" : function() {
11792          *                                  console.log("onSuccess");
11793          *                                  hcap.Media.shutDown({
11794          *                                      "onSuccess" : function() {
11795          *                                          console.log("onSuccess");
11796          *                                      }, 
11797          *                                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11798          *                                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11799          *                                      }
11800          *                                  });
11801          *                              }, 
11802          *                              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11803          *                                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11804          *                              }
11805          *                          });
11806          *                      },
11807          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11808          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11809          *                      }
11810          *                  });
11811          *              }, 
11812          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11813          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11814          *              }
11815          *          });
11816          *      },
11817          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11818          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11819          *      }
11820          * });
11821          */
11822         hcap.Media.shutDown = function (param) {
11823             hcap_command("media_shutdown", param);
11824         };
11825         /**
11826          * Create Media object.
11827          * The Media object provides the ability to play back video files and stream on a device.
11828          * <br/>
11829          * If an object is passed to the settings parameter, the function should try to initialize the internal
11830          * media player with the provided settings. If successful, the function should return an instance of
11831          * hcap.Media with a standardized interface for the internal media player. If the functions fails
11832          * to instantiate the internal media player to a playable state for any reason (such as media not found 
11833          * or supported, or only one media player supported at a time), then the function should return null.<br/>
11834          * <br/>
11835          * If no object is passed to the settings parameter, then the function should return the last
11836          * non-destroyed hcap.Media instance, or null if there are no active media players.<br/>
11837          *
11838          * @param {Object} param 
11839          * <ul>
11840          *   <li>{String} param.url [Required] - media url. As of API, the following protocols should be accepted.</li>
11841          * <div align=center>
11842          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
11843          *   <thead><tr><th>url</th></tr></thead>
11844          *   <tbody>
11845          *     <tr class="odd"><th class="odd">RTSP - (rtsp://1.2.3.4:554/video.mp4)</th></tr>
11846          *     <tr><th>HTTP - (http://lge.com/movie.mp4)</th></tr>
11847          *     <tr class="odd"><th class="odd">FILE - (file:///tmp/usb/usb1/example.mp4)</th></tr>
11848          *   </tbody>
11849          * </table>
11850          * </div>
11851          *   <li>{String} param.mimeType [Required] - video mime type. please refer to table below.</li>
11852          * <div align=center>
11853          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
11854          *   <thead><tr><th>mimeType</th></tr></thead>
11855          *   <tbody>
11856          *       <tr class="odd"><th>'audio/x-ms-wma'</th></tr>
11857          *       <tr><th>'audio/mpeg'</th></tr>
11858          *       <tr class="odd"><th>'audio/mp3'</th></tr>
11859          *       <tr><th>'video/mp4'</th></tr>
11860          *       <tr class="odd"><th>'video/mpeg4'</th></tr>
11861          *       <tr><th>'video/x-m4v'</th></tr>
11862          *       <tr class="odd"><th>'video/mpeg'</th></tr>
11863          *       <tr><th>'video/x-ms-wmv'</th></tr>
11864          *       <tr class="odd"><th>'video/x-ms-asf'</th></tr>
11865          *       <tr><th>'video/x-msvideo'</th></tr>
11866          *       <tr class="odd"><th>'video/x-flv'</th></tr>
11867          *       <tr><th>'application/x-mpegURL' (HTTP supports only)</th></tr>
11868          *   </tbody>
11869          * </table>
11870          * </div>
11871          * <li>{String} param.subtitleUrl [Optional] - subtitle url. As of API, the following protocols should be accepted.</li>
11872          * <div align=center>
11873          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
11874          *   <thead><tr><th>subtitleUrl</th></tr></thead>
11875          *   <tbody>
11876          *     <tr class="odd"><th class="odd">HTTP - (http://lge.com/movie.smi)</th></tr>
11877          *   </tbody>
11878          * </table>
11879          * </div>
11880          * </ul>
11881          *
11882          * @return {Object} hcap.Media
11883          *
11884          * @since 1.3.1
11885          *
11886          * @see
11887          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#play">hcap.Media.play()</a><br>
11888          * 
11889          * @example
11890          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11891          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11892          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11893          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11894          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11895          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4",
11896          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11897          *          });
11898          *      },
11899          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11900          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11901          *      }
11902          * });
11903          */
11904         hcap.Media.createMedia = function (param) {
11905             if (param === null) {
11906                 return media_object;
11907             }
11908             if (media_object === null && param.url !== null && param.mimeType !== null) {
11909                 media_object = new hcap.Media();
11910                 hcap_command("media_create_media", param);
11911                 return media_object;
11912             }
11913             return null;
11914         };
11915         /**
11916          * Starts playing a media file or stream.
11917          * If the media file starts to play, then 'play_start' event will be invoked.
11918          * @param {Object} param 
11919          * <ul>
11920          *   <li>{Number} param.repeatCount [Optional] - repeat count. Default setting value is 1. If you want to play a media stream in infinite loop, set 0. </li>
11921          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. <br>
11922          *   If a media is played already, this callback function will be invoked.
11923          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11924          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11925          *       // No parameter.
11926          *   }</pre>
11927          *   </li>
11928          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11929          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11930          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11931          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11932          *   }</pre>
11933          *   </li>
11934          * </ul>
11935          *
11936          * @since 1.3.1
11937          * @since 1.8 repeatCount
11938          *
11939          * @see
11940          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#stop">hcap.Media.stop()</a><br>
11941          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#pause">hcap.Media.pause()</a><br>
11942          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#resume">hcap.Media.resume()</a><br>     
11943          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#destroy">hcap.Media.destroy()</a><br>        
11944          *  <a href="_global_.html#event:media_event_received">media_event_received</a><br>
11945          * @example
11946          * hcap.Media.startUp({
11947          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
11948          *          console.log("onSuccess");
11949          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
11950          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
11951          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
11952          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
11953          *          });
11954          *          media.play({
11955          *              "repeatCount" : 2,
11956          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
11957          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
11958          *              }, 
11959          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
11960          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11961          *              }
11962          *          });
11963          *      },
11964          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
11965          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
11966          *      }
11967          * });
11968          */
11969         hcap.Media.prototype.play = function (param) {
11970             if (media_object === null) {
11971                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
11972                 return;
11973             }
11974             hcap_command("media_play", param);
11975         };
11976         /**
11977          * Pause the media playback.
11978          *
11979          * @param {Object} param 
11980          * <ul>
11981          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. <br>
11982          *   If a media is paused already, this callback function will be invoked.
11983          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11984          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
11985          *       // No parameter.
11986          *   }</pre>
11987          *   </li>
11988          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
11989          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
11990          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
11991          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
11992          *   }</pre>
11993          *   </li>
11994          * </ul>
11995          *
11996          * @since 1.3.1
11997          *
11998          * @see
11999          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#play">hcap.Media.play()</a><br>
12000          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#resume">hcap.Media.resume()</a><br> 
12001          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#stop">hcap.Media.stop()</a><br>    
12002          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#destroy">hcap.Media.destroy()</a><br>        
12003          * 
12004          * @example
12005          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12006          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12007          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12008          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12009          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12010          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12011          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12012          *          });
12013          *          media.play({
12014          *              "repeatCount" : 2,
12015          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12016          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12017          *                  media.pause({
12018          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12019          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
12020          *                      },
12021          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12022          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12023          *                      }
12024          *                  });
12025          *              }, 
12026          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12027          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12028          *              }
12029          *          });
12030          *      },
12031          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12032          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12033          *      }
12034          * });
12035          */
12036         hcap.Media.prototype.pause = function (param) {
12037             if (media_object === null) {
12038                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12039                 return;
12040             }
12041             hcap_command("media_pause", param);
12042         };
12043         /**
12044          * Resume the media playback.
12045          *
12046          * @param {Object} param 
12047          * <ul>
12048          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. <br>
12049          *   If a media is resumed already, this callback function will be invoked.
12050          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12051          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12052          *       // No parameter.
12053          *   }</pre>
12054          *   </li>
12055          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12056          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12057          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12058          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12059          *   }</pre>
12060          *   </li>
12061          * </ul>
12062          *
12063          * @since 1.3.1
12064          *
12065          * @see
12066          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#play">hcap.Media.play()</a><br>
12067          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#stop">hcap.Media.stop()</a><br>
12068          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#pause">hcap.Media.pause()</a><br>
12069          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#destroy">hcap.Media.destroy()</a><br>        
12070          * 
12071          * @example
12072          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12073          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12074          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12075          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12076          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12077          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12078          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12079          *          });
12080          *          media.play({
12081          *              "repeatCount" : 2,
12082          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12083          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12084          *                  media.pause({
12085          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12086          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
12087          *                          media.resume({
12088          *                              "onSuccess" : function() {
12089          *                                  console.log("onSuccess");
12090          *                              },
12091          *                              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12092          *                                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12093          *                              }
12094          *                          });
12095          *                      },
12096          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12097          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12098          *                      }
12099          *                  });
12100          *              }, 
12101          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12102          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12103          *              }
12104          *          });
12105          *      },
12106          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12107          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12108          *      }
12109          * });
12110          */
12111         hcap.Media.prototype.resume = function (param) {
12112             if (media_object === null) {
12113                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12114                 return;
12115             }
12116             hcap_command("media_resume", param);
12117         };
12118         /**
12119          * Stops the media playback.
12120          *
12121          * @param {Object} param 
12122          * <ul>
12123          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. <br>
12124          *   If a media is stopped already, this callback function will be invoked.
12125          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12126          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12127          *       // No parameter.
12128          *   }</pre>
12129          *   </li>
12130          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12131          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12132          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12133          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12134          *   }</pre>
12135          *   </li>
12136          * </ul>
12137          *
12138          * @since 1.3.1
12139          *
12140          * @see
12141          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#play">hcap.Media.play()</a><br>
12142          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#pause">hcap.Media.pause()</a><br>
12143          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#resume">hcap.Media.resume()</a><br>     
12144          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#destroy">hcap.Media.destroy()</a><br>    
12145          * 
12146          * @example
12147          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12148          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12149          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12150          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12151          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12152          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12153          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12154          *          });
12155          *          media.play({
12156          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12157          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12158          *                  media.stop({
12159          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12160          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
12161          *                      },
12162          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12163          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12164          *                      }
12165          *                  });
12166          *              }, 
12167          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12168          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12169          *              }
12170          *          });
12171          *      },
12172          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12173          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12174          *      }
12175          * });
12176          */
12177         hcap.Media.prototype.stop = function (param) {
12178             if (media_object === null) {
12179                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12180                 return;
12181             }
12182             hcap_command("media_stop", param);
12183         };
12184         /**
12185          * Destroy the media playback. If you want to request channel change during playback then you should destroy media object.
12186          * Before destorying the media, please check the current media status is the stop.
12187          * If the media status is not the stop, please call hcap.Media.stop() and then call hcap.Media.destroy().
12188          *
12189          * @param {Object} param 
12190          * <ul>
12191          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function. <br>
12192          *   If a media is destroyed already, this callback function will be invoked.
12193          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12194          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12195          *       // No parameter.
12196          *   }</pre>
12197          *   </li>
12198          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12199          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12200          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12201          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12202          *   }</pre>
12203          *   </li>
12204          * </ul>
12205          *
12206          * @since 1.3.1
12207          *
12208          * @see
12209          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#play">hcap.Media.play()</a><br>
12210          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#pause">hcap.Media.pause()</a><br>
12211          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#resume">hcap.Media.resume()</a><br>     
12212          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#stop">hcap.Media.stop()</a><br>    
12213          * 
12214          * @example
12215          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12216          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12217          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12218          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12219          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12220          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4"
12221          *          });
12222          *          media.play({
12223          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12224          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12225          *                  media.stop({
12226          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12227          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
12228          *                          media.destroy({
12229          *                              "onSuccess" : function() {
12230          *                                  console.log("onSuccess");
12231          *                                  hcap.Media.shutDown({
12232          *                                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12233          *                                          console.log("onSuccess");
12234          *                                      }, 
12235          *                                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12236          *                                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12237          *                                      }
12238          *                                  });
12239          *                              }, 
12240          *                              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12241          *                                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12242          *                              }
12243          *                          });
12244          *                      },
12245          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12246          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12247          *                      }
12248          *                  });
12249          *              }, 
12250          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12251          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12252          *              }
12253          *          });
12254          *      },
12255          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12256          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12257          *      }
12258          * });
12259          */
12260         hcap.Media.prototype.destroy = function (param) {
12261             if (media_object === null) {
12262                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12263                 return;
12264             }
12265             hcap_command("media_destroy", param);
12266             media_object = null;
12267         };
12268         /**
12269          * Gets information of media. For example, the title of the currently loaded media.
12270          *
12271          * @param {Object} param 
12272          * <ul>
12273          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12274          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12275          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12276          *       // {Boolean} param.videoAvailable - whether the video is available.
12277          *       // {String} param.title - a human readable title of the current media. 
12278          *       //     If the title is undetermined, this method returns null.
12279          *       // {Number} param.contentLengthInMs - length (in milliseconds) of the media.  
12280          *       //     If the length is infinite/indeterminable, then this method returns null.
12281          *   }</pre>
12282          *   </li>
12283          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12284          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12285          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12286          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12287          *   }</pre>
12288          *   </li>
12289          * </ul>
12290          *
12291          * @since 1.3.1
12292          *
12293          * 
12294          * @example
12295          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12296          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12297          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12298          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12299          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12300          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12301          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12302          *          });
12303          *          media.play({
12304          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12305          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12306          *                  media.getInformation({
12307          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12308          *                          console.log("onSuccess" +
12309          *                              "\nvideoAvailable = " + s.videoAvailable +
12310          *                              "\ntitle = " + s.title +
12311          *                              "\ncontentLengthInMs = " + s.contentLengthInMs);
12312          *                      },
12313          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12314          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12315          *                      }
12316          *                  });
12317          *              }, 
12318          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12319          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12320          *              }
12321          *          });
12322          *      },
12323          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12324          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12325          *      }
12326          * });
12327          */
12328         hcap.Media.prototype.getInformation = function (param) {
12329             if (media_object === null) {
12330                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12331                 return;
12332             }
12333             hcap_command("media_get_information", param);
12334         };
12335         /**
12336          * Gets the position (in milliseconds) in the media that the player is currently at. 
12337          * If th length of the media is infinite/indeterminable, this function returns the number of milliseconds the player has been playing the media. The default position, before the video has been played, is 0 (unless override by the position setting).
12338          *
12339          * @param {Object} param 
12340          * <ul>
12341          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12342          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12343          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12344          *       // {Number} param.positionInMs - number of milliseconds the player is into the media
12345          *   }</pre>
12346          *   </li>
12347          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12348          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12349          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12350          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12351          *   }</pre>
12352          *   </li>
12353          * </ul>
12354          *
12355          * @since 1.3.1
12356          *
12357          * @see
12358          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setPlayPosition">hcap.Media.setPlayPosition()</a><br>
12359          * 
12360          * @example
12361          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12362          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12363          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12364          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12365          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12366          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12367          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12368          *          });
12369          *          media.play({
12370          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12371          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12372          *                  media.getPlayPosition({
12373          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12374          *                          console.log("onSuccess position : " + s.positionInMs);
12375          *                      },
12376          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12377          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12378          *                      }
12379          *                  });
12380          *              }, 
12381          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12382          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12383          *              }
12384          *          });
12385          *      },
12386          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12387          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12388          *      }
12389          * });
12390          */
12391         hcap.Media.prototype.getPlayPosition = function (param) {
12392             if (media_object === null) {
12393                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12394                 return;
12395             }
12396             hcap_command("media_get_play_position", param);
12397         };
12398         /**
12399          * Sets the position of the player at which to continue playing the media at.
12400          * The 'seek_done' event will notify the result of this call. 
12401          * If you want to use this method continuously, you should check to receive the "seek_done" event before the next invocation.
12402          *
12403          * @param {Object} param 
12404          * <ul>
12405          *   <li>{Number} param.positionInMs [Required] - number of milliseconds from the start of the media the player should play from </li>
12406          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12407          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12408          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12409          *       // No parameter.
12410          *   }</pre>
12411          *   </li>
12412          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12413          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12414          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12415          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12416          *   }</pre>
12417          *   </li>
12418          * </ul>
12419          *
12420          * @since 1.3.1
12421          *
12422          * @see
12423          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getPlayPosition">hcap.Media.getPlayPosition()</a><br>
12424          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#play">hcap.Media.play()</a><br>    
12425          * 
12426          * @example
12427          * 
12428          * var media = null;
12429          * document.addEventListener(
12430          *      "media_event_received",
12431          *      function (param) {
12432          *          // {String} param.eventType - changed event type
12433          *          console.log("event type = " + param.eventType);
12434          *          if (param.eventType === 'seek_done') {
12435          *              console.log("success about media.setPlayPosition ");
12436          *          } else if (param.eventType === 'play_start') {
12437          *              media.setPlayPosition({
12438          *                 "positionInMs" : 1000,
12439          *                 "onSuccess" : function() {
12440          *                     console.log("onSuccess");
12441          *                  },
12442          *                  "onFailure" : function(f) {
12443          *                     console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12444          *                  }
12445          *              });    
12446          *          }
12447          *      }, false
12448          * );
12449          *      
12450          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12451          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12452          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12453          *          media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12454          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12455          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12456          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12457          *          });
12458          *          media.play({
12459          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12460          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12461          *              }, 
12462          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12463          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12464          *              }
12465          *          });
12466          *      },
12467          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12468          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12469          *      }
12470          * });
12471          * 
12472          * 
12473          * 
12474          */
12475         hcap.Media.prototype.setPlayPosition = function (param) {
12476             if (media_object === null) {
12477                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12478                 return;
12479             }
12480             hcap_command("media_set_play_position", param);
12481         };
12482         /**
12483          * [RTSP Only] Gets the speed (rate) of the current media.  
12484          * The speed (rate) at which the media is currently playing. If the media has not yet started playing or is stopped, this method returns 0.
12485          *
12486          * @param {Object} param 
12487          * <ul>
12488          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12489          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12490          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12491          *       // {Number} param.speed - rate at which the media runs currently.
12492          *   }</pre>
12493          *   </li>
12494          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12495          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12496          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12497          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12498          *   }</pre>
12499          *   </li>
12500          * </ul>
12501          *
12502          * @since 1.3.1
12503          *
12504          * @see
12505          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setPlaySpeed">hcap.Media.setPlaySpeed()</a><br>
12506          * 
12507          * @example
12508          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12509          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12510          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12511          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12512          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12513          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12514          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12515          *          });
12516          *          media.play({
12517          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12518          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12519          *                  media.getPlaySpeed({
12520          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12521          *                          console.log("onSuccess speed : " + s.speed);
12522          *                          switch(s.speed) {
12523          *                            case 0 : 
12524          *                               console.log("Playback has stopped");
12525          *                               break;
12526          *                            case 1 : 
12527          *                               console.log("Media is playing");
12528          *                               break;
12529          *                            case 0.5 : 
12530          *                               console.log("Media is playing at half speed");
12531          *                               break;
12532          *                            case 2 : 
12533          *                               console.log("Media is fast-forwarding at 2x");
12534          *                               break;
12535          *                            case -2 : 
12536          *                               console.log("Media is rewinding at 2x");
12537          *                               break;
12538          *                          }
12539          *                      },
12540          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12541          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12542          *                      }
12543          *                  });
12544          *              }, 
12545          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12546          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12547          *              }
12548          *          });
12549          *      },
12550          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12551          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12552          *      }
12553          * });
12554          */
12555         hcap.Media.prototype.getPlaySpeed = function (param) {
12556             if (media_object === null) {
12557                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12558                 return;
12559             }
12560             hcap_command("media_get_play_speed", param);
12561         };
12562         /**
12563          * [RTSP Only] Sets the speed (rate) of the current media.
12564          * If the media has not been started yet, calling this function (with any rate other then 0) will start the media at the specified rate.
12565          * When the current media passed through http protocol, this API supports only fast forward. 
12566          * In mms and rtsp streaming, the speed parameter is transparently transmitted to the server without any conversion. 
12567          * Therefore, developers are responsible for matching the speed parameter between the application and the server.
12568          *
12569          * @param {Object} param 
12570          * <ul>
12571          *   <li>{Number} param.speed [Required] - rate at which the media should run</li>
12572          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12573          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12574          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12575          *       // No parameter.
12576          *   }</pre>
12577          *   </li>
12578          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12579          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12580          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12581          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12582          *   }</pre>
12583          *   </li>
12584          * </ul>
12585          *
12586          * @since 1.3.1
12587          *
12588          * @see
12589          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getPlaySpeed">hcap.Media.getPlaySpeed()</a><br>
12590          * 
12591          * @example
12592          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12593          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12594          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12595          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12596          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12597          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12598          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12599          *          });
12600          *          media.play({
12601          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12602          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12603          *                  media.setPlaySpeed({
12604          *                      "speed" : 2,
12605          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12606          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
12607          *                      },
12608          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12609          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12610          *                      }
12611          *                  });
12612          *              }, 
12613          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12614          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12615          *              }
12616          *          });
12617          *      },
12618          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12619          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12620          *      }
12621          * });
12622          */
12623         hcap.Media.prototype.setPlaySpeed = function (param) {
12624             if (media_object === null) {
12625                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12626                 return;
12627             }
12628             hcap_command("media_set_play_speed", param);
12629         };
12630         /**
12631          * Sets the subtitle of the current media on or off.  
12632          * If the subtitle url is not ready, there is no effect on screen. It will work after setting subtitle url using createMedia or setSubtitleUrl.
12633          * 
12634          *
12635          * @param {Object} param 
12636          * <ul>
12637          *   <li>{Boolean} param.subtitleOn [Required] - true if the media subtitle is on. false if it is off.</li>
12638          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12639          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12640          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12641          *       // No parameter.
12642          *   }</pre>
12643          *   </li>
12644          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12645          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12646          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12647          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12648          *   }</pre>
12649          *   </li>
12650          * </ul>
12651          *
12652          * @since 1.7
12653          *
12654          * @see
12655          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getSubtitleOn">hcap.Media.getSubtitleOn()</a><br>
12656          * 
12657          * @example
12658          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12659          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12660          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12661          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12662          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12663          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12664          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12665          *          });
12666          *          media.play({
12667          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12668          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12669          *                  media.setSubtitleOn({
12670          *                      "subtitleOn" : true,
12671          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12672          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
12673          *                      },
12674          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12675          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12676          *                      }
12677          *                  });
12678          *              }, 
12679          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12680          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12681          *              }
12682          *          });
12683          *      },
12684          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12685          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12686          *      }
12687          * });
12688          */
12689         hcap.Media.prototype.setSubtitleOn = function (param) {
12690             if (media_object === null) {
12691                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12692                 return;
12693             }
12694             hcap_command("media_set_subtitle_on", param);
12695         };
12696         /**
12697          * Gets the subtitle status of the current media.  
12698          * 
12699          * @param {Object} param 
12700          * <ul>
12701          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12702          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12703          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12704          *       // {Boolean} param.subtitleOn - true if the media subtitle is on. false if it is off.
12705          *   }</pre>
12706          *   </li>
12707          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12708          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12709          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12710          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12711          *   }</pre>
12712          *   </li>
12713          * </ul>
12714          *
12715          * @since 1.7
12716          *
12717          * @see
12718          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setSubtitleOn">hcap.Media.setSubtitleOn()</a><br>
12719          * 
12720          * @example
12721          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12722          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12723          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12724          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12725          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12726          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12727          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12728          *          });
12729          *          media.play({
12730          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12731          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12732          *                  media.getSubtitleOn({
12733          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12734          *                          console.log("onSuccess : subtitleOn = " + s.subtitleOn);
12735          *                      },
12736          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12737          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12738          *                      }
12739          *                  });
12740          *              }, 
12741          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12742          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12743          *              }
12744          *          });
12745          *      },
12746          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12747          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12748          *      }
12749          * });
12750          */
12751         hcap.Media.prototype.getSubtitleOn = function (param) {
12752             if (media_object === null) {
12753                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12754                 return;
12755             }
12756             hcap_command("media_get_subtitle_on", param);
12757         };
12758         /**
12759          * Sets the subtitle url of the current media. It will replace the subtitle url which is registered by createMedia().  
12760          * 
12761          * @param {Object} param 
12762          * <ul>
12763          *   <li>{String} param.subtitleUrl [Required] - subtitle url.</li>
12764          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12765          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12766          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12767          *   }</pre>
12768          *   </li>
12769          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12770          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12771          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12772          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12773          *   }</pre>
12774          *   </li>
12775          * </ul>
12776          *
12777          * @since 1.7
12778          *
12779          * @see
12780          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setSubtitleOn">hcap.Media.setSubtitleOn()</a><br>
12781          * 
12782          * @example
12783          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12784          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12785          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12786          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12787          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12788          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12789          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12790          *          });
12791          *          media.play({
12792          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12793          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12794          *                  media.setSubtitleUrl({
12795          *                      "subtitleUrl" : "http://lge.com/subtitle.srt",
12796          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
12797          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
12798          *                      },
12799          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12800          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12801          *                      }
12802          *                  });
12803          *              }, 
12804          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12805          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12806          *              }
12807          *          });
12808          *      },
12809          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12810          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12811          *      }
12812          * });
12813          */
12814         hcap.Media.prototype.setSubtitleUrl = function (param) {
12815             if (media_object === null) {
12816                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12817                 return;
12818             }
12819             hcap_command("media_set_subtitle_url", param);
12820         };
12821         /**
12822          * Gets player status. Status can be 'play', 'pause' or 'stop'.
12823          *
12824          * @param {Object} param 
12825          * <ul>
12826          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12827          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12828          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12829          *       // {String} param.state - a human readable status of the current media. 
12830          *       //     It can be 'play', 'pause' or 'stop'.
12831          *   }</pre>
12832          *   </li>
12833          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12834          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12835          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12836          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12837          *   }</pre>
12838          *   </li>
12839          * </ul>
12840          *
12841          * @since 1.3.1
12842          *
12843          * @example
12844          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12845          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12846          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12847          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12848          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12849          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12850          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12851          *          });
12852          *          media.play({
12853          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12854          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12855          *                  media.getState({
12856          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12857          *                          console.log("onSuccess state : " + s.state);
12858          *                      },
12859          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12860          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12861          *                      }
12862          *                  });
12863          *              }, 
12864          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12865          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12866          *              }
12867          *          });
12868          *      },
12869          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12870          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12871          *      }
12872          * });
12873          */
12874         hcap.Media.prototype.getState = function (param) {
12875             if (media_object === null) {
12876                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
12877                 return;
12878             }
12879             hcap_command("media_get_state", param);
12880         };
12881         /**
12882          * Gets the list of supported audio languages and the index of list in the current media.<br>
12883          * Audio language list is composed of language codes and delimiter comma(',').<br>
12884          * Application can get/set audio language of the current media by index of the audio language list.<br><br>
12885          * If there is no audio language list of the current channel, only "xx" is returned as the audio language list.<br>
12886          * And "xx" could be returned as an audio language if the audio language is not mapped to an audio language code.<br>
12887          * The maximum number of audio language lists is supported up to 16. If the video has more than 16 languages, only 16 are displayed.<br>
12888          * 
12889          * <div align=center>
12890          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
12891          *   <thead>
12892          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
12893          *   </thead>
12894          *   <tbody>
12895          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
12896          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
12897          *   </tbody>
12898          *   <tfoot>
12899          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
12900          *   </tfoot>
12901          * </table>
12902          * </div>
12903          * If the application wants to set the audio language to French ('fr'), use the index '2'.<br>
12904          * 
12905          * @param {Object} param
12906          * <ul>
12907          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12908          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12909          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
12910          *       // {String} param.list - audio language list string 
12911          *       //     which is composed of language codes separated by delimiter comma(',').
12912          *       // {Number} param.index - audio language index of the current media.
12913          *   }</pre>
12914          *   </li>
12915          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
12916          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12917          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12918          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12919          *   }</pre>
12920          *   </li>
12921          * </ul>
12922          * 
12923          * @since 1.12
12924          * 
12925          * @see
12926          * <a href="hcap.Media.html#setAudioLanguage">hcap.Media.setAudioLanguage()</a><br>
12927          *
12928          * @example
12929          * hcap.Media.startUp({
12930          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
12931          *          console.log("onSuccess");
12932          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
12933          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
12934          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
12935          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
12936          *          });
12937          *          media.play({
12938          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
12939          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
12940          *                  media.getAudioLanguage({
12941          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
12942          *                          console.log("onSuccess audio language list : " + s.list + " index : " + s.index);
12943          *                      },
12944          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12945          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12946          *                      }
12947          *                  });
12948          *              }, 
12949          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
12950          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12951          *              }
12952          *          });
12953          *      },
12954          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
12955          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
12956          *      }
12957          * });
12958          */
12959         hcap.Media.prototype.getAudioLanguage = function (param) {
12960             hcap_command("media_get_audio_language", param);
12961         };
12962         /**
12963          * Sets the audio language of the current media.<br>
12964          * 
12965          * <div align=center>
12966          * <table class="hcap_spec" width=400>
12967          *   <thead>
12968          *     <tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr>
12969          *   </thead>
12970          *   <tbody>
12971          *     <tr class="odd"><th>audio language list</th><td>en,ko,fr,en,xx</td></tr>
12972          *     <tr><th>index</th><td>0, 1, 2, 3, 4</td></tr>
12973          *   </tbody>
12974          *   <tfoot>
12975          *     <tr><th colspan="2">Audio Language List & Index Example</th></tr>
12976          *   </tfoot>
12977          * </table>
12978          * </div>
12979          * 
12980          * @param {Object} param
12981          * <ul>
12982          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - audio language index to be set. Index starts with 0.</li>
12983          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
12984          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12985          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
12986          *       // No Parameter.
12987          *   }</pre>
12988          *   </li>
12989          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
12990          *            Setting to the same audio language index as before will invoke this callback function.
12991          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
12992          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
12993          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
12994          *   }</pre>
12995          *   </li>
12996          * </ul>
12997          * 
12998          * @since 1.12
12999          * 
13000          * @see
13001          * <a href="hcap.Media.html#getAudioLanguage">hcap.Media.getAudioLanguage()</a><br>
13002          *
13003          * @example
13004          * hcap.Media.startUp({
13005          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13006          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13007          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
13008          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
13009          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
13010          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
13011          *          });
13012          *          media.play({
13013          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
13014          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
13015          *                  media.setAudioLanguage({
13016          *                      "index" : 1, 
13017          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
13018          *                          console.log("onSuccess");
13019          *                      },
13020          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13021          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13022          *                      }
13023          *                  });
13024          *              }, 
13025          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
13026          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13027          *              }
13028          *          });
13029          *      },
13030          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13031          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13032          *      }
13033          * });
13034          */
13035         hcap.Media.prototype.setAudioLanguage = function (param) {
13036             hcap_command("media_set_audio_language", param);
13037         };
13038         /**
13039          * Gets the subtitle type and track number and ISO639-1 launguage code if available.
13040          * 
13041          * @param {Object} param 
13042          * <ul>
13043          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13044          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13045          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
13046          *       // {Number} param.type - Current played subtitle type.
13047          *       // {Number} param.index - Current played subtitle track number, On the case of external subtitle, don't care this value.
13048          *       // {String} param.list - Language code of 'xx' if no available.
13049          *   }</pre>
13050          *   </li>
13051          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13052          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13053          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13054          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13055          *   }</pre>
13056          *   </li>
13057          * </ul>
13058          *
13059          * @since 1.22.0
13060          *
13061          * @see
13062          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#setSubtitle">hcap.Media.setSubtitle()</a><br>
13063          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.NONE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.NONE</a><br>
13064          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
13065          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
13066          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.CLOSED_CAPTION">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.CLOSED_CAPTION</a>
13067          *  
13068          * @example
13069          * hcap.Media.startUp({
13070          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
13071          *          console.log("onSuccess");
13072          *          var media = hcap.Media.createMedia({
13073          *              "url" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.avi", 
13074          *              "mimeType" : "video/mp4", 
13075          *              "subtitleUrl" : "http://media_server_url/media_file.smi"
13076          *          });
13077          *          media.play({
13078          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
13079          *                  console.log("onSuccess");
13080          *                  media.getSubtitle({
13081          *                      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
13082          *                          console.log("onSuccess : subtitle type = " + s.type + "index = " + s.index + "language = " + s.list);
13083          *                      },
13084          *                      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13085          *                          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13086          *                      }
13087          *                  });
13088          *              }, 
13089          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
13090          *                  console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13091          *              }
13092          *          });
13093          *      },
13094          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
13095          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
13096          *      }
13097          * });
13098          */
13099         hcap.Media.prototype.getSubtitle = function (param) {
13100             if (media_object === null) {
13101                 param.onFailure({"errorMessage" : "already destroyed."});
13102                 return;
13103             }
13104             hcap_command("media_get_subtitle", param);
13105         };
13106         /**
13107          * Sets the subtitle type and track number  
13108          * 
13109          *
13110          * @param {Object} param 
13111          * <ul>
13112          *   <li>{Number} param.type [Required] - Support 3 type of subtitle following as none, internal subtitle, external subtitle, closed caption.</li>
13113          *   <li>{Number} param.index [Required] - Subtitle index to be set. Index starts with 0. onthe case of external subtitle, don't care this value.</li>
13114          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
13115          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13116          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
13117          *       // No parameter.
13118          *   }</pre>
13119          *   </li>
13120          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
13121          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
13122          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
13123          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
13124          *   }</pre>
13125          *   </li>
13126          * </ul>
13127          *
13128          * @since 1.22.0
13129          *
13130          * @see
13131          *  <a href="hcap.Media.html#getSubtitle">hcap.Media.getSubtitle()</a><br>
13132          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.NONE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.NONE</a><br>
13133          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.INTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
13134          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.EXTERNAL_SUBTITLE</a><br>
13135          *  <a href="hcap.Media.SubtitleType.html#.CLOSED_CAPTION">hcap.Media.SubtitleType.CLOSED_CAPTION</a>
13136          *  
13137          * @example
13138          * hcap.Media.startUp({
13139          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
