14778          *       // No Parameter.
14779          *   }</pre>
14780          *   </li>
14781          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14782          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14783          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14784          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14785          *   }</pre>
14786          *   </li>
14787          * </ul>
14788          * 
14789          * @since 1.19.0
14790          * 
14791          * @see
14792          * <a href="_global_.html#event:locale_changed">{Event} locale_changed</a><br>
14793          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocaleList">hcap.system.getLocaleList()</a><br>
14794          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getLocale">hcap.system.getLocale()</a><br>
14795          *
14796          * @example
14797          * hcap.system.requestLocaleChange({
14798          *      "specifier" : "ko-KR",
14799          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
14800          *          console.log("onSuccess");
14801          *      },
14802          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14803          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14804          *      }
14805          * });
14806          */
14807         hcap.system.requestLocaleChange = function (param) {
14808             hcap_command("request_locale_change", param);
14809         };
14810         /**
14811          * Gets the current configuration of Pro:Centric server.<br>
14812          * 
14813          * @param {Object} param
14814          * <ul>
14815          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14816          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14817          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
14818          *       // {String} param.mode - Pro:Centric mode. ([US] "configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html", [EU] "off"/"configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html")
14819          *       // {String} param.media - media type ("rf"/"ip")
14820          *       // {Object} param.rfServer - data for param.media = "rf"
14821          *       //      {
14822          *       //          {String} type - RF data channel type ([US] "auto"/ "manual", [EU] "dvb-t"/"dvb-c")
14823          *       //          {Number} dataChannelNumber - [US] data channel number of RF server
14824          *       //          {Number} frequency - [EU] frequency of RF server (Hz, and MHz for satellite)
14825          *       //      }
14826          *       // {Object} param.ipServer - data for param.media = "ip"
14827          *       //      {
14828          *       //          {String} type - [US/EU] IP address type ("ip" : IPv4 or IPv6 type / "domain_name" : domain name)
14829          *       //          {String} ip - [US/EU] IPv4 or IPv6 address taken affect only when type is "ip"
14830          *       //          {String} domainName - [US/EU] domain name taken affect only when type is "domain_name"
14831          *       //          {Number} port - [US/EU] IP port number
14832          *       //      }
14833          *   }</pre>
14834          *   </li>
14835          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14836          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14837          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14838          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14839          *   }</pre>
14840          *   </li>
14841          * </ul>
14842          * 
14843          * @since 1.19.0
14844          * 
14845          * @see
14846          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setProcentricServer">hcap.system.setProcentricServer()</a><br>
14847          *
14848          * @example
14849          * hcap.system.getProcentricServer({
14850          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
14851          *          console.log("onSuccess : Pro:Centric server mode = " + p.mode + ", media = " + p.media);
14852          *          if (p.media === "rf") {
14853          *              console.log("RF server type = " + p.rfServer.type + ", data channel number = " + p.rfServer.dataChannelNumber); // US
14854          *              console.log("RF server type = " + p.rfServer.type + ", frequency = " + p.rfServer.freqeuncy); // EU
14855          *          } else if (p.media === "ip") {
14856          *              if (p.ipServer.type === "ip") {
14857          *                  console.log("IP server : type = ip, ip address = " + p.ipServer.ip + ", port = " + p.ipServer.port);
14858          *              } else if (p.ipServer.type === "domain_name") {
14859          *                  console.log("IP server : type = domain_name, domain name = " + p.ipServer.domainName + ", port = " + p.ipServer.port);
14860          *              }
14861          *          }
14862          *      },
14863          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14864          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14865          *      }
14866          * });
14867          */
14868         hcap.system.getProcentricServer = function (param) {
14869             hcap_command("get_procentric_server", param);
14870         };
14871         /**
14872          * Sets the configuration of Pro:Centric server.<br>
14873          * 
14874          * @param {Object} param
14875          * <ul>
14876          *   <li>{String} param.mode [Required] - Pro:Centric mode. ([US] "configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html", [EU] "off"/"configuration_only"/"gem"/"flash"/"html")</li>
14877          *   <li>{String} param.media [Required] - media type ("rf"/"ip")</li>
14878          *   <li>{Object} param.rfServer [Required] - data for param.media = "rf"<br>
14879          *         {<br>
14880          *             {String} type - RF data channel type ([US] "auto"/ "manual", [EU] "dvb-t"/"dvb-c")<br>
14881          *             {Number} dataChannelNumber - [US] data channel number of RF server<br>
14882          *             {Number} frequency - [EU] frequency of RF server (Hz, and MHz for satellite)<br>
14883          *         }
14884          *   </li>
14885          *   <li>{Object} param.ipServer [Required] - data for param.media = "ip"<br>
14886          *         {<br>
14887          *             {String} type - [US/EU] IP address type ("ip" : IPv4 or IPv6 type / "domain_name" : domain name)<br>
14888          *             {String} ip - [US/EU] IPv4 or IPv6 address taken affect only when type is "ip"<br>
14889          *             {String} domainName - [US/EU] domain name taken affect only when type is "domain_name"<br>
14890          *             {Number} port - IP port number<br>
14891          *         }
14892          *   </li>
14893          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14894          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14895          *   param.onSuccess = function()
14896          *       // No Parameter.
14897          *   }</pre>
14898          *   </li>
14899          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14900          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14901          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14902          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14903          *   }</pre>
14904          *   </li>
14905          * </ul>
14906          * 
14907          * @since 1.19.0
14908          * 
14909          * @see
14910          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getProcentricServer">hcap.system.getProcentricServer()</a><br>
14911          *
14912          * @example
14913          * hcap.system.setProcentricServer({
14914          *      "mode" : "gem",
14915          *      "media" : "ip",
14916          *      "ipServer" :  {
14917          *          "type" : "domain_name",
14918          *          "domainName" : "lge.com",
14919          *          "port" : 3876
14920          *      },
14921          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
14922          *          console.log("onSuccess");
14923          *      },
14924          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
14925          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
14926          *      }
14927          * });
14928          */
14929         hcap.system.setProcentricServer = function (param) {
14930             hcap_command("set_procentric_server", param);
14931         };
14932         /**
14933          * @namespace hcap.system.SoundOutputType
14934          */
14935         hcap.system.SoundOutputType = {
14936             /**
14937              * Unknown
14938              * @since 1.20.0
14939              * @constant
14940              */
14941             UNKNOWN : 0,
14942             /**
14943              * Internal TV Speaker
14944              * @since 1.20.0
14945              * @constant
14946              */
14947             INTERNAL_TV_SPEAKER : 1,
14948             /**
14949              * Wired Headphones
14950              * @since 1.20.0
14951              * @constant
14952              */
14953             WIRED_HEADPHONES : 2,
14954             /**
14955              * Off
14956              * @since 1.23.0
14957              * @constant
14958              */
14959             OFF : 3,
14960             /**
14961              * Optical
14962              * @since 1.23.0
14963              * @constant
14964              */
14965             OPTICAL : 4,
14966             /**
14967              * Optical LG Sound Sync
14968              * @since 1.23.0
14969              * @constant
14970              */
14971             OPTICAL_LGSOUNDSYNC : 5,
14972             /**
14973              * External ARC
14974              * @since 1.23.0
14975              * @constant
14976              */
14977             EXTERNAL_ARC : 6
14978         };
14979         /**
14980          * Gets the current sound output.<br>
14981          * 
14982          * @param {Object} param
14983          * <ul>
14984          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
14985          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14986          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
14987          *       // {Number} param.soundOutput - sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.
14988          *   }</pre>
14989          *   </li>
14990          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
14991          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
14992          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
14993          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
14994          *   }</pre>
14995          *   </li>
14996          * </ul>
14997          * 
14998          * @since 1.20.0
14999          * 
15000          * @see
15001          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setSoundOutput">hcap.system.setSoundOutput()</a><br>
15002          *
15003          * @example
15004          * hcap.system.getSoundOutput({
15005          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15006          *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.soundOutput);
15007          *      },
15008          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15009          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15010          *      }
15011          * });
15012          */
15013         hcap.system.getSoundOutput = function (param) {
15014             hcap_command("get_sound_output", param);
15015         };
15016         /**
15017 		 * Gets the default sound output.<br>
15018 		 * 
15019 		 * @param {Object} param
15020 		 * <ul>
15021 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15022 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15023 		 *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15024 		 *       // {Number} param.defaultSoundOutput - default sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.
15025 		 *   }</pre>
15026 		 *   </li>
15027 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15028 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15029 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15030 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15031 		 *   }</pre>
15032 		 *   </li>
15033 		 * </ul>
15034 		 * 
15035 		 * @since 1.23.0
15036 		 * 
15037 		 * @see
15038 		 * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setDefaultSoundOutput">hcap.system.setDefaultSoundOutput()</a><br>
15039 		 *
15040 		 * @example
15041 		 * hcap.system.getDefaultSoundOutput({
15042 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15043 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.defaultSoundOutput);
15044 		 *      },
15045 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15046 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15047 		 *      }
15048 		 * });
15049 		 */
15050 		hcap.system.getDefaultSoundOutput = function (param) {
15051 			hcap_command("get_default_sound_output", param);
15052 		};
15053         /**
15054          * Sets the sound output.<br>
15055          * 
15056          * @param {Object} param
15057          * <ul>
15058          *   <li>{Number} param.soundOutput [Required] - sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.</li>
15059          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15060          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15061          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15062          *       // No Parameter.
15063          *   }</pre>
15064          *   </li>
15065          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15066          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15067          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15068          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15069          *   }</pre>
15070          *   </li>
15071          * </ul>
15072          * 
15073          * @since 1.20.0
15074          * 
15075          * @see
15076          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getSoundOutput">hcap.system.getSoundOutput()</a><br>
15077          *
15078          * @example
15079          * hcap.system.setSoundOutput({
15080          *      "soundOutput" : hcap.system.SoundOutputType.WIRED_HEADPHONES,
15081          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15082          *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.soundOutput);
15083          *      },
15084          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15085          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15086          *      }
15087          * });
15088          */
15089         hcap.system.setSoundOutput = function (param) {
15090             hcap_command("set_sound_output", param);
15091         };
15092         /**
15093 		 * Sets the default sound output.<br>
15094 		 * 
15095 		 * @param {Object} param
15096 		 * <ul>
15097 		 *   <li>{Number} param.defaultSoundOutput [Required] - default sound output. Please refer to <a href="hcap.system.SoundOutputType.html">hcap.system.SoundOutputType</a>.</li>
15098 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15099 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15100 		 *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15101 		 *       // No Parameter.
15102 		 *   }</pre>
15103 		 *   </li>
15104 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15105 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15106 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15107 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15108 		 *   }</pre>
15109 		 *   </li>
15110 		 * </ul>
15111 		 * 
15112 		 * @since 1.23.0
15113 		 * 
15114 		 * @see
15115 		 * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getDefaultSoundOutput">hcap.system.getDefaultSoundOutput()</a><br>
15116 		 *
15117 		 * @example
15118 		 * hcap.system.setDefaultSoundOutput({
15119 		 *      "defaultSoundOutput" : hcap.system.SoundOutputType.OPTICAL,
15120 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15121 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : sound output = " + p.soundOutput);
15122 		 *      },
15123 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15124 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15125 		 *      }
15126 		 * });
15127 		 */
15128 		hcap.system.setDefaultSoundOutput = function (param) {
15129 			hcap_command("set_default_sound_output", param);
15130 		};
15131         /**
15132          * Informs TV of that the application will start cleaning up its resource.<br>
15133          * This should be called within 1 second in the event "on_destroy" listener, or it will be failed.<br>
15134          * If this is not called or is called after 1 second, TV will not wait for hcap.system.endDestroy and go turn off.<br>
15135          * 
15136          * @param {Object} param
15137          * <ul>
15138          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15139          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15140          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15141          *       // No Parameter.
15142          *   }</pre>
15143          *   </li>
15144          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15145          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15146          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15147          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15148          *   }</pre>
15149          *   </li>
15150          * </ul>
15151          * 
15152          * @since 1.20.0
15153          * 
15154          * @see
15155          * <a href="_global_.html#event:on_destroy">{Event} on_destroy</a><br>
15156          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.endDestroy">hcap.system.endDestroy()</a><br>
15157          *
15158          * @example
15159          * document.addEventListener(
15160          *      "on_destroy",
15161          *      function() {
15162          *          console.log("Event 'on_destroy' is received");
15163          *          hcap.system.beginDestroy({
15164          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
15165          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onSuccess");
15166          *
15167          *                  // clean up resources
15168          *
15169          *                  hcap.system.endDestroy({
15170          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
15171          *                          console.log("endDestroy onSuccess");
15172          *                      },
15173          *                      "onFailure" : function(e) {
15174          *                          console.log("endDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + e.errorMessage);
15175          *                      }
15176          *                  });
15177          *              },
15178          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
15179          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15180          *              }
15181          *          });
15182          *      },
15183          *      false
15184          * );
15185          */
15186         hcap.system.beginDestroy = function (param) {
15187             hcap_command("begin_destroy", param);
15188         };
15189         /**
15190          * Informs TV of that the application finishes its cleanup job.<br>
15191          * TV waits for hcap.system.endDestroy up to 10 minutes after hcap.system.beginDestroy is called.<br>
15192          * 
15193          * @param {Object} param
15194          * <ul>
15195          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15196          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15197          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15198          *       // No Parameter.
15199          *   }</pre>
15200          *   </li>
15201          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15202          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15203          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15204          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15205          *   }</pre>
15206          *   </li>
15207          * </ul>
15208          * 
15209          * @since 1.20.0
15210          * 
15211          * @see
15212          * <a href="_global_.html#event:on_destroy">{Event} on_destroy</a><br>
15213          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.beginDestroy">hcap.system.beginDestroy()</a><br>
15214          *
15215          * @example
15216          * document.addEventListener(
15217          *      "on_destroy",
15218          *      function() {
15219          *          console.log("Event 'on_destroy' is received");
15220          *          hcap.system.beginDestroy({
15221          *              "onSuccess" : function() {
15222          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onSuccess");
15223          *
15224          *                  // clean up resources
15225          *
15226          *                  hcap.system.endDestroy({
15227          *                      "onSuccess" : function() {
15228          *                          console.log("endDestroy onSuccess");
15229          *                      },
15230          *                      "onFailure" : function(e) {
15231          *                          console.log("endDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + e.errorMessage);
15232          *                      }
15233          *                  });
15234          *              },
15235          *              "onFailure" : function(f) {
15236          *                  console.log("beginDestroy onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15237          *              }
15238          *          });
15239          *      },
15240          *      false
15241          * );
15242          */
15243         hcap.system.endDestroy = function (param) {
15244             hcap_command("end_destroy", param);
15245         };
15246         /**
15247          * Gets the current audio pts offset.<br>
15248          * 
15249          * @param {Object} param
15250          * <ul>
15251          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15252          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15253          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15254          *       // {Number} param.audioPtsOffset - audio pts offset.
15255          *   }</pre>
15256          *   </li>
15257          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15258          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15259          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15260          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15261          *   }</pre>
15262          *   </li>
15263          * </ul>
15264          * 
15265          * @since 1.21.0
15266          * 
15267          * @see
15268          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
15269          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
15270          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
15271          *
15272          * @example
15273          * hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset({
15274          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15275          *          console.log("onSuccess : audio pts offset = " + p.audioPtsOffset);
15276          *      },
15277          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15278          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15279          *      }
15280          * });
15281          */
15282         hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset = function (param) {
15283             hcap_command("get_audio_pts_offset", param);
15284         };
15285         /**
15286          * sets the audio pts offset.<br>
15287          * 
15288          * @param {Object} param
15289          * <ul>
15290          *   <li>{Number} param.audioPtsOffset [Required] - audio pts offset. The value must be multiples of 10 (-500 ~ 500).</li>
15291          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15292          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15293          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15294          *       // No Parameter.
15295          *   }</pre>
15296          *   </li>
15297          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15298          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15299          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15300          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15301          *   }</pre>
15302          *   </li>
15303          * </ul>
15304          * 
15305          * @since 1.21.0
15306          * 
15307          * @see
15308          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
15309          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
15310          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
15311          * <a href="_global_.html#event:ui_value_changed">{Event} ui_value_changed</a><br>
15312          *
15313          * @example
15314          * hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset({
15315          *      "audioPtsOffset" : 10,
15316          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15317          *          console.log("onSuccess : audio pts offset = " + p.audioPtsOffset);
15318          *      },
15319          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15320          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15321          *      }
15322          * });
15323          */
15324         hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset = function (param) {
15325             hcap_command("set_audio_pts_offset", param);
15326         };
15327         /**
15328          * Gets the current video pts offset.<br>
15329          * 
15330          * @param {Object} param
15331          * <ul>
15332          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15333          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15334          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15335          *       // {Number} param.videoPtsOffset - video pts offset.
15336          *   }</pre>
15337          *   </li>
15338          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15339          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15340          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15341          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15342          *   }</pre>
15343          *   </li>
15344          * </ul>
15345          * 
15346          * @since 1.21.0
15347          * 
15348          * @see
15349          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
15350          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
15351          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
15352          *
15353          * @example
15354          * hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset({
15355          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15356          *          console.log("onSuccess : video pts offset = " + p.videoPtsOffset);
15357          *      },
15358          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15359          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15360          *      }
15361          * });
15362          */
15363         hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset = function (param) {
15364             hcap_command("get_video_pts_offset", param);
15365         };
15366         /**
15367          * sets the video pts offset.<br>
15368          * 
15369          * @param {Object} param
15370          * <ul>
15371          *   <li>{Number} param.videoPtsOffset [Required] - video pts offset. The value must be multiples of 10 (-500 ~ 500).</li>
15372          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15373          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15374          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15375          *       // No Parameter.
15376          *   }</pre>
15377          *   </li>
15378          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15379          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15380          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15381          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15382          *   }</pre>
15383          *   </li>
15384          * </ul>
15385          * 
15386          * @since 1.21.0
15387          * 
15388          * @see
15389          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getVideoPtsOffset">hcap.system.getVideoPtsOffset()</a><br>
15390          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.getAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
15391          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setAudioPtsOffset">hcap.system.setAudioPtsOffset()</a><br>
15392          * <a href="_global_.html#event:ui_value_changed">{Event} ui_value_changed</a><br>
15393          *
15394          * @example
15395          * hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset({
15396          *      "videoPtsOffset" : 10,
15397          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15398          *          console.log("onSuccess : video pts offset = " + p.videoPtsOffset);
15399          *      },
15400          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15401          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15402          *      }
15403          * });
15404          */
15405         hcap.system.setVideoPtsOffset = function (param) {
15406             hcap_command("set_video_pts_offset", param);
15407         };
15408         /**
15409          * Gets the current configuration of proxy server.<br>
15410          * 
15411          * @param {Object} param
15412          * <ul>
15413          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15414          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15415          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15416          *       // {String} param.ip - IPv4 or IPv6 address
15417          *       // {Number} param.port - IP port number
15418          *   }</pre>
15419          *   </li>
15420          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15421          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15422          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15423          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15424          *   }</pre>
15425          *   </li>
15426          * </ul>
15427          * 
15428          * @since 1.21.0
15429          * 
15430          * @see
15431          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setProxyServer">hcap.system.setProxyServer()</a><br>
15432          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.expireProxyServer">hcap.system.expireProxyServer()</a><br>
15433          *
15434          * @example
15435          * hcap.system.getProxyServer({
15436          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15437          *          console.log("onSuccess : proxy server ip address= " + p.ip + ", port = " + p.port);
15438          *      },
15439          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15440          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15441          *      }
15442          * });
15443          */
15444         hcap.system.getProxyServer = function (param) {
15445             hcap_command("get_proxy_server", param);
15446         };
15447         /**
15448          * Sets the configuration of proxy server.<br>
15449          * 
15450          * @param {Object} param
15451          * <ul>
15452          *   <li>{String} param.ip [Required] - ip - IPv4 or IPv6 address</li>
15453          *   <li>{Number} param.port [Required] - port - IP port number</li>
15454          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15455          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15456          *   param.onSuccess = function()
15457          *       // No Parameter.
15458          *   }</pre>
15459          *   </li>
15460          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15461          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15462          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15463          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15464          *   }</pre>
15465          *   </li>
15466          * </ul>
15467          * 
15468          * @since 1.21.0
15469          * 
15470          * @see
15471          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getProxyServer">hcap.system.getProxyServer()</a><br>
15472          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.expireProxyServer">hcap.system.expireProxyServer()</a><br>
15473          *
15474          * @example
15475          * hcap.system.setProxyServer({
15476          *      "ip" : "1.2.3.4",
15477          *      "port" : 3876,
15478          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15479          *          console.log("onSuccess");
15480          *      },
15481          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15482          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15483          *      }
15484          * });
15485          */
15486         hcap.system.setProxyServer = function (param) {
15487             hcap_command("set_proxy_server", param);
15488         };
15489         /**
15490          * Expires the current configuration of proxy server.<br>
15491          * 
15492          * @param {Object} param
15493          * <ul>
15494          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15495          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15496          *   param.onSuccess = function()
15497          *       // No Parameter.
15498          *   }</pre>
15499          *   </li>
15500          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15501          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15502          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15503          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15504          *   }</pre>
15505          *   </li>
15506          * </ul>
15507          * 
15508          * @since 1.21.0
15509          * 
15510          * @see
15511          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getProxyServer">hcap.system.getProxyServer()</a><br>
15512          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getProxyServer">hcap.system.setProxyServer()</a><br>
15513          *
15514          * @example
15515          * hcap.system.expireProxyServer({
15516          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15517          *          console.log("onSuccess");
15518          *      },
15519          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15520          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15521          *      }
15522          * });
15523          */
15524         hcap.system.expireProxyServer = function (param) {
15525             hcap_command("expire_proxy_server", param);
15526         };
15527         /**
15528          * Gets the current remote object inspector mode of the HCAP browser.<br>
15529          * 
15530          * @param {Object} param
15531          * <ul>
15532          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15533          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15534          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15535          *       // {Boolean} param.debugMode - true if the debug mode of HCAP browser is on. false if the debug mode of HCAP browser is off.
15536          *   }</pre>
15537          *   </li>
15538          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15539          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15540          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15541          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15542          *   }</pre>
15543          *   </li>
15544          * </ul>
15545          * 
15546          * @since 1.21.0
15547          * 
15548          * @see
15549          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setBrowserDebugMode">hcap.system.setBrowserDebugMode()</a><br>
15550          *
15551          * @example
15552          * hcap.system.getBrowserDebugMode({
15553          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15554          *          console.log("onSuccess : debugMode = " + p.debugMode);
15555          *      },
15556          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15557          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15558          *      }
15559          * });
15560          */
15561         hcap.system.getBrowserDebugMode = function (param) {
15562             hcap_command("get_browser_debug_mode", param);
15563         };
15564         /**
15565          * Turns on or off the remote object inspector of the HCAP browser.<br>
15566          * Changed setting will take affect after a reboot.<br>
15567          * After a reboot, open the http://TV_IP:2345 on TV remote client (Chrome on PC).<br>
15568          * 
15569          * @param {Object} param
15570          * <ul>
15571          *   <li>{Boolean} param.debugMode [Required] - true to turn on debug mode, else false.</li>
15572          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15573          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15574          *   param.onSuccess = function()
15575          *       // No Parameter.
15576          *   }</pre>
15577          *   </li>
15578          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15579          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15580          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15581          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15582          *   }</pre>
15583          *   </li>
15584          * </ul>
15585          * 
15586          * @since 1.21.0
15587          * 
15588          * @see
15589          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getBrowserDebugMode">hcap.system.getBrowserDebugMode()</a><br>
15590          *
15591          * @example
15592          * hcap.system.setBrowserDebugMode({
15593          *      "debugMode" : true,
15594          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15595          *          console.log("onSuccess");
15596          *      },
15597          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15598          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15599          *      }
15600          * });
15601          */
15602         hcap.system.setBrowserDebugMode = function (param) {
15603             hcap_command("set_browser_debug_mode", param);
15604         };
15605         /**
15606          * Gets the current configuration of no signal image.<br>
15607          * 
15608          * @param {Object} param
15609          * <ul>
15610          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15611          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15612          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15613          *       // {Boolean} param.noSignalImage - true if no signal image is on. false if no signal image is off.
15614          *   }</pre>
15615          *   </li>
15616          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15617          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15618          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15619          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15620          *   }</pre>
15621          *   </li>
15622          * </ul>
15623          * 
15624          * @since 1.21.0
15625          * 
15626          * @see
15627          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setNoSignalImage">hcap.system.setNoSignalImage()</a><br>
15628          *
15629          * @example
15630          * hcap.system.getNoSignalImage({
15631          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
15632          *          console.log("onSuccess : noSignalImage = " + p.noSignalImage);
15633          *      },
15634          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15635          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15636          *      }
15637          * });
15638          */
15639         hcap.system.getNoSignalImage = function (param) {
15640             hcap_command("get_no_signal_image", param);
15641         };
15642         /**
15643          * Turns on or off no signal image.<br>
15644          * 
15645          * @param {Object} param
15646          * <ul>
15647          *   <li>{Boolean} param.noSignalImage [Required] - true to turn on no signal image, else false.</li>
15648          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15649          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15650          *   param.onSuccess = function()
15651          *       // No Parameter.
15652          *   }</pre>
15653          *   </li>
15654          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15655          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15656          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15657          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15658          *   }</pre>
15659          *   </li>
15660          * </ul>
15661          * 
15662          * @since 1.21.0
15663          * 
15664          * @see
15665          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getNoSignalImage">hcap.system.getNoSignalImage()</a><br>
15666          *
15667          * @example
15668          * hcap.system.setNoSignalImage({
15669          *      "noSignalImage" : true,
15670          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15671          *          console.log("onSuccess");
15672          *      },
15673          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15674          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15675          *      }
15676          * });
15677          */
15678         hcap.system.setNoSignalImage = function (param) {
15679             hcap_command("set_no_signal_image", param);
15680         };
15681         /**
15682          * Gets the list of supported screen keyboard languages.<br>
15683          * Screen keyboard language list is composed of language codes and delimiter comma(',').<br>
15684          * 
15685          * @param {Object} param
15686          * <ul>
15687          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15688          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15689          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15690          *       // {String} param.list - screen keyboard language list string. 
15691          *       //     which is composed of language codes separated by delimiter comma(',').
15692          *   }</pre>
15693          *   </li>
15694          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15695          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15696          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15697          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15698          *   }</pre>
15699          *   </li>
15700          * </ul>
15701          * 
15702          * @since 1.22.0
15703          * 
15704          * @see
15705          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setScreenKeyboardLanguage">hcap.system.setScreenKeyboardLanguage()</a><br>
15706          *
15707          * @example
15708          * hcap.system.getScreenKeyboardLanguageList({
15709          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
15710          *          console.log("onSuccess : list = " + s.list);
15711          *      }, 
15712          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15713          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15714          *      }
15715          * });
15716          */
15717         hcap.system.getScreenKeyboardLanguageList = function (param) {
15718             hcap_command("get_screen_keyboard_language_list", param);
15719         };
15720         /**
15721          * Sets the screen keyboard language.<br>
15722          * 
15723          * @param {Object} param
15724          * <ul>
15725          *   <li>{String} param.keyboardLanguage [Required] - screen keyboard language to be set.</li>
15726          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15727          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15728          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
15729          *       // No Parameter.
15730          *   }</pre>
15731          *   </li>
15732          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
15733          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15734          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15735          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15736          *   }</pre>
15737          *   </li>
15738          * </ul>
15739          * 
15740          * @since 1.22.0
15741          * 
15742          * @see
15743          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getScreenKeyboardLanguageList">hcap.system.getScreenKeyboardLanguageList()</a><br>
15744          *
15745          * @example
15746          * hcap.system.setScreenKeyboardLanguage({
15747          *      "keyboardLanguage" : "en", 
15748          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15749          *          console.log("onSuccess");
15750          *      }, 
15751          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15752          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15753          *      }
15754          * });
15755          */
15756         hcap.system.setScreenKeyboardLanguage = function (param) {
15757             hcap_command("set_screen_keyboard_language", param);
15758         };
15759         /**
15760          * Gets the status of usb power control.<br>
15761          * 
15762          * @param {Object} param
15763          * <ul>
15764          *   <li>{Number} param.portNumber [Required] - port number to be get the status of usb power control.</li>
15765          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15766          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15767          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
15768          *       // {Boolean} param.status - the status of usb power control.
15769          *   }</pre>
15770          *   </li>
15771          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
15772          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15773          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15774          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15775          *   }</pre>
15776          *   </li>
15777          * </ul>
15778          * 
15779          * @since 1.23.0
15780          * 
15781          * @see
15782          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setUsbPowerControl">hcap.system.setUsbPowerControl()</a><br>
15783          *
15784          * @example
15785          * hcap.system.getUsbPowerControl({
15786          *      "portNumber" : 2,
15787          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
15788          *          console.log("onSuccess : status = " + s.status);
15789          *      }, 
15790          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15791          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15792          *      }
15793          * });
15794          */
15795         hcap.system.getUsbPowerControl = function (param) {
15796             hcap_command("get_usb_power_control", param);
15797         };
15798         /**
15799          * Sets the status of usb power control.<br>
15800          * 
15801          * @param {Object} param
15802          * <ul>
15803          *   <li>{Number} param.portNumber [Required] - port number to be set the status of usb power control.</li>
15804          *   <li>{Boolean} param.status [Required] - the status of usb power control.</li>
15805          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15806          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15807          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
15808          *       // No Parameter.
15809          *   }</pre>
15810          *   </li>
15811          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
15812          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15813          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15814          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15815          *   }</pre>
15816          *   </li>
15817          * </ul>
15818          * 
15819          * @since 1.23.0
15820          * 
15821          * @see
15822          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getUsbPowerControl">hcap.system.getUsbPowerControl()</a><br>
15823          *
15824          * @example
15825          * hcap.system.setUsbPowerControl({
15826          *      "portNumber" : 2,
15827          *      "status" : true,
15828          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15829          *          console.log("onSuccess");
15830          *      }, 
15831          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15832          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15833          *      }
15834          * });
15835          */
15836         hcap.system.setUsbPowerControl = function (param) {
15837             hcap_command("set_usb_power_control", param);
15838         };  
15839         /**
15840 		 * show toast message on the TV screen. The message will be displayed on the upper right corner for a short time. The message can not be exceed 162 bytes.<br>
15841 		 * 
15842 		 * @param {Object} param
15843 		 * <ul>
15844 		 *   <li>{String} param.message [Required] - the message body</li>
15845 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15846 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15847 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
15848 		 *       // No Parameter.
15849 		 *   }</pre>
15850 		 *   </li>
15851 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
15852 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15853 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15854 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15855 		 *   }</pre>
15856 		 *   </li>
15857 		 * </ul>
15858 		 * 
15859 		 * @since 1.23.2
15860 		 * 
15861 		 * @example
15862 		 * hcap.system.showToastMessage({
15863 		 *      "message" : "hello world", 
15864 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15865 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
15866 		 *      }, 
15867 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15868 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15869 		 *      }
15870 		 * });
15871 		 */
15872 		hcap.system.showToastMessage = function (param) {
15873 			hcap_command("show_toast_message", param);
15874 		};
15875         /**
15876 		 * manually start the software update.<br>
15877 		 * 
15878 		 * @param {Object} param
15879 		 * <ul>
15880 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15881 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15882 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
15883 		 *       // No Parameter.
15884 		 *   }</pre>
15885 		 *   </li>
15886 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
15887 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15888 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15889 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15890 		 *   }</pre>
15891 		 *   </li>
15892 		 * </ul>
15893 		 * 
15894 		 * @since 1.24.2
15895 		 *  
15896          * @see
15897          * <a href="_global_.html#event:software_update_event_received">{Event} software_update_event_received</a><br>
15898          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.cancelUpdate">hcap.system.cancelUpdate()</a><br>
15899          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getUpdateProgress">hcap.system.getUpdateProgress()</a><br>
15900 	     *
15901 		 * @example
15902 		 * hcap.system.startManualUpdate({
15903 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15904 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
15905 		 *      }, 
15906 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15907 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15908 		 *      }
15909 		 * });
15910 		 */
15911 		hcap.system.startManualUpdate = function (param) {
15912 			hcap_command("start_manual_update", param);
15913 		};
15914         /**
15915 		 * Update can be canceled in case of manual download.<br>
15916 		 * 
15917 		 * @param {Object} param
15918 		 * <ul>
15919 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15920 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15921 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
15922 		 *       // No Parameter.
15923 		 *   }</pre>
15924 		 *   </li>
15925 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
15926 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15927 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15928 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15929 		 *   }</pre>
15930 		 *   </li>
15931 		 * </ul>
15932 		 * 
15933 		 * @since 1.24.2
15934 		 * 
15935 	     * @see
15936          * <a href="_global_.html#event:software_update_event_received">{Event} software_update_event_received</a><br>
15937          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.startManualUpdate">hcap.system.startManualUpdate()</a><br>
15938          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getUpdateProgress">hcap.system.getUpdateProgress()</a><br>
15939 	     *
15940 		 * @example
15941 		 * hcap.system.cancelUpdate({
15942 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
15943 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
15944 		 *      }, 
15945 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15946 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15947 		 *      }
15948 		 * });
15949 		 */
15950 		hcap.system.cancelUpdate = function (param) {
15951 			hcap_command("cancel_update", param);
15952 		};
15953         /**
15954 		 * It informs you of the progress of the software update.<br>
15955 		 * 
15956 		 * @param {Object} param
15957 		 * <ul>
15958 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
15959 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15960 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
15961 		 *       // {Number} param.progress - software update progress
15962 		 *       // {Number} param.totalPackage - total package capacity
15963 		 *       // {Number} param.installedPackage - installed package capacity		
15964 		 *   }</pre>
15965 		 *   </li>
15966 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
15967 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
15968 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
15969 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
15970 		 *   }</pre>
15971 		 *   </li>
15972 		 * </ul>
15973 		 * 
15974 		 * @since 1.24.2
15975 		 * 
15976 	     * @see
15977          * <a href="_global_.html#event:software_update_event_received">{Event} software_update_event_received</a><br>
15978          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.startManualUpdate">hcap.system.startManualUpdate()</a><br>
15979          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.cancelUpdate">hcap.system.cancelUpdate()</a><br>
15980 	     *
15981 		 * @example
15982 		 * hcap.system.getUpdateProgress({
15983 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
15984 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : progress = " + s.progress + ", totalPackage = " + s.totalPackage + ", installedPackage = " + s.installedPackage);
15985 		 *      }, 
15986 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
15987 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
15988 		 *      }
15989 		 * });
15990 		 */
15991 		hcap.system.getUpdateProgress = function (param) {
15992 			hcap_command("get_update_progress", param);
15993 		};		
15994         /**
15995 		 * Gets the peripheral information of the system. When the peripheral status is changed, the HCAP app gets the notification.<br>
15996 
15997 		 * 
15998 		 * @param {Object} param
15999 		 * <ul>
16000 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16001 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16002 		 *   param.onSuccess = function(param) {
16003 		 *       // {Array} param.deviceList - The list of the peripheral device.
16004 		 *       // {Number} param.deviceList.length - The length of the list.
16005 		 *       // {String} param.deviceList[].product - The product name of the peripheral device.
16006 		 *       // {String} param.deviceList[].vendor - The vendor name of the peripheral device.
16007 		 *       // {Number} param.deviceList[].deviceNumber - The device number of the peripheral device.
16008 		 *       // {String} param.deviceList[].type - The device type of the peripheral device.
16009 		 *   }</pre>
16010 		 *   </li>
16011 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.<br>
16012 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16013 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16014 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16015 		 *   }</pre>
16016 		 *   </li>
16017 		 * </ul>
16018 		 * 
16019 		 * @since 1.24.8
16020 		 * 
16021 	     * @see
16022          * <a href="_global_.html#event:peripheral_status_changed">{Event} peripheral_status_changed</a><br>
16023 	     *
16024 		 * @example
16025 		 * hcap.system.getPeripheralList({
16026 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
16027 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + p.deviceList.length);
16028          *          for (var i = 0; i < p.deviceList.length; i++) {
16029          *              console.log("Product Name = " + p.deviceList[i].product);
16030          *              console.log("Vendor Name = " + p.deviceList[i].vendor);
16031          *              console.log("Device Number = " + p.deviceList[i].deviceNumber);
16032          *              console.log("Device Type = " + p.deviceList[i].type);
16033          *          }
16034 		 *      }, 
16035 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16036 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16037 		 *      }
16038 		 * });
16039 		 */
16040 		hcap.system.getPeripheralList = function (param) {
16041 			hcap_command("get_peripheral_list", param);
16042 		};
16043         /**
16044 		 * Gets the current hdmi out status.<br>
16045 		 * 
16046 		 * @param {Object} param
16047          * <ul>
16048          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16049          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16050          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
16051          *       // {Boolean} param.connected - hdmiout status.
16052          *   }</pre>
16053          *   </li>
16054          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional]  - failure callback function.
16055          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16056          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16057          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16058          *   }</pre>
16059          *   </li>
16060          * </ul>
16061          * 
16062 		 * @since 1.24.10
16063 		 * 
16064          * @see
16065          * <a href="_global_.html#event:hdmi_connection_changed">{Event} hdmi_connection_changed</a><br>
16066          * 
16067 		 * @example
16068 		 * hcap.system.getHdmiOutStatus({
16069 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
16070 		 *          console.log("onSuccess :  connection status  = " + p.connected);
16071 		 *      }, 
16072 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16073 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16074 		 *      }
16075 		 * });
16076 		 */
16077         hcap.system.getHdmiOutStatus = function (param) {
16078 			hcap_command("get_hdmiout_status", param);
16079 		};
16080                 /**
16081 		 * Gets the location code of the LG service country.<br>
16082          * "ZZ" is Unknown or Invalid Territory code<br>
16083 		 * 
16084 		 * @param {Object} param
16085          * <ul>
16086          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16087          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16088          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
16089          *       // {Boolean} param.countryCode - 2-digit country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
16090          *   }</pre>
16091          *   </li>
16092          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional]  - failure callback function.
16093          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16094          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16095          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16096          *   }</pre>
16097          *   </li>
16098          * </ul>
16099          * 
16100 		 * @since 1.24.12
16101          * 
16102          * @see
16103          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.setServiceCountry">hcap.system.setServiceCountry()</a><br>
16104          * 
16105 		 * @example
16106 		 * hcap.system.getServiceCountry({
16107 		 *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
16108 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : country code  = " + p.countryCode);
16109 		 *      }, 
16110 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16111 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16112 		 *      }
16113 		 * });
16114 		 */
16115         hcap.system.getServiceCountry = function (param) {
16116             hcap_command("get_service_country", param);
16117         };
16118         /**
16119          * Sets the location code of the LG service country. <br>
16120          * When you execute this API, the TV will be rebooted immediately. "ZZ" is Unknown or Invalid Territory code<br>
16121          * 
16122          * @param {Object} param
16123          * <ul>
16124          *   <li>{String} param.countryCode [Required] - string : 2-digit country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2</li>
16125          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16126          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16127          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
16128          *       // No Parameter.
16129          *   }</pre>
16130          *   </li>
16131          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional]  - failure callback function.
16132          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16133          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16134          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16135          *   }</pre>
16136          *   </li>
16137          * </ul>
16138          * 
16139          * @since 1.24.12
16140          * 
16141          * @see
16142          * <a href="hcap.system.html#.getServiceCountry">hcap.system.getServiceCountry()</a><br>
16143          * 
16144          * @example
16145          * hcap.system.setServiceCountry({
16146          *      "countryCode" : "KR",
16147          *      "onSuccess" : function(p) {
16148          *          console.log("onSuccess" );
16149          *      }, 
16150          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16151          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16152          *      }
16153          * });
16154          */
16155         hcap.system.setServiceCountry = function (param) {
16156             hcap_command("set_service_country", param);
16157         };
16158         /** 
16159          * @namespace hcap.checkout
16160          */
16161         hcap.checkout = { };
16162         /**
16163          * Restores checkout snapshot items and clear system-dependent cache and history.<br>
16164          * Rebooting system is strongly recommended after checking out is done.<br>
16165          * 
16166          * @param {Object} param
16167          * <ul>
16168          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16169          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16170          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16171          *       // No Parameter.
16172          *   }</pre>
16173          *   </li>
16174          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16175          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16176          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16177          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16178          *   }</pre>
16179          *   </li>
16180          * </ul>
16181          *  
16182          * @since 1.19.0
16183          * 
16184          * @see
16185          * <a href="hcap.checkout.html#.takeCheckoutSnapshot">hcap.checkout.takeCheckoutSnapshot()</a><br>
16186          *
16187          * @example
16188          * hcap.checkout.requestCheckout({
16189          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16190          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16191          *      }, 
16192          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16193          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16194          *      }
16195          * });
16196          */
16197         hcap.checkout.requestCheckout = function (param) {
16198             hcap_command("request_checkout", param);
16199         };
16200         /**
16201          * Stores checkout snapshot items. The checkout snapshot items are system(or TV model)-dependent.<br>
16202          * 
16203          * @param {Object} param
16204          * <ul>
16205          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16206          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16207          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16208          *       // No Parameter.
16209          *   }</pre>
16210          *   </li>
16211          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16212          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16213          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16214          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16215          *   }</pre>
16216          *   </li>
16217          * </ul>
16218          *  
16219          * @since 1.19.0
16220          * 
16221          * @see
16222          * <a href="hcap.checkout.html#.requestCheckout">hcap.checkout.requestCheckout()</a><br>
16223          *
16224          * @example
16225          * hcap.checkout.takeCheckoutSnapshot({
16226          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16227          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16228          *      }, 
16229          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16230          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16231          *      }
16232          * });
16233          */
16234         hcap.checkout.takeCheckoutSnapshot = function (param) {
16235             hcap_command("take_checkout_snapshot", param);
16236         };
16237         /**
16238          * @namespace hcap.beacon
16239          */
16240         hcap.beacon = {};
16241         /**
16242          * Sets the beacon mode is enabled or disabled.<br>
16243          * 
16244          * @param {Object} param
16245          * <ul>
16246          *   <li>{Boolean} param.enable [Required] - true : enable to beacon mode, false : disable.</li>
16247          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16248          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16249          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16250          *       // No Parameter. 
16251          *   }</pre>
16252          *   </li>
16253          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16254          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16255          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16256          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16257          *   }</pre>
16258          *   </li>
16259          * </ul>
16260          *  
16261          * @since 1.22.0
16262          * 
16263          * @see
16264          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestiBeacon">hcap.beacon.requestiBeacon()</a><br>
16265          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUid">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUid()</a><br>
16266          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUrl">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUrl()</a><br>
16267          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.getBeaconInformation">hcap.beacon.getBeaconInformation()</a><br>
16268          * <a href="_global_.html#event:ui_value_changed">{Event} ui_value_changed</a><br>
16269          *
16270          * @example
16271          * hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode({
16272          *      "enable" : true,
16273          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16274          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16275          *      }, 
16276          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16277          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16278          *      }
16279          * });
16280          */
16281         hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode = function (param) {
16282             hcap_command("set_beacon_mode", param);
16283         };
16284         /**
16285          * Request the iBeacon.<br>
16286          * This is worked only when the beacon mode is enabled.<br>
16287          * 
16288          * @param {Object} param
16289          * <ul>
16290          *   <li>{String} param.uuid [Required] - uuid. the range is 0~F(field1: 8 digits string, field2: 4 digits string, field3: 4 digits string, field4: 4 digits string, field5: 8 digits string)</li>
16291          *   <li>{Number} param.major [Required] - the value of major (0 ~ 65535)</li>
16292          *   <li>{Number} param.minor [Required] - the value of minor (0 ~ 65535)</li>
16293          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16294          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16295          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16296          *       // No Parameter. 
16297          *   }</pre>
16298          *   </li>
16299          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16300          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16301          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16302          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16303          *   }</pre>
16304          *   </li>
16305          * </ul>
16306          *  
16307          * @since 1.22.0
16308          * 
16309          * @see
16310          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.setBeaconMode">hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode()</a><br>
16311          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUid">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUid()</a><br>
16312          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUrl">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUrl()</a><br>
16313          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.getBeaconInformation">hcap.beacon.getBeaconInformation()</a><br>
16314          *
16315          * @example
16316          * hcap.beacon.requestiBeacon({
16317          *      "uuid" : "AAAAAAAABBBBCCCCDDDDEEEEEEEE",
16318          *      "major" : 65535,
16319          *      "minor" : 65535,
16320          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16321          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16322          *      }, 
16323          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16324          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16325          *      }
16326          * });
16327          */
16328         hcap.beacon.requestiBeacon = function (param) {
16329             hcap_command("request_iBeacon", param);
16330         };
16331         /**
16332          * Request the Eddystone Uid.<br>
16333          * This is worked only when the beacon mode is enabled.<br>
16334          * 
16335          * @param {Object} param
16336          * <ul>
16337          *   <li>{String} param.uuid [Required] - uuid. the range is 0~F(field1: 20 digits string, field2: 8 digits string)</li>
16338          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16339          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16340          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16341          *       // No Parameter. 
16342          *   }</pre>
16343          *   </li>
16344          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16345          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16346          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16347          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16348          *   }</pre>
16349          *   </li>
16350          * </ul>
16351          *  
16352          * @since 1.22.0
16353          * 
16354          * @see
16355          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.setBeaconMode">hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode()</a><br>
16356          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestiBeacon">hcap.beacon.requestiBeacon()</a><br>
16357          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUrl">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUrl()</a><br>
16358          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.getBeaconInformation">hcap.beacon.getBeaconInformation()</a><br>
16359          *
16360          * @example
16361          * hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUid({
16362          *      "uuid" : "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAABBBBBBBB",
16363          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16364          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16365          *      }, 
16366          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16367          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16368          *      }
16369          * });
16370          */
16371         hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUid = function (param) {
16372             hcap_command("request_eddystone_uid", param);
16373         };
16374         /**
16375          * Request the Eddystone Url.<br>
16376          * This is worked only when the beacon mode is enabled.<br>
16377          * 
16378          * @param {Object} param
16379          * <ul>
16380          *   <li>{String} param.prefix [Required] - url prefix ("http", "httpEx", "https", "httpsEx")</li>
16381          *   <li>{String} param.excode [Required] - url excode ("noneValue", "comEx", "orgEx", eduEx", "netEx", "infoEx", "bizEx", "govEx", "com", "org", "edu", "nex", "info", "biz", "gov")</li>
16382          *   <li>{String} param.url [Required] - url. max length is 17. but max length is 15 when prefix is "httpsEx" or excode is "infoEx".</li>
16383          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16384          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16385          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
16386          *       // No Parameter. 
16387          *   }</pre>
16388          *   </li>
16389          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
16390          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16391          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16392          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16393          *   }</pre>
16394          *   </li>
16395          * </ul>
16396          *  
16397          * @since 1.22.0
16398          * 
16399          * @see
16400          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.setBeaconMode">hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode()</a><br>
16401          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestiBeacon">hcap.beacon.requestiBeacon()</a><br>
16402          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUid">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUid()</a><br>
16403          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.getBeaconInformation">hcap.beacon.getBeaconInformation()</a><br>
16404          *
16405          * @example
16406          * hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUrl({
16407          *      "prefix" : "httpEx",
16408          *      "excode" : "eduEx",
16409          *      "url" : "abcdefghijklmnopq",
16410          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
16411          *          console.log("onSuccess");
16412          *      }, 
16413          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
16414          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
16415          *      }
16416          * });
16417          */
16418         hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUrl = function (param) {
16419         	hcap_command("request_eddystone_url", param);
16420         };
16421         /**
16422          * Gets the configuration of beacon.<br>
16423          *
16424          * @param {Object} param
16425          * <ul>
16426          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
16427          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16428          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
16429          *       // {Boolean} param.beaconMode - true : enable to beacon mode, false : disable
16430          *       // {String} param.beaconType - beacon type(iBeacon, eddystone)
16431          *       // {String} param.iBeaconUuid - uuid of iBeacon.
16432          *       // {Number} param.iBeaconMajor - major of iBeacon.
16433          *       // {Number} param.iBeaconMinor - minor of iBeacon.
16434          *       // {String} param.eddyStoneUuid - uuid of eddystone.
16435          *       // {String} param.eddyStoneFrame - frame of eddystone.
16436          *       // {String} param.eddyStoneUrlPrefix - url prefix of eddystone.
16437          *       // {String} param.eddyStoneUrlExCode - url ex code of eddystone.
16438          *       // {String} param.eddyStoneUrl - url of eddystone.
16439          *   }</pre>
16440          *   </li>
16441          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional]  - failure callback function.
16442          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
16443          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
16444          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
16445          *   }</pre>
16446          *   </li>
16447          * </ul>
16448          *  
16449          * @since 1.22.0
16450          * 
16451          * @see
16452          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.setBeaconMode">hcap.beacon.setBeaconMode()</a><br>
16453          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestiBeacon">hcap.beacon.requestiBeacon()</a><br>
16454          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUid">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUid()</a><br>
16455          * <a href="hcap.beacon.html#.requestEddystoneUrl">hcap.beacon.requestEddystoneUrl()</a><br>
16456          *
16457          * @example
16458          * hcap.beacon.getBeaconInformation({
16459          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
16460          *          console.log("onSuccess          : " + 
16461          *              "\n beacon mode             : " + s.beaconMode +
16462          *              "\n beacon type             : " + s.beaconType +
16463          *              "\n iBeacon uuid            : " + s.iBeaconUuid +
16464          *              "\n iBeacon major           : " + s.iBeaconMajor +
16465          *              "\n iBeacon minor           : " + s.iBeaconMinor +
