18624          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
18625          *   }</pre>
18626          *   </li>
18627          * </ul>
18628          *  
18629          * @since 1.22.2
18630          * 
18631          * @see
18632          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
18633          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
18634          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
18635          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
18636          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
18637          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
18638          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
18639          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
18640          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
18641          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
18642          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
18643          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18644          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18645          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
18646          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
18647          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
18648          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
18649          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
18650          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
18651          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
18652          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
18653          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
18654          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
18655          *
18656          * @example
18657          * document.addEventListener(
18658          *      "iot_thing_discovered",
18659          *      function (param) {
18660          *          // {String} param.bindingId - binding ID.
18661          *          // {String} param.thingUid : thing UID.
18662          *          console.log(
18663          *              "Event 'iot_thing_discovered' is received.\n" +
18664          *              "bindingId = " + param.bindingId + "\n" +
18665          *              "thingUid = " + param.thingUid
18666          *          );
18667          *          hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing({
18668          *              "thingUid": param.thingUid,
18669          *              "onSuccess": function() {
18670          *                  console.log("requestRegisterThing onSuccess");
18671          *              },
18672          *              "onFailure": function(f) {
18673          *                  console.log("requestRegisterThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
18674          *              }
18675          *          });
18676          *      },
18677          *      false
18678          * );
18679          */
18680         hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing = function (param) {
18681             hcap_command("iot_request_register_thing", param);
18682         };
18683         /**
18684          * Requests a reject to register a discovered thing.<br>
18685          * If the discovered thing is rejected to register, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a> will be delivered.<br>
18686          * 
18687          * @param {Object} param
18688          * <ul>
18689          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - UID of the discovered thing to reject.<br>
18690          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
18691          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18692          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
18693          *       // No Parameter. 
18694          *   }</pre>
18695          *   </li>
18696          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
18697          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18698          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
18699          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
18700          *   }</pre>
18701          *   </li>
18702          * </ul>
18703          * 
18704          * @since 1.22.2
18705          * 
18706          * @see
18707          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
18708          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
18709          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
18710          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
18711          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
18712          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
18713          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
18714          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
18715          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
18716          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
18717          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
18718          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18719          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18720          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
18721          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
18722          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
18723          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
18724          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
18725          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
18726          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
18727          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
18728          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
18729          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
18730          *
18731          * @example
18732          * hcap.iot.requestRejectThing({
18733          *     "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
18734          *     "onSuccess": function() {
18735          *         console.log("requestRejectThing onSuccess");
18736          *     },
18737          *     "onFailure": function(f) {
18738          *         console.log("requestRejectThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
18739          *     }
18740          * });
18741          */
18742         hcap.iot.requestRejectThing = function (param) {
18743             hcap_command("iot_request_reject_thing", param);
18744         };
18745         /**
18746          * Gets cached information for registered things.<br>
18747          * Each parameter works as a filter for result things list.<br>
18748          * If several parameters are given, only the highest priority parameter will be effective. Priorities among parameters are (HIGH) > <i>thingUidList</i> > <i>thingTypeId</i> > (LOW).<br>
18749          * If no parameter is given, it's same as no filter, therefore all things list will be returned.<br>
18750          * 
18751          * @param {Object} param
18752          * <ul>
18753          *   <li>{Array} param.thingUidList [Required] - thing UID list as an array of a string thingUids like [|thingUid-0|, |thingUid-1|, ..., |thingUid-n|] while |thingUid-n| is a string of thing UID.<br>
18754          *   <li>{String} param.thingType [Optional] - |ThingType|, thing type. <b><i>ThingBridge</i></b> for bridges. <b><i>ThingDiscovered</i></b> for discovered things.<br>
18755          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
18756          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18757          *   param.onSuccess = function (s) {
18758          *       // {Array} s.thingList - information for things as a type of json array as of [|thing-0|, |thing-1|, ..., |thing-n|]
18759          *       //   |thing-n| - json object for a thing
18760          *       //     {
18761          *       //       "bindingId": |string|, // binding ID
18762          *       //       "thingUid" : |string|, //thing UID
18763          *       //       "thingId" : |string|, // thing ID
18764          *       //       "thingType" : |ThingType|, //thing type
18765          *       //       "thingMetaData" : |ThingMetaData|, // thing meta data
18766          *       //       "thingComponentList": [|thingComponentList-0|, |thingComponentList-1|, ..., |thingComponentList-n|], // component list of the thing
18767          *       //     }
18768          *       //   |thingComponentList-n| - json object for a component
18769          *       //     {
18770          *       //       "parentThingUid": |string|, // parent thing UID of the component
18771          *       //       "componentType": |string|, // component type
18772          *       //       "componentId": |string|, // component ID
18773          *       //       "componentValueType": |string|, // component value type
18774          *       //       "componentValue": |ComponentValue|, // component value
18775          *       //       "componentGettable": |boolean|, // true:component is gettable, false:component is not gettable
18776          *       //       "componentSettable": |boolean|, // true:component is settable, false:component is not settable
18777          *       //     }
18778          *       //   |ComponentValue| - json object for a component value
18779          *       //     {
18780          *       //       "valueType": |string|, // "Unknown", "String", "Boolean", "Variables", "Double", "Float", "Int8", "Int16", "Int32", "Int64", "UInt8", "UInt16", "UInt32", "UInt64"
18781          *       //       "value": |string|, // value
18782          *       //       "additionalValue": |string|, //custom additional value as a string
18783          *       //     }
18784          *   }</pre>
18785          *   </li>
18786          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
18787          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18788          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
18789          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
18790          *   }</pre>
18791          *   </li>
18792          * </ul>
18793          *  
18794          * @since 1.22.2
18795          * 
18796          * @see
18797          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
18798          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
18799          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
18800          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
18801          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
18802          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
18803          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
18804          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
18805          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
18806          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
18807          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
18808          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18809          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18810          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
18811          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
18812          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
18813          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
18814          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
18815          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
18816          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
18817          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
18818          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
18819          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
18820          *
18821          * @example
18822          * hcap.iot.getThingList({
18823          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
18824          *          console.log("getThingList onSuccess : valueType of the first component of the first thing = " + s.thingList[0].thingComponentList[0].componentValue.valueType);
18825          *      }, 
18826          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
18827          *          console.log("getThingList onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
18828          *      }
18829          * });
18830          */
18831         hcap.iot.getThingList = function (param) {
18832             hcap_command("iot_get_thing_list", param);
18833         };
18834         /**
18835          * Gets the binding ID list.<br>
18836          * 
18837          * @param {Object} param
18838          * <ul>
18839          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
18840          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18841          *   param.onSuccess = function (s) {
18842          *       // {Array} s.bindingIdList - binding ID list when returnValue is true.
18843          *   }</pre>
18844          *   </li>
18845          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
18846          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18847          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
18848          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
18849          *   }</pre>
18850          *   </li>
18851          * </ul>
18852          *  
18853          * @since 1.22.2
18854          * 
18855          * @see
18856          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
18857          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
18858          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
18859          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
18860          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
18861          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
18862          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
18863          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
18864          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
18865          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
18866          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
18867          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18868          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18869          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
18870          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
18871          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
18872          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
18873          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
18874          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
18875          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
18876          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
18877          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
18878          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
18879          *
18880          * @example
18881          * hcap.iot.getBindingIdList({
18882          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
18883          *          console.log("getBindingIdList onSuccess : bindingIdList = " + JSON.stringify(s.bindingIdList));
18884          *      }, 
18885          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
18886          *          console.log("getBindingIdList onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
18887          *      }
18888          * });
18889          */
18890         hcap.iot.getBindingIdList = function (param) {
18891             hcap_command("iot_get_binding_id_list", param);
18892         };
18893         /**
18894          * Requests to set the component value.<br>
18895          * If this call is succeeded or failed, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a> will be delivered.<br>
18896          * If the component value is changed, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a> will be delivered.<br>
18897          * 
18898          * @param {Object} param
18899          * <ul>
18900          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID.<br>
18901          *   <li>{String} param.componentId [Required] - component ID.<br>
18902          *   <li>{Object} param.componentValue [Required] - |ComponentValue|. component value to set.<br>
18903          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18904          *       // {Object} |ComponentValue| - json object for a variable
18905          *       //     {
18906          *       //       "valueType": |string|, // "Unknown", "String", "Boolean", "Variables", "Double", "Float", "Int8", "Int16", "Int32", "Int64", "UInt8", "UInt16", "UInt32", "UInt64"
18907          *       //       "value": |string|, // value
18908          *       //       "additionalValue": |string|, //custom additional value as a string
18909          *       //     }</pre>
18910          *   <li>{String} param.callId [Required] - callId which will be delivered for the result identification of this call via <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a>.<br>
18911          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
18912          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18913          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
18914          *       // No Parameter. 
18915          *   }</pre>
18916          *   </li>
18917          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
18918          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18919          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
18920          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
18921          *   }</pre>
18922          *   </li>
18923          * </ul>
18924          *  
18925          * @since 1.22.2
18926          * 
18927          * @see
18928          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
18929          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
18930          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
18931          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
18932          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
18933          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
18934          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
18935          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
18936          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
18937          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
18938          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
18939          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18940          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
18941          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
18942          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
18943          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
18944          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
18945          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
18946          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
18947          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
18948          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
18949          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
18950          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
18951          *
18952          * @example
18953          * hcap.iot.requestSetComponent({
18954          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
18955          *      "componentId": "Dimming",
18956          *      "componentValue": {
18957          *          "additionalVlaue":"",
18958          *          "valueType": "Double",
18959          *          "value": "60"
18960          *      },
18961          *      "callId": "7",
18962          *      "onSuccess": function() {
18963          *          console.log("requestSetComponent onSuccess");
18964          *      }, 
18965          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
18966          *          console.log("requestSetComponent onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
18967          *      }
18968          * });
18969          */
18970         hcap.iot.requestSetComponent = function (param) {
18971             hcap_command("iot_request_set_component", param);
18972         };
18973         /**
18974          * Requests to unregister a thing.<br>
18975          * If a thing is unregistered, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a> will be delivered.<br>
18976          * 
18977          * @param {Object} param
18978          * <ul>
18979          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID to unregister.<br>
18980          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
18981          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18982          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
18983          *       // No Parameter. 
18984          *   }</pre>
18985          *   </li>
18986          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
18987          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
18988          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
18989          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
18990          *   }</pre>
18991          *   </li>
18992          * </ul>
18993          *  
18994          * @since 1.22.2
18995          * 
18996          * @see
18997          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
18998          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
18999          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
19000          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
19001          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
19002          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
19003          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
19004          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
19005          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
19006          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
19007          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
19008          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19009          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19010          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
19011          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
19012          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
19013          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
19014          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
19015          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
19016          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
19017          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
19018          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
19019          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
19020          *
19021          * @example
19022          * hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing({
19023          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
19024          *      "onSuccess": function() {
19025          *          console.log("requestUnregisterThing onSuccess");
19026          *      }, 
19027          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19028          *          console.log("requestUnregisterThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19029          *      }
19030          * });
19031          */
19032         hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing = function (param) {
19033             hcap_command("iot_request_unregister_thing", param);
19034         };
19035         /**
19036          * Set the nickname of a thing.<br>
19037          * The change of the nickname of a thing causes <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a>.<br>
19038          * 
19039          * @param {Object} param
19040          * <ul>
19041          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID to remove.<br>
19042          *   <li>{String} param.nickname [Required] - nickname.<br>
19043          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19044          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19045          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
19046          *       // No Parameter. 
19047          *   }</pre>
19048          *   </li>
19049          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19050          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19051          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19052          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19053          *   }</pre>
19054          *   </li>
19055          * </ul>
19056          *  
19057          * @since 1.22.2
19058          * 
19059          * @see
19060          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
19061          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
19062          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
19063          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
19064          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
19065          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
19066          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
19067          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
19068          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
19069          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
19070          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
19071          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19072          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19073          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
19074          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
19075          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
19076          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
19077          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
19078          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
19079          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
19080          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
19081          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
19082          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
19083          *
19084          * @example
19085          * hcap.iot.setThingNickname({
19086          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
19087          *      "nickname": "NewNickname",
19088          *      "onSuccess": function() {
19089          *          console.log("setThingNickname onSuccess");
19090          *      }, 
19091          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19092          *          console.log("setThingNickname onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19093          *      }
19094          * });
19095          */
19096         hcap.iot.setThingNickname = function (param) {
19097             hcap_command("iot_set_thing_nickname", param);
19098         };
19099         /**
19100          * Requests to synchronize components values of an IoT thing between components values in TV's cache and them in the thing.<br>
19101          * This request is a trigger to update components between TV and the thing.<br>
19102          * Therefore if the thing is not reached by the reason like thing's sleep, it will be failed to synchronize components.<br>
19103          * If the request for a component update is reached to the thing, <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a> will be delivered.<br>
19104          * 
19105          * @param {Object} param
19106          * <ul>
19107          *   <li>{String} param.thingUid [Required] - thing UID to synchronize.<br>
19108          *   <li>{String} param.componentId [Optional] - component ID to synchronize. If <i>componentId</i> is not defined, all components of the thing will be requested to synchronize.<br>
19109          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19110          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19111          *   param.onSuccess = function () {
19112          *       // No Parameter. 
19113          *   }</pre>
19114          *   </li>
19115          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19116          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19117          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19118          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19119          *   }</pre>
19120          *   </li>
19121          * </ul>
19122          *  
19123          * @since 1.22.2
19124          * 
19125          * @see
19126          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
19127          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
19128          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
19129          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
19130          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
19131          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
19132          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
19133          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
19134          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
19135          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
19136          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
19137          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19138          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19139          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
19140          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
19141          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
19142          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
19143          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
19144          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
19145          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
19146          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
19147          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
19148          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
19149          *
19150          * @example
19151          * hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing({
19152          *      "thingUid": "Zigbee:01EC789805006F0D00",
19153          *      "onSuccess": function() {
19154          *          console.log("requestSynchronizeThing onSuccess");
19155          *      }, 
19156          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19157          *          console.log("requestSynchronizeThing onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19158          *      }
19159          * });
19160          */
19161         hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing = function (param) {
19162             hcap_command("iot_request_synchronize_thing", param);
19163         };
19164         /**
19165          * Gets the IoT framework status.<br> 
19166          * 
19167          * @param {Object} param
19168          * <ul>
19169          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19170          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19171          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
19172          *       // {String} param.status - "off" : framework is off, "initializing" : framework is initializing, "ready" : framework is ready. 
19173          *   }</pre>
19174          *   </li>
19175          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19176          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19177          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19178          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19179          *   }</pre>
19180          *   </li>
19181          * </ul>
19182          *  
19183          * @since 1.22.2
19184          * 
19185          * @see
19186          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
19187          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
19188          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
19189          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
19190          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
19191          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
19192          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
19193          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
19194          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
19195          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
19196          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
19197          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19198          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19199          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
19200          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
19201          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
19202          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
19203          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
19204          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
19205          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
19206          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
19207          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
19208          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
19209          *
19210          * @example
19211          * hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus({
19212          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
19213          *          console.log("getFrameworkStatus onSuccess : status = " + s.status);
19214          *      }, 
19215          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19216          *          console.log("getFrameworkStatus onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19217          *      }
19218          * });
19219          */
19220         hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus = function (param) {
19221             hcap_command("iot_get_framework_status", param);
19222         };
19223         /**
19224          * Request to do factory reset for core DB and binding DBs.<br> 
19225          * If factory reset is successful,  <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a> will be delivered.<br>
19226          * 
19227          * @param {Object} param
19228          * <ul>
19229          *   <li>{Array} param.bindingIdList [Required] - binding ID list to do factory reset.<br> If bindingIdList is undefined, core and all bindings will remove DB file.<br> 
19230          *                                                If bindingIdList is defined, the bindings in bindingIdList will remove DB files, and core will remove bindings in binidngIdList and their information in core DB but core will not remove core DB file.<br>
19231          *                                                For core or bindings to delete its DB file, its factory reset result will be included in factoryResetResultList of IoT event <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received<br>
19232          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19233          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19234          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
19235          *       // No parameter. 
19236          *   }</pre>
19237          *   </li>
19238          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19239          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19240          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19241          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19242          *   }</pre>
19243          *   </li>
19244          * </ul>
19245          *  
19246          * @since 1.22.2
19247          * 
19248          * @see
19249          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
19250          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
19251          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
19252          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
19253          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
19254          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
19255          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
19256          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
19257          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
19258          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
19259          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
19260          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19261          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19262          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
19263          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
19264          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
19265          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
19266          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
19267          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
19268          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
19269          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
19270          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getVersions">hcap.iot.getVersions()</a><br>
19271          *
19272          * @example
19273          * hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset({
19274          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
19275          *          console.log("requestFactoryReset onSuccess");
19276          *      }, 
19277          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19278          *          console.log("requestFactoryReset onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19279          *      }
19280          * });
19281          */
19282         hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset = function (param) {
19283             hcap_command("iot_request_factory_reset", param);
19284         };
19285         /**
19286          * Get versions of hcapmw, iotservice, core and bindings.<br>
19287          * 
19288          * @param {Object} param
19289          * <ul>
19290          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19291          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19292          *   param.onSuccess = function (s) {
19293          *       // {Object} s.versions - versions of JSON foramt when returnValue is true. If no binding is ready, "bindings" doesn't exist.
19294          *   }</pre>
19295          *   </li>
19296          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19297          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19298          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19299          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19300          *   }</pre>
19301          *   </li>
19302          * </ul>
19303          *  
19304          * @since 1.22.2
19305          * 
19306          * @see
19307          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_binding_ready">{Event} iot_binding_ready</a><br>
19308          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_discovered">{Event} iot_thing_discovered</a><br>
19309          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_bridge_status_changed">{Event} iot_bridge_status_changed</a><br>
19310          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_registered">{Event} iot_thing_registered</a><br>
19311          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_rejected">{Event} iot_thing_rejected</a><br>
19312          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_component_reported">{Event} iot_component_reported</a><br>
19313          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_unregistered">{Event} iot_thing_unregistered</a><br>
19314          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_thing_meta_data_changed">{Event} iot_thing_meta_data_changed</a><br>
19315          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_set_component_result_received">{Event} iot_set_component_result_received</a><br>
19316          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_framework_status_changed">{Event} iot_framework_status_changed</a><br>
19317          * <a href="_global_.html#event:iot_factory_reset_result_received">{Event} iot_factory_reset_result_received</a><br>
19318          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.requestSetBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19319          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBridgeStatus">hcap.iot.getBridgeStatus()</a><br>
19320          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRegisterThing">hcap.iot.requestRegisterThing()</a><br>
19321          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestRejectThing">hcap.iot.requestRejectThing()</a><br>
19322          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getThingList">hcap.iot.getThingList()</a><br>
19323          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getBindingIdList">hcap.iot.getBindingIdList()</a><br>
19324          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSetComponent">hcap.iot.requestSetComponent()</a><br>
19325          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestUnregisterThing">hcap.iot.requestUnregisterThing()</a><br>
19326          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.setThingNickname">hcap.iot.setThingNickname()</a><br>
19327          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestSynchronizeThing">hcap.iot.requestSynchronizeThing()</a><br>
19328          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.getFrameworkStatus">hcap.iot.getFrameworkStatus()</a><br>
19329          * <a href="hcap.iot.html#.requestFactoryReset">hcap.iot.requestFactoryReset()</a><br>
19330          *
19331          * @example
19332          * hcap.iot.getVersions({
19333          *      "onSuccess": function(s) {
19334          *          console.log("getVersions onSuccess : versions = " +  JSON.stringify(s.versions));
19335          *      }, 
19336          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19337          *          console.log("getVersions onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19338          *      }
19339          * });
19340          */
19341         hcap.iot.getVersions = function (param) {
19342             hcap_command("iot_get_versions", param);
19343         };
19344         hcap.iot.getThingListPrivate = function (param) {
19345             hcap_command("iot_get_thing_list_private", param);
19346         };
19347         /**
19348          * @namespace hcap.camera
19349          */
19350         hcap.camera = { };
19351         /**
19352          * Get information about currently available camera devices. Only supported for Logitech BCC950 model.<br>
19353          *
19354          * @param {Object} param
19355          * <ul>
19356          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.<br>
19357          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19358          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
19359          *       // {Array} param.list - camera information list supported by TV
19360          *       //         {String} param.list[].id - camera id currently available
19361          *       //         {String} param.list[].name - camera name currently available
19362          *       //         {String} param.list[].controls - control types currently available
19363          *   }</pre>
19364          *   </li>
19365          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19366          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19367          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19368          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19369          *   }</pre>
19370          *   </li>
19371          * </ul>
19372          *
19373          * @since 1.24.4
19374          *
19375          * @see
19376          * <a href="hcap.camera.html#.getCameraControl">hcap.camera.getCameraControl()</a><br>
19377          * <a href="hcap.camera.html#.setCameraControl">hcap.camera.setCameraControl()</a><br>
19378          *
19379          * @example
19380          * hcap.camera.getCameraInformation({
19381          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
19382          *          console.log("onSuccess : list length = " + s.list.length);
19383          *          for (var i = 0; i < s.list.length; i++) {
19384          *              console.log(
19385          *              "[" + i + "].id = " + s.list[i].id +
19386          *              ", [" + i + "].name = " + s.list[i].name +
19387          *              ", [" + i + "].controls = " + s.list[i].controls
19388          *              );
19389          *          }
19390          *      },
19391          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19392          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19393          *      }
19394          * });
19395          */
19396         hcap.camera.getCameraInformation = function (param) {
19397             hcap_command("get_camera_information", param);
19398         };
19399         /**
19400          * Gets the current value of the camera control type. Only supported for Logitech BCC950 model.<br>
19401          *
19402          * @param {Object} param
19403          * <ul>
19404          *   <li>{String} param.id [Required] - camera id</li>
19405          *   <li>{String} param.control_type [Required] - control type of the camera ("Pan (relative)"/"Tilt (relative)"/"Zoom"/"Absolute"/"Brightness"/"Contrast"/"Sharpness")</li>
19406          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19407          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19408          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
19409          *       // {Number} param.value - the current value of the control_type parameter.
19410          *   }</pre>
19411          *   </li>
19412          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19413          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19414          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19415          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19416          *   }</pre>
19417          *   </li>
19418          * </ul>
19419          *
19420          * @since 1.24.4
19421          *
19422          * @see
19423          * <a href="hcap.camera.html#.getCameraInformation">hcap.camera.getCameraInformation()</a><br>
19424          * <a href="hcap.camera.html#.setCameraControl">hcap.camera.setCameraControl()</a><br>
19425          *
19426          * @example
19427          * hcap.camera.getCameraControl({
19428          *      "id" : "video0",
19429          *      "control_type" : "Brightness",
19430          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
19431          *          console.log("onSuccess : value = " + s.value);
19432          *      },
19433          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19434          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19435          *      }
19436          * });
19437          */
19438         hcap.camera.getCameraControl = function (param) {
19439             hcap_command("get_camera_control", param);
19440         };
19441         /**
19442          * Sets the value of the camera control type. Only supported for Logitech BCC950 model.<br>
19443          *
19444          * @param {Object} param
19445          * <ul>
19446          *   <li>{String} param.id [Required] - camera id</li>
19447          *   <li>{String} param.control_type [Required] - control type of the camera ("Pan (relative)"/"Tilt (relative)"/"Zoom"/"Absolute"/"Brightness"/"Contrast"/"Sharpness"/"Pan Reset"/"Tilt Reset")</li>
19448          *   <li>{Number} param.value [Required] - value to set</li>
19449          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19450          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19451          *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
19452          *       // No Parameter.
19453          *   }</pre>
19454          *   </li>
19455          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19456          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19457          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19458          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19459          *   }</pre>
19460          *   </li>
19461          * </ul>
19462          *
19463          * @since 1.24.4
19464          *
19465          * @see
19466          * <a href="hcap.camera.html#.getCameraInformation">hcap.camera.getCameraInformation()</a><br>
19467          * <a href="hcap.camera.html#.getCameraControl">hcap.camera.getCameraControl()</a><br>
19468          *
19469          * @example
19470          * hcap.camera.setCameraControl({
19471          *      "id" : "video0",
19472          *      "control_type" : "Pan (Relative)",
19473          *      "value" : -500,
19474          *      "onSuccess" : function(s) {
19475          *          console.log("onSuccess : value = " + s.value);
19476          *      },
19477          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19478          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19479          *      }
19480          * });
19481          */
19482         hcap.camera.setCameraControl = function (param) {
19483             hcap_command("set_camera_control", param);
19484         };
19485 		/** 
19486 		 * @namespace hcap.speech
19487 		 */
19488 		hcap.speech = { };
19489         /**
19490 		 * Reads out an input text in the language chosen by user with HCAP Application<br>
19491 		 *
19492 		 * @param {Object} param
19493 		 * <ul>
19494          *   <li>{String} param.text [Required] - Indicates the text to be converted.</li>
19495          *   <li>{Boolean} param.clear [Optional] - Indicates if the current text is to be cleared. true : Stops processing the current text, and processes the next one. false : Processes the next text only after completing the current one. (default : false)</li>
19496 		 *   <li>{String} param.language [Optional] - Indicates the language used to read the input text. To get the list supported languages, use the hcap.speech.getSupportLanguagesTTS method. The default language is English (en-US).</li>
19497 		 *   <li>{String} param.appID [Optional] - Indicates the Application ID.</li>
19498          *   <li>{String} param.speed [Optional] - Indicates the speech speed of the input text. (default : medium) [verySlow | slow | medium | fast | veryFast]</li>
19499 		 *   <li>{Boolean} param.feedback [Optional] - 	Indicates whether to return a unique identifier for the input text. true : return msgID (default : false)</li>
19500 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19501 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19502 		 *   param.onSuccess = function(param) {
19503 		 *       {String} param.msgID - Indicates the unique identifier containing 12 characters that represent the input text. The value is returned only if the feedback is set to true.
19504 		 *   }</pre>
19505 		 *   </li>
19506 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19507 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19508 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19509 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19510 		 *   }</pre>
19511 		 *   </li>
19512 		 * </ul>
19513 		 *
19514 		 * @since 1.21.8
19515 		 *
19516 		 * @see
19517 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.stopTTS">hcap.speech.stopTTS()</a><br>
19518 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.getSupportLanguagesTTS">hcap.speech.getSupportLanguagesTTS()</a><br>
19519 		 *
19520 		 * @example
19521 		 * hcap.speech.speakTTS({
19522 		 *      "text" : "Hello, This is Text To Speech service.",
19523          *       "speed" : "medium", //["verySlow"|"slow"|"medium"|"fast"|"veryFast"] (Optional)
19524 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
19525 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
19526 		 *      },
19527 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19528 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19529 		 *      }
19530 		 * });
19531 		 */
19532         hcap.speech.speakTTS = function (param) {
19533             hcap_command("speak_tts", param);
19534         };
19535         /**
19536          * Stops the text-to-speech processing immediately and ignores the pending text on the buffer with HCAP Application<br>
19537          *
19538          * @param {Object} param
19539          * <ul>
19540          *   <li>{String} param.appID [Optional] - Indicates the app ID passed in the  method.</li>
19541          *   <li>{String} param.msgID [Optional] - Indicates the unique identifier containing 12 characters that represent the input text</li>
19542          *   <li>{Boolean} param.fadeOut [Optional] - 	Indicates whether to return a unique identifier for the input text. true : return msgID (default : false)</li>
19543          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19544          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19545          *   param.onSuccess = function() {
19546          *       // No Parameter.
19547          *   }</pre>
19548          *   </li>
19549          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19550          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19551          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19552          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19553          *   }</pre>
19554          *   </li>
19555          * </ul>
19556          *
19557          * @since 1.21.8
19558          *
19559          * @see
19560          * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.speakTTS">hcap.speech.speakTTS()</a><br>
19561          * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.getSupportLanguagesTTS">hcap.speech.getSupportLanguagesTTS()</a><br>
19562          *
19563          * @example
19564          * hcap.speech.stopTTS({
19565          *      "onSuccess" : function() {
19566          *          console.log("onSuccess");
19567          *      },
19568          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19569          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19570          *      }
19571          * });
19572          */
19573         hcap.speech.stopTTS = function (param) {
19574             hcap_command("stop_tts", param);
19575         };
19576         /**
19577          * Gets the list of languages that are supported by the TTS provider.<br>
19578          *
19579          * @param {Object} param
19580          *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19581          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19582          *   param.onSuccess = function(r) {
19583          *       {String Array} languages - Indicates the list of the supported languages.
19584          *   }</pre>
19585          *   </li>
19586          *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19587          *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19588          *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19589          *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19590          *   }</pre>
19591          *   </li>
19592          * </ul>
19593          *
19594          * @since 1.21.8
19595          *
19596          * @see
19597          * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.speakTTS">hcap.speech.speakTTS()</a><br>
19598          * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.stopTTS">hcap.speech.stopTTS()</a><br>
19599          *
19600          * @example
19601          * hcap.speech.getSupportLanguagesTTS({
19602          *      "onSuccess" : function(r) {
19603          *          console.log("onSuccess");
19604          *          var list = r.languages;
19605          *          for(var i = 0 i < list.length ; i++){
19606          *              console.log("["+i"]" +list[i]);
19607          *          }
19608          *      },
19609          *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19610          *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19611          *      }
19612          * });
19613          */
19614         hcap.speech.getSupportLanguagesTTS = function (param){
19615             hcap_command("get_support_languages_tts", param);
19616         };
19617 
19618 		/**
19619 		 * Sets using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is enabled or disabled.<br>
19620 		 * 
19621 		 * @param {Object} param
19622 		 * <ul>
19623 		 *   <li>{Boolean} param.enable [Required] - true : enable to speech recognition, false : disable.</li>
19624 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19625 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19626 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
19627 		 *       // No Parameter. 
19628 		 *   }</pre>
19629 		 *   </li>
19630 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19631 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19632 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19633 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19634 		 *   }</pre>
19635 		 *   </li>
19636 		 * </ul>
19637 		 *  
19638 		 * @since 1.22.2
19639 		 * 
19640 		 * @see
19641 		 * <a href="_global_.html#event:speech_to_text_status_changed">{Event} speech_to_text_status_changed</a><br>
19642 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.getSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
19643 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.decideHost">hcap.speech.decideHost()</a><br>
19644 		 *
19645 		 * @example
19646 		 * hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition({
19647 		 *      "enable" : true,
19648 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
19649 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
19650 		 *      }, 
19651 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19652 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19653 		 *      }
19654 		 * });
19655 		 */
19656 		hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition = function (param) {
19657 			hcap_command("set_speech_recognition", param);
19658 		};
19659 		/**
19660 		 * Gets whether using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is enabled or disabled.<br>
19661 		 * 
19662 		 * @param {Object} param
19663 		 * <ul>
19664 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19665 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19666 		 *   param.onSuccess = function (param) {
19667 		 *       // {Boolean} param.enable - true if using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is enabled. false if using the speech recognition by HCAP Application is disabled.
19668 		 *   }</pre>
19669 		 *   </li>
19670 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19671 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19672 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19673 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19674 		 *   }</pre>
19675 		 *   </li>
19676 		 * </ul>
19677 		 *  
19678 		 * @since 1.22.2
19679 		 * 
19680 		 * @see
19681 		 * <a href="_global_.html#event:speech_to_text_status_changed">{Event} speech_to_text_status_changed</a><br>
19682 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.setSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
19683 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.decideHost">hcap.speech.decideHost()</a><br>
19684 		 *
19685 		 * @example
19686 		 * hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition({
19687 		 *      "onSuccess" : function (param) {
19688 		 *          console.log("onSuccess : get speech recognition = " + param.enable);
19689 		 *      }, 
19690 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19691 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19692 		 *      }
19693 		 * });
19694 		 */
19695 		hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition = function (param) {
19696 			hcap_command("get_speech_recognition", param);
19697 		};
19698 		/**
19699 		 * @namespace hcap.speech.HostType
19700 		 */
19701 		hcap.speech.HostType = {
19702 			/**
19703 			 * Not Support
19704 			 * @since 1.22.2
19705 			 * @constant
19706 			 */
19707 			NOT_SUPPORT : 0,
19708 			/**
19709 			 * HCAP Application is in charge of handling the speech recognition
19710 			 * @since 1.22.2
19711 			 * @constant
19712 			 */
19713 			APPLICATION : 1,
19714 			/**
19715 			 * The Pro:Centric platform is in charge of handling the speech recognition
19716 			 * @since 1.22.2
19717 			 * @constant
19718 			 */
19719 			TV : 2
19720 		};
19721 		/**
19722 		 * Decides who is in charge of handling the speech recognition.<br>
19723 		 * 
19724 		 * @param {Object} param
19725 		 * <ul>
19726 		 *   <li>{String} param.serviceType [Required] - STT result category.</li>
19727 		 *   <li>{String} param.actionType [Required] - STT result intent.</li>
19728 		 *   <li>{Number} param.hostType [Required] - host type defined <a href="hcap.speech.HostType.html">hcap.speech.HostType</a>.</li>      
19729 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onSuccess [Optional] - success callback function.
19730 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19731 		 *   param.onSuccess = function() {
19732 		 *       // No Parameter. 
19733 		 *   }</pre>
19734 		 *   </li>
19735 		 *   <li>{Function} param.onFailure [Optional] - failure callback function.
19736 		 *   <pre class="code prettyprint">
19737 		 *   param.onFailure = function (param) {
19738 		 *       // {String} param.errorMessage - in case of failure, this message provides the details.
19739 		 *   }</pre>
19740 		 *   </li>
19741 		 * </ul>
19742 		 *  
19743 		 * @since 1.22.2
19744 		 * 
19745 		 * @see
19746 		 * <a href="_global_.html#event:speech_to_text_status_changed">{Event} speech_to_text_status_changed</a><br>
19747 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.setSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.setSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
19748 		 * <a href="hcap.speech.html#.getSpeechRecognition">hcap.speech.getSpeechRecognition()</a><br>
19749 		 *
19750 		 * @example
19751 		 * hcap.speech.decideHost({
19752 		 *      "serviceType" : "id_time",
19753 		 *      "actionType" : "id_time_info",
19754 		 *      "hostType" : hcap.speech.HostType.APPLICATION,
19755 		 *      "onSuccess" : function() {
19756 		 *          console.log("onSuccess");
19757 		 *      }, 
19758 		 *      "onFailure" : function(f) {
19759 		 *          console.log("onFailure : errorMessage = " + f.errorMessage);
19760 		 *      }
19761 		 * });
19762 		 */
19763 		hcap.speech.decideHost = function (param) {
19764 			hcap_command("decide_host", param);
19765 		};
19766 
19767     }());
19768 
19769 }
19770
